highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'O_Kakky1550', enters. The opponent plays 'Yoshimitsu' and is named 'Pig Breathing, Fuh-Hi Form'. Miko cannot hold back her laughter at the unique name and character setting.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Homelander'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'k2bat_jp', enters. The opponent plays 'Geralt' and is named 'Homelander'. Miko gets excited at the appearance resembling a character from her favorite overseas drama.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'F-ZERO Commentator' (Mr. 0-style Azwel)
highlights_en.description: Miko bursts into laughter at the bizarre character creation named 'F-ZERO Commentator', featuring a green suit and a profile view. She comments, 'Too niche.' She wins the first round by KO, and in the replay, realizes the opponent's character is a Mr. 0 characri from 'One Piece', impressed by the high level of accuracy. She also wins the second round by KO.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Which is the Weakest Tsunpoko?' (Bald Voldo-style)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'ittann-momenn', enters. The character is named 'Which is the Weakest Tsunpoko?' and has a bizarre pink bald Voldo appearance, making Miko wryly say, 'Please don't be Tsunpoko.' She's overwhelmed by rolling attacks and loses by ring out, but realizes low attacks are effective and adjusts. However, she loses the second round as well.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Tsunpoko' (Seong Mi-na with a Poison Needle)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'tokimeki39', enters. The character is Seong Mi-na and is named 'Tsunpoko'. Miko retorts, 'Tsunpoko again!' and bursts into laughter upon realizing the opponent's weapon is a 'Nose Stab Stick'. She loses two consecutive rounds.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Majin Buu (Laplus-suck)'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'ropotake', enters. The character is named 'Majin Buu (Laplus-suck)', a Majin Buu characri modeled after Laplus Darkness, which surprises and makes Miko burst into laughter. She loses the first round, but reverses the situation with Reversal Edge in the second round and wins by KO.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Cure Nyami' (2B in a White Dress)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'minami_sizuku', enters. Miko shows both confusion and delight at the cute characri of 'Cure Nyami' (2B) wearing a white frilly dress. In the first round, she is overwhelmed by the opponent's fast attacks but wins by KO with Miko's Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'oi-chan_ex', enters. The character is a fox-eared Cassandra with a distinctive swimsuit characri. In the first round, Miko struggles against the opponent's fast attacks and is targeted for ring out. In the second round, she wins by KO with Miko's Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'I'm Sick of Interviews' (Afro Sub-Character)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'mac_like', enters. Miko bursts into laughter at the bizarre characri with an afro and striped shirt, exclaiming, 'It's an afro!' She realizes it's a character creation inspired by Hololive's Subaru and gets excited, saying, 'It's a HoloGra reference!' She wins two consecutive rounds by KO.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: The rematch opponent, 'oi-chan_ex', appears in a swimsuit. Miko highly praises her, saying 'So cute.' She wins the first round by KO with Critical Edge. She wins the second round by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Tetris' (Tetris Block Yoshimitsu)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'MaronsodaX', enters. Miko bursts into laughter at the bizarre characri, which has a red L-shaped block on its head, a blocky body, and a grid pattern, exclaiming, 'Tetris is here!' In the first round, she struggles against the opponent's eccentric movements. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Maronsoda' (Afro Sub-Character)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'mac_like'. Miko realizes it's a character creation inspired by Hololive's Subaru and gets excited, saying, 'It's a HoloGra reference!' In the first round, she is overwhelmed by the opponent's fast attacks. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'oi-chan_ex'. She wins the first round by KO with Critical Edge. She wins the second round by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Tetris' (Tetris Block Yoshimitsu)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'MaronsodaX'. In the first round, she struggles against the opponent's eccentric movements. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Maronsoda' (Afro Sub-Character)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'mac_like'. In the first round, she is overwhelmed by the opponent's fast attacks. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'oi-chan_ex'. She wins the first round by KO with Critical Edge. She wins the second round by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Tetris' (Tetris Block Yoshimitsu)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'MaronsodaX'. In the first round, she struggles against the opponent's eccentric movements. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Maronsoda' (Afro Sub-Character)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'mac_like'. In the first round, she is overwhelmed by the opponent's fast attacks. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'oi-chan_ex'. She wins the first round by KO with Critical Edge. She wins the second round by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Tetris' (Tetris Block Yoshimitsu)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'MaronsodaX'. In the first round, she struggles against the opponent's eccentric movements. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'Maronsoda' (Afro Sub-Character)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'mac_like'. In the first round, she is overwhelmed by the opponent's fast attacks. In the second round, she wins by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' (Swimsuit Fox-Eared Cassandra)
highlights_en.description: Another match with 'oi-chan_ex'. She wins the first round by KO with Critical Edge. She wins the second round by KO with Reversal Edge.

highlights_en.title: Rematch and Loss against 'Afro Sub-Character'
highlights_en.description: She rematches against the afro-headed character creation 'A Certain Scarlet Fox' but loses two consecutive rounds. Miko retorts, 'Who the heck is this guy?'

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Taimanin Kouga Asuka'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'sesukaver3', enters. The character is Taki, and it's a match against a characri named 'Taimanin Kouga Asuka'. Miko loses two consecutive rounds and comments, 'Well then, please undress.'

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Hao!' (HimeHina-like Character)
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'IceYOKAI', enters. The character is 'Xianghua' and it's a match against a characri named 'Hao!'. Miko realizes it's a character creation inspired by HimeHina and hums along. She wins the first round by KO. She also wins the second round by KO and rejoices, saying, 'This is perfect.'

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Man-gatarou Edition Sakura Miko'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'teru3017', enters. The character is 'Xianghua' and it's a match against a characri named 'Man-gatarou Edition Sakura Miko'. Miko bursts into laughter at its appearance and loses two consecutive rounds.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Our Friendly Neighbor Spiderme'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'kotetu-g', enters. The character is Taki, and it's a match against a characri named 'Our Friendly Neighbor Spiderme'. Miko comments on its appearance, saying 'That's unfair.' She loses two consecutive rounds.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'YAGOO GARDEN'
highlights_en.description: The next opponent, 'Nightou_AB', enters. The character is Nightmare, and it's a match against a characri named 'YAGOO GARDEN'. Miko bursts into laughter at its appearance and retorts, 'Who wanted to see this?!' Miko wins the first round by KO.

highlights_en.title: Match with 'Hello, I'm Jaguar' and Stream End
highlights_en.description: The final opponent, 'Torikbs36', enters. The character is 'Azwel', and it's a match against a characri named 'Hello, I'm Jaguar'. Miko comments on its appearance, saying 'It's Jaguar-san.' She wins splendidly and gives closing remarks and a summary for the stream.

title: 【 シャドバWB/Shadowverse】シャドバ歴１０日目、明日が本番です。やばい【ホロライブ DEV_IS 響咲リオナ】

overview.summary: ホロライブDEV_ISの響咲リオナが、シャドウバース：ワールドビヨンドの大会練習配信を行った。シャドバ歴10日目という状況で、明日に控えるCRカップ本番に向けてランクマッチに挑む。配信冒頭ではミュートに気づかず挨拶をやり直すお茶目な一面を見せる。初戦では守護ビショップを使い、相手の猛攻に苦戦しつつも懸命に盤面を立て直す激しい攻防を繰り広げたが、最終的にはデッキ切れのルールを知らず敗北。続くネメシス戦でも強烈なコンボに苦戦し敗北を喫したが、その後も気を取り直してランクマッチに挑み続けた。時には劇的な勝利に大興奮し、また時には長時間の泥沼戦に苦戦する様子を見せながらも、真剣かつユーモラスなリアクションで視聴者との交流を深めた。ロイヤル戦では、相手の猛攻に対し、体力わずかながらも守護フォロワーや全体除去カードで粘り強く戦い抜く姿が印象的だった。全体を通して、視聴者との活発なコミュニケーションを取りながら、ゲームの奥深さと自身の成長を共有する配信となった。
overview.mood: 序盤は和やかで、ゲーム中は真剣だが、敗北しても悔しさを素直に表現する親しみやすい雰囲気。劇的な勝利に大興奮する場面と、長時間の泥沼戦に苦戦する様子が交互に現れ、集中力が高まる中でもユーモラスな反応が見られる。

highlights.title: ミュートに気づかず挨拶をやり直す
highlights.description: 配信開始後、ミュートになっていることに気づかず挨拶をしてしまい、視聴者のコメントで気づき慌てて挨拶をやり直す響咲リオナ。無音だったことに悔しがる様子が可愛らしい。

highlights.title: 初のシャドバCRカップへの意気込み
highlights.description: 明日開催されるシャドウバースのCRカップに初参加することを報告。シャドバ歴10日目であること、昨日は爆睡して練習できなかったことを明かし、睡眠十分で頭は冴えているとアピールする。

highlights.title: アチーブメント報酬の受け取りと後悔
highlights.description: ゲーム内のアチーブメント報酬としてルピを受け取る。大量のルピに喜ぶも、もっと寝ればよかったと後悔する様子を見せる。

highlights.title: ランクマッチ開始 - 守護ビショップで挑戦
highlights.description: ランクマッチに挑戦することを宣言し、使用デッキは「守護ビショップ」であることを明かす。ミスプレイもあるかもしれないが、精一杯やると意気込みを語る。

highlights.title: サファイアランクへの復帰報告
highlights.description: 昨日のランクマッチでルビーに落ちてしまっていたが、今回サファイアランクに戻れたことを報告。配信中に再び落ちる可能性もあると述べ、緊張した様子で気を引き締める。

highlights.title: ランクマッチ1戦目開始 - ミラーマッチ
highlights.description: ランクマッチの相手も同じビショップで、ミラーマッチとなる。先攻後攻を決める場面で、響咲リオナは改めて勝利への意気込みを見せる。

highlights.title: 邪教の権現をプレイ
highlights.description: 試合序盤、コスト1の邪教の権現をプレイし、デッキを回していく。

highlights.title: 相手の攻撃に焦りを見せる
highlights.description: 相手がリーダーにダメージを与えるカードをプレイし、響咲リオナは焦りを見せる。続けて守護フォロワーを展開し、盤面を守ろうとする。

highlights.title: グリームニルで盤面一掃
highlights.description: 盤面が不利な状況の中、グリームニルをプレイし、相手のフォロワーを一掃することに成功する。

highlights.title: ラピス登場と回復のチャンス
highlights.description: 苦しい盤面の中、大いなる魂天使・ラピスを引き当てたことに喜び、場の回復と相手フォロワーの破壊を狙う。しかし、相手の妨害で回復ができなかった。

highlights.title: ホーリーフレイムタイガーでの攻防
highlights.description: ホーリーフレイムタイガーをプレイ。相手のフォロワーにダメージを与えながら、盤面を有利に進めようとする。

highlights.title: ランクマッチ1戦目敗北
highlights.description: 相手の猛攻に耐えきれず、初戦は敗北。悔しさからか言葉を発せない響咲リオナ。

highlights.title: ランクマッチ2戦目開始 - ミラーマッチ再び
highlights.description: 連戦でランクマッチに挑戦。再び相手もビショップでミラーマッチとなる。

highlights.title: 序盤の守護フォロワー展開
highlights.description: 序盤はベルエンジェル・リアや穏やかなる教会など、守護フォロワーを中心に盤面を固める。相手も同様に守護フォロワーを展開する。

highlights.title: グリームニルでの盤面除去
highlights.description: グリームニルをプレイし、相手の場のフォロワー全てにダメージを与える。盤面をリセットし、優位に立とうとする。

highlights.title: オーディンで相手フォロワーを消滅
highlights.description: 命運の業賢・オーディンをプレイし、相手の最も攻撃力の高いフォロワーを消滅させる。盤面を優位に進めるチャンスを狙う。

highlights.title: アイテールで盤面を強化
highlights.description: 天の守護神・アイテールをプレイし、自身のフォロワーすべてに守護とオーラ（対象にされない能力）を付与。盤面をさらに強固にする。

highlights.title: ジャンヌで相手の場を破壊
highlights.description: 純白の聖女・ジャンヌをプレイし、相手の場のフォロワーすべてにダメージを与える。盤面を有利に進める。

highlights.title: 水神の守護神・サレファで回復
highlights.description: 水神の守護神・サレファをプレイし、自身のリーダーを回復。同時に相手のフォロワーすべてにダメージを与える。

highlights.title: ホーリーフレイムタイガーで攻勢
highlights.description: ホーリーフレイムタイガーをプレイし、相手のリーダーにダメージを与える。相手のフォロワーも破壊し、盤面を優位に進める。

highlights.title: 絶望的な状況からの敗北
highlights.description: 相手のフォロワーが大量に展開され、絶望的な状況に追い込まれる。そのまま敗北となり、響咲リオナは悔しさを隠せない様子で叫び声をあげる。

highlights.title: ランクマッチ2戦目終盤の攻防
highlights.description: 相手の攻撃に耐えながら、サレファ、アイテール、ホーリーフレイムタイガーなどで盤面を立て直しつつ攻撃を続ける。オーディンをプレイするも、教会を消滅させる選択肢が表示されず、「なんで？！」と混乱する。

highlights.title: デッキ切れ敗北に叫び声を上げる
highlights.description: デッキ切れ（ライブラリアウト）で敗北することを知らず、まさかの展開に絶叫し、悔しさを露わにする。視聴者から「煽り勝ち」とコメントが寄せられる中、「やめて！」と叫びながら強制的にバトルを終了させた。

highlights.title: まさかの逆転勝利で喜びを爆発
highlights.description: デッキ切れを知らずにいたものの、相手のサレンダーによりまさかの「WIN」の文字が表示され、驚きと喜びで拍手をしながら「なーにーが！」と叫び声を上げた。ランクC3への昇格も確認した。

highlights.title: 相手への感謝と次戦開始
highlights.description: 対戦相手がサレンダーしたことに気づき、「ありがとうございました」と感謝の言葉を述べる。その後、次のランクマッチを開始し、ネメシスとマッチングした。

highlights.title: BGM・SE音量調整
highlights.description: ゲーム内のBGMとSEの音量を調整し、聞き取りやすいように設定し直した。

highlights.title: ネメシス戦、序盤の攻防
highlights.description: ネメシスとのランクマッチを開始。序盤はベルエンジェル・リアや穏やかなる教会、メイドエンジェル・チェレッタなどの守護フォロワーをプレイする単調な攻防が続く。相手はオーキスやアーティファクトで盤面を展開する。

highlights.title: 強烈なコンボで敗北
highlights.description: 相手の「デストロイアーティファクト」や「異界の絶叫・ミーノ」、「悪戯のレッサーマミー」などの強力なコンボにより、盤面を破壊され、リーダーに大ダメージを受け敗北した。ゲームの知識不足を痛感し、悔しさを露わにした。

highlights.title: 「殴れる時に殴る！」発言で盛り上がる
highlights.description: 試合中、相手の行動に動揺しながらも「殴れる時に殴る！」と発言し、コメント欄が盛り上がる。響咲リオナの強い意志が感じられる瞬間。

highlights.title: 日本語が不自由になるリオナ
highlights.description: ゲーム中に集中しすぎて、自分が何を言っているのか分からなくなる響咲リオナ。視聴者から「日本語が不自由」と指摘され、恥ずかしがる様子を見せる。

highlights.title: ウィルバートとオーディンの選択
highlights.description: 盤面を有利に進めるため、ウィルバートとオーディンどちらをプレイするか悩む。最終的にオーディンで相手フォロワーを破壊する選択をする。

highlights.title: シルヴィアとラピスの連続プレイ
highlights.description: 手札から箱庭の断罪者・シルヴィアと大いなる魂天使・ラピスを連続でプレイ。盤面を強化しつつ相手のフォロワーを破壊し、自身のリーダーを回復する。

highlights.title: 再びオーディンで盤面クリア
highlights.description: 再度、命運の業賢・オーディンをプレイ。相手の場にいるフォロワーを一掃し、優位な状況を作り出す。

highlights.title: 「雪の宿」の話題で盛り上がる
highlights.description: 視聴者から「雪の宿」の話を振られ、「表と裏で味が違う」という情報に驚く。知らなかったことに悔しがるも、好きな菓子なので笑顔を見せる。

highlights.title: 試合終盤の攻防とラピスの引き
highlights.description: お互いに残り体力が少ない中、響咲リオナはラピスを引き当て、勝利への大きなチャンスを掴む。

highlights.title: 渾身のラピス進化！
highlights.description: 渾身の大いなる魂天使・ラピスを進化させ、相手リーダーへの攻撃と盤面処理を同時に行う。勝利への決定打となるか。

highlights.title: 激戦の末、勝利
highlights.description: 接戦の末、相手がリタイアし勝利を収める響咲リオナ。安堵と喜びの表情を見せ、ランクC3を維持する。

highlights.title: 対ロイヤル戦開始とマリガン
highlights.description: 次のランクマッチはロイヤルと対戦。マリガン（手札交換）で守護フォロワーを確保し、序盤の盤面を固める戦略を立てる。

highlights.title: 相手の展開に苦戦
highlights.description: ロイヤルの素早い展開に押され、盤面を取られて苦戦する響咲リオナ。守護フォロワーで耐えつつ反撃の機会を伺う。

highlights.title: 天の守護神・アイテールで逆転狙う
highlights.description: 不利な盤面を打開するため、天の守護神・アイテールをプレイ。フォロワーに守護とオーラを付与し、盤面の強化を図る。

highlights.title: 純白の聖女・ジャンヌの活躍
highlights.description: 純白の聖女・ジャンヌをプレイし、相手フォロワーを一掃。強力な盤面リセットで逆転の足がかりを築く。

highlights.title: 激戦の末、敗北
highlights.description: 惜しくも勝利には届かず、ロイヤルとの激戦に敗北。悔しさを滲ませるも、次への意欲を見せる。

highlights.title: ロイヤル戦の終盤、体力1からの粘り
highlights.description: 体力わずか3まで追い込まれながらも、プリンやベルエンジェル・リア、オーディン、アイテールなどのカードで粘り強く耐え続ける。相手の猛攻は続くが、響咲リオナも必死に盤面を立て直そうと奮闘する。

highlights.title: 最後の抵抗と惜敗
highlights.description: 体力1まで追い込まれ、ベルエンジェル・リアと残りのカードで最後の抵抗を試みるが、相手のリーサルが決まり敗北。悔しさをにじませた表情を見せる。

overview_en.summary: Hololive DEV_IS's Riona Kyoou held a practice stream for the Shadowverse: World Beyond tournament. Despite having only played Shadowverse for 10 days, she challenged ranked matches in preparation for the CR Cup main event scheduled for tomorrow. At the beginning of the stream, she comically restarted her greeting after realizing she was muted. In her first match, using a Haven deck (Guardian Bishop), she engaged in intense back-and-forth combat, struggling against the opponent's fierce attacks but diligently trying to rebuild her board. However, she ultimately lost due to not knowing the deck-out rule. She also struggled and lost in the subsequent Nemesis match due to powerful combos, but she continued to challenge ranked matches with renewed spirit. At times, she showed great excitement for dramatic victories, and at other times, she struggled in long, drawn-out battles, all while deepening her interaction with viewers through serious yet humorous reactions. In the Royal match, despite having very low health, her tenacious fight using Ward followers and board-clearing cards against the opponent's relentless assault was particularly memorable. Overall, it was a stream where she actively communicated with viewers, sharing the depth of the game and her own growth.
overview_en.mood: The beginning was relaxed, followed by serious gameplay, but with an approachable atmosphere where she openly expressed frustration even after defeats. Moments of great excitement for dramatic victories and struggles in long, drawn-out battles alternated, showing humorous reactions even amidst high concentration.

highlights_en.title: Restarting greeting after realizing she was muted
highlights_en.description: After the stream began, Riona Kyoou greeted viewers without realizing she was muted. Noticing it from viewers' comments, she hastily restarted her greeting. Her frustration at having been silent was endearing.

highlights_en.title: Enthusiasm for her first Shadowverse CR Cup
highlights_en.description: She announced her first participation in the Shadowverse CR Cup, which will be held tomorrow. She revealed that she's only played Shadowverse for 10 days and couldn't practice yesterday due to oversleeping, but emphasized that she's well-rested and her mind is sharp.

highlights_en.title: Receiving achievement rewards and regret
highlights_en.description: She received Rupies as an in-game achievement reward. While happy about the large amount of Rupies, she also expressed regret, wishing she had slept more.

highlights_en.title: Ranked match starts - Challenging with Haven (Guardian Bishop)
highlights_en.description: She declared her challenge to a ranked match and revealed her deck to be 'Haven (Guardian Bishop)'. She expressed her determination to do her best, even if there might be misplays.

highlights_en.title: Reporting return to Sapphire rank
highlights_en.description: She reported that she had dropped to Ruby rank in yesterday's ranked match but has now returned to Sapphire rank. She mentioned the possibility of dropping again during the stream, showing a tense and focused demeanor.

highlights_en.title: Ranked match 1 begins - Mirror match
highlights_en.description: Her opponent in the ranked match also used a Bishop (Haven) deck, resulting in a mirror match. As the first or second turn was decided, Riona Kyoou once again showed her determination to win.

highlights_en.title: Playing Heretical Idol
highlights_en.description: Early in the match, she played the 1-cost Heretical Idol to cycle through her deck.

highlights_en.title: Showing panic at opponent's attack
highlights_en.description: The opponent played a card that dealt damage to her leader, causing Riona Kyoou to show panic. She then proceeded to deploy Ward followers to protect her board.

highlights_en.title: Board wipe with Grimnir
highlights_en.description: In a disadvantageous board state, she successfully played Grimnir, clearing all of the opponent's followers.

highlights_en.title: Lapis appears and a chance to heal
highlights_en.description: In a tough board state, she was happy to draw Great Soul-Angel Lapis, aiming for board recovery and destruction of opponent's followers. However, the opponent's interference prevented the healing.

highlights_en.title: Offense and defense with Holy Flame Tiger
highlights_en.description: She played Holy Flame Tiger. While dealing damage to the opponent's followers, she tried to gain a board advantage.

highlights_en.title: Ranked match 1 defeat
highlights_en.description: Unable to withstand the opponent's relentless assault, she lost the first match. Riona Kyoou was speechless, seemingly due to frustration.

highlights_en.title: Ranked match 2 begins - Mirror match again
highlights_en.description: She challenged a ranked match again in quick succession. Once again, her opponent was also a Bishop (Haven) player, resulting in another mirror match.

highlights_en.title: Early game Ward follower deployment
highlights_en.description: In the early game, she solidified her board primarily with Ward followers like Bellringer Angel Ria and Peaceful Church. The opponent also deployed Ward followers.

highlights_en.title: Board clear with Grimnir
highlights_en.description: She played Grimnir, dealing damage to all of the opponent's followers on the board. She tried to reset the board and gain an advantage.

highlights_en.title: Vanishing opponent's follower with Odin
highlights_en.description: She played Odin, Fated Grand Sage, banishing the opponent's follower with the highest attack. She aimed for a chance to gain a board advantage.

highlights_en.title: Strengthening board with Aether
highlights_en.description: She played Aether, Goddess of the Heavens, granting Ward and Aura (untargetable ability) to all her followers. She further solidified her board.

highlights_en.title: Destroying opponent's board with Jeanne
highlights_en.description: She played Jeanne, the Purewhite Saint, dealing damage to all of the opponent's followers on the board. She tried to gain a board advantage.

highlights_en.title: Healing with Saleph, God of the Waters
highlights_en.description: She played Saleph, God of the Waters, healing her own leader. At the same time, she dealt damage to all of the opponent's followers.

highlights_en.title: Offensive with Holy Flame Tiger
highlights_en.description: She played Holy Flame Tiger, dealing damage to the opponent's leader. She also destroyed opponent's followers, gaining a board advantage.

highlights_en.title: Defeat from a desperate situation
highlights_en.description: The opponent deployed a large number of followers, pushing her into a desperate situation. She was defeated, and Riona Kyoou let out a scream, unable to hide her frustration.

highlights_en.title: Late game offense and defense in Ranked Match 2
highlights_en.description: While enduring the opponent's attacks, she continued to attack while rebuilding her board with cards like Saleph, Aether, and Holy Flame Tiger. She played Odin, but the option to banish the 'Church' was not displayed, leading her to exclaim, 'Why?!' in confusion.

highlights_en.title: Screaming at a deck-out defeat
highlights_en.description: Unaware of the rule of losing by deck-out (library out), she screamed at the unexpected turn of events, showing her frustration. As viewers commented 'provoked win,' she yelled 'Stop!' and forcibly ended the battle.

highlights_en.title: Exploding with joy at an unexpected comeback victory
highlights_en.description: Although she was unaware of the deck-out rule, the unexpected word 'WIN' appeared due to her opponent's surrender, and she clapped with surprise and joy, exclaiming 'What?!' She also confirmed her promotion to Rank C3.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude to opponent and starting next match
highlights_en.description: Realizing her opponent surrendered, she expressed her gratitude by saying 'Thank you very much.' After that, she started the next ranked match and was matched against Nemesis.

highlights_en.title: BGM and SE volume adjustment
highlights_en.description: She adjusted the in-game BGM and sound effect (SE) volumes, reconfiguring them to be easier to hear.

highlights_en.title: Nemesis match, early game offense and defense
highlights_en.description: She started a ranked match against Nemesis. The early game saw a monotonous back-and-forth, primarily playing Ward followers like Bellringer Angel Ria, Peaceful Church, and Maid Angel Cheretta. The opponent developed their board with Orchis and Artifacts.

highlights_en.title: Defeat by a powerful combo
highlights_en.description: She lost due to powerful combos from the opponent, such as 'Destroy Artifact', 'Mino, Screaming Otherworlder', and 'Mischievous Lesser Mummy', which destroyed her board and dealt significant damage to her leader. She keenly felt her lack of game knowledge and openly expressed her frustration.

highlights_en.title: Excitement over the remark 'Attack when you can!'
highlights_en.description: During the match, despite being flustered by the opponent's actions, she exclaimed, 'Attack when you can!', which livened up the comment section. It was a moment that showed Riona Kyoou's strong will.

highlights_en.title: Riona's Japanese becomes incoherent
highlights_en.description: Riona Kyoou became so focused during the game that she started losing track of what she was saying. Viewers pointed out that her 'Japanese was incoherent,' and she looked embarrassed.

highlights_en.title: Choice between Wilbert and Odin
highlights_en.description: To gain a board advantage, she pondered whether to play Wilbert or Odin. She ultimately chose to play Odin to destroy an opponent's follower.

highlights_en.title: Consecutive plays of Silvia and Lapis
highlights_en.description: She consecutively played Silvia, Condemner of the Miniature Garden and Great Soul-Angel Lapis from her hand. She strengthened her board while destroying opponent's followers and healing her own leader.

highlights_en.title: Board clear with Odin again
highlights_en.description: She played Odin, Fated Grand Sage again. She cleared all of the opponent's followers on the board, creating an advantageous situation.

highlights_en.title: Excitement over the topic of 'Yuki no Yado'
highlights_en.description: A viewer brought up 'Yuki no Yado' (a type of rice cracker), and she was surprised by the information that 'the front and back have different flavors.' Although she regretted not knowing, she smiled as it was her favorite snack.

highlights_en.title: Late game offense and defense and drawing Lapis
highlights_en.description: With both players low on health, Riona Kyoou drew Lapis, seizing a big chance for victory.

highlights_en.title: Lapis's full-power evolution!
highlights_en.description: She evolved the full-power Great Soul-Angel Lapis, simultaneously attacking the opponent's leader and clearing the board. Will this be the decisive blow for victory?

highlights_en.title: Victory after a fierce battle
highlights_en.description: After a close match, her opponent surrendered, and Riona Kyoou claimed victory. She showed expressions of relief and joy, maintaining her Rank C3.

highlights_en.title: Royal match begins and mulligan
highlights_en.description: The next ranked match was against Royal. She planned a strategy to secure Ward followers during the mulligan (hand exchange) to solidify her board in the early game.

highlights_en.title: Struggling against opponent's development
highlights_en.description: Riona Kyoou struggled, pushed back by Royal's rapid board development. She endured with Ward followers while looking for an opportunity to counterattack.

highlights_en.title: Aiming for a comeback with Aether, Goddess of the Heavens
highlights_en.description: To break through the disadvantageous board state, she played Aether, Goddess of the Heavens. She granted Ward and Aura to her followers, aiming to strengthen her board.

highlights_en.title: Jeanne, the Purewhite Saint's activity
highlights_en.description: She played Jeanne, the Purewhite Saint, sweeping away the opponent's followers. She established a foothold for a comeback with a powerful board reset.

highlights_en.title: Defeat after a fierce battle
highlights_en.description: She narrowly missed victory, suffering a defeat in a fierce battle against Royal. Though she showed frustration, she also displayed eagerness for the next game.

highlights_en.title: Late game of Royal match, tenacious fight from 1 health
highlights_en.description: Even when pushed to just 3 health, she persistently endured with cards like Pudding, Bellringer Angel Ria, Odin, and Aether. The opponent's relentless assault continued, but Riona Kyoou also desperately fought to rebuild her board.

highlights_en.title: Last stand and narrow defeat
highlights_en.description: Pushed to 1 health, she attempted a last stand with Bellringer Angel Ria and her remaining cards, but the opponent secured lethal and she lost. She showed a face filled with frustration.

title: 【雑談】ラミィとちょっとお話ししない？【雪花ラミィ/ホロライブ】

overview.summary: 雪花ラミィによる急遽始まった雑談配信。急遽開始の理由説明から始まり、昨日のホロライブ全体ライブの感想、自身もいつかソロライブをやりたいという願望、さらにディナーショーや屋外バーベキューといったリアルイベントのアイデアまで幅広く話しました。ゾンビ映画やゲーム、お盆休み中の過ごし方など、様々な話題でリスナーと交流し、ホロライブメンバーのゾンビ耐性について深く考察しました。配信後半では、ラミィ独自の目玉焼きの食べ方や夏のフルーツ談義といった日常の話題で盛り上がり、新曲「酔っぱらミュージック」の告知や5周年記念グッズの紹介も行われました。終始和やかな雰囲気で、リスナーとの活発なコミュニケーションが印象的な配信でした。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気

highlights.title: 急遽雑談枠開始の挨拶
highlights.description: 眠すぎて夜9時からの配信が無理だったため、急遽6時から雑談枠を始めたことを説明。9時からはホロサマのマイクラ建築手伝いがあるとのこと。

highlights.title: マイクラのクラッシュ問題解決
highlights.description: 以前マイクラがクラッシュして入れなかったが、今回運営の協力でギリギリまで設定を詰めてもらい、別ルートでログインできるようになり解決したことを報告。

highlights.title: 今日の配信は短めに
highlights.description: 朝8時過ぎに起きてから昼寝なしで起きており、夜のホロサマ手伝いに備えて眠気対策として今日の配信は早めに切り上げることを示唆。

highlights.title: お昼ご飯の紹介
highlights.description: お昼ご飯はセブンイレブンのミートソーススパゲッティを食べたと話す。

highlights.title: かなたのソロライブ感想
highlights.description: 昨日のかなたのライブが最高だったと熱く語る。感情移入しすぎて号泣したエピソードを披露し、ホロメンのライブの素晴らしさを力説。

highlights.title: 将来のソロライブ願望とアイデア
highlights.description: 自身もいつかソロライブを実現したいと語り、ディナーショーや屋外バーベキュー、漫才ライブやトークショー形式など、様々なイベント形式のアイデアを話す。

highlights.title: 世間のお盆休みと自身の過ごし方
highlights.description: 世間がお盆休みで連休が多いことに触れ、自身は連休でも仕事や配信で忙しく、休み中はひたすら寝て過ごしたい願望を語る。

highlights.title: ゾンビものへの愛と考察
highlights.description: ウォーキング・デッドなどのゾンビ映画やゲームが好きだと語り、ゾンビが出現する世界でのサバイバル戦略や武器選びについて熱く考察する。

highlights.title: ホロメンのゾンビ耐性考察
highlights.description: ホロライブメンバーがゾンビのいる世界でどう生き残るかについて考察。特に自身は真っ先にやられるタイプだと予想し、誰が強くて生き残れそうか議論する。

highlights.title: ホロメンのゾンビ耐性考察（続き）
highlights.description: 視聴者から寄せられたホロメンのゾンビ耐性について議論を継続。シシロン、スバル、アヤメ先輩、いろはちゃん、キアラ、ロボ子先輩、ころね、フブキ、ミオ、船長（マリン）、すいちゃん、ラプラスなど、各メンバーの強みと弱みを交えて考察する。

highlights.title: ラミィと雪民のゾンビサバイバル
highlights.description: ラミィが雪民を守ると言いつつ、雪民がラミィを裏切らないと信じていることへのツッコミが入り、ラミィが雪民に守られるシチュエーションを語る。ゾンビになったら家で過ごすというリスナーの意見に共感。

highlights.title: 先輩メンバーへの逆凸企画アイデア
highlights.description: ホロメンが増えたことに触発され、先輩メンバー全員への逆凸企画を思いつく。YAGOOへの逆凸を妄想し、パンツの色や年収など際どい質問をしたいと話すが、連絡先が分からないため断念。

highlights.title: ラミィ流目玉焼きの食べ方
highlights.description: 話題が目玉焼きに移行し、ラミィが目玉焼きに塩コショウと醤油の両方をかけるという独特の食べ方を紹介。リスナーからの驚きのコメントに、実家ではそれが常識だったと説明。

highlights.title: 夏のフルーツ談義
highlights.description: 健康トークからフルーツの話題へ。夏はスイカを食べたくなると話し、一玉丸ごと買ったエピソードを披露。バナナやイチゴ、メロン、シャインマスカットなど、好きなフルーツについて語る。

highlights.title: 新曲「酔っぱらミュージック」告知
highlights.description: ラミィの新しいオリジナル曲「酔っぱらミュージック」がリリースされたことを告知。オープニングでも流れている楽曲で、ぜひ聞いてほしいと呼びかける。

highlights.title: 活動5周年記念グッズ紹介
highlights.description: 活動5周年記念グッズの紹介。ラバーキーホルダー、ラバーマット、カードスリーブ、リュックサックの4種で、最も売れているのはランダムのラバーキーホルダー。デザインや実用性について言及する。

highlights.title: 配信終了の挨拶
highlights.description: 配信がまもなく終了することを告げ、視聴者への感謝を述べる。この後はシャワーを浴び、21時から始まる獅白ぼたんのホロサマ企画を視聴する予定を話す。最後に視聴者へ「おつらみ」で締めくくった。

overview_en.summary: An impromptu chat stream by Yukihana Lamy. It began with an explanation for the sudden start, followed by her impressions of yesterday's Hololive all-member live concert, her desire to hold a solo live concert herself someday, and a wide range of ideas for real-life events such as dinner shows and outdoor barbecues. She interacted with viewers on various topics, including zombie movies and games, and how she spends her Obon holiday, deeply discussing Hololive members' zombie resistance. In the latter half of the stream, daily topics like Lamy's unique way of eating fried eggs and a discussion about summer fruits livened things up. Announcements for her new song 'Yoppara Music' and the introduction of 5th-anniversary merchandise were also made. The stream maintained a gentle atmosphere throughout, characterized by lively communication with her viewers.
overview_en.mood: Gentle atmosphere throughout

highlights_en.title: Greeting for the sudden start of the chat stream
highlights_en.description: Explained that she was too sleepy to stream from 9 PM, so she urgently started a chat stream at 6 PM. She mentioned she has to help with HoloSummer's Minecraft building from 9 PM.

highlights_en.title: Minecraft crash issue resolved
highlights_en.description: Reported that Minecraft used to crash and prevent her from joining, but this time, with the staff's cooperation, settings were optimized to the very last minute, allowing her to log in via an alternative route, thus resolving the issue.

highlights_en.title: Today's stream will be shorter
highlights_en.description: Indicated that she has been awake since getting up past 8 AM without a nap and will end today's stream early as a countermeasure against sleepiness, in preparation for helping with HoloSummer tonight.

highlights_en.title: Introduction of lunch
highlights_en.description: Talked about eating Seven-Eleven's meat sauce spaghetti for lunch.

highlights_en.title: Kanata's solo concert impressions
highlights_en.description: Enthusiastically spoke about how amazing Kanata's concert was yesterday. Shared an anecdote of crying profusely due to being too emotionally invested, emphasizing the greatness of Holomembers' concerts.

highlights_en.title: Future solo concert aspirations and ideas
highlights_en.description: Spoke about her desire to hold a solo concert someday, and shared various event format ideas, such as dinner shows, outdoor barbecues, manzai (comedy) live shows, and talk show formats.

highlights_en.title: Public Obon holiday and her way of spending it
highlights_en.description: Mentioned that the public has many consecutive holidays due to Obon, and expressed her desire to spend her own holidays just sleeping, as she's busy with work and streaming even during long breaks.

highlights_en.title: Love for zombie media and analysis
highlights_en.description: Talked about her love for zombie movies and games like The Walking Dead, and enthusiastically discussed survival strategies and weapon choices in a world overrun by zombies.

highlights_en.title: Analysis of Holomembers' zombie resistance
highlights_en.description: Discussed how Hololive members would survive in a zombie-infested world. She predicted that she would be among the first to be taken down and debated who would be strong enough to survive.

highlights_en.title: Analysis of Holomembers' zombie resistance (continued)
highlights_en.description: Continued the discussion on Holomembers' zombie resistance based on comments from viewers. Analyzed each member's strengths and weaknesses, including Shishiron, Subaru, Ayame-senpai, Iroha-chan, Kiara, Roboco-senpai, Korone, Fubuki, Mio, Captain (Marine), Suichan, and Laplus.

highlights_en.title: Lamy and Yukimin's zombie survival
highlights_en.description: After Lamy stated she would protect the Yukimin, comments pointed out her belief that the Yukimin wouldn't betray her, leading Lamy to describe a situation where she'd be protected by the Yukimin. She empathized with a viewer's opinion of staying home if they turned into a zombie.

highlights_en.title: Idea for a surprise call-in project to senior members
highlights_en.description: Inspired by the increase in Holomembers, she came up with an idea for a surprise call-in project to all senior members. She fantasized about making a surprise call to YAGOO and asking him provocative questions like the color of his underwear or his annual income, but gave up as she doesn't have his contact information.

highlights_en.title: Lamy's way of eating fried eggs
highlights_en.description: The topic shifted to fried eggs, and Lamy introduced her unique way of eating them: adding both salt and pepper and soy sauce. In response to surprised comments from viewers, she explained that it was common practice in her family home.

highlights_en.title: Summer fruit discussion
highlights_en.description: The conversation moved from health to fruits. She talked about wanting to eat watermelon in summer and shared an episode of buying an entire one. She also discussed her favorite fruits, including bananas, strawberries, melons, and Shine Muscat grapes.

highlights_en.title: New song 'Yoppara Music' announcement
highlights_en.description: Announced the release of Lamy's new original song 'Yoppara Music'. She urged listeners to check out the song, which was also played in the opening.

highlights_en.title: 5th Anniversary merchandise introduction
highlights_en.description: Introduced 5th-anniversary merchandise. There are four types: rubber keyholders, rubber mats, card sleeves, and backpacks, with the random rubber keyholders being the best-seller. She mentioned their design and practicality.

highlights_en.title: Stream ending greetings
highlights_en.description: Announced that the stream would soon end and thanked viewers. She then mentioned her plans to take a shower and watch Shishiro Botan's HoloSummer project starting at 9 PM. She concluded by saying 'Otsu-Lamy' to her viewers.

title: 【バレずに夜ふかし】バレるかバレないかギリギリのスリル味わってみる？【ホロライブ/癒月ちょこ】

overview.summary: ホロライブ所属の癒月ちょこが「バレずに夜ふかし」をプレイする配信です。夜ふかしの先生に扮したちょこ先生が、寝ている人に見つからないよう行動するスリル満点のゲームに挑戦。時にはSっ気のある声で視聴者を煽りつつ、患者や学生、会社員など様々なキャラクターに見つからないよう奮闘します。予測不能な見回りや、時に失敗してしまうちょこ先生のコミカルなリアクションが楽しめる配信です。最終的には念願の55秒切りを達成し、高評価を獲得。ゲームの楽しさや多人数プレイの可能性についても触れながら、賑やかに締めくくります。
overview.mood: スリルがありつつも、終始可愛らしくコミカルな雰囲気で、最後は達成感とゲームへの高評価に包まれる

highlights.title: 配信開始前の自己紹介と癒月ちょこの声遊び
highlights.description: 配信開始前の待機画面で、癒月ちょこがASMR風の甘い声やSっ気のある声で視聴者に語りかけ、ゲーム開始前から期待感を高めます。先生のような口調で視聴者を煽る場面も。

highlights.title: ゲーム「バレずに夜ふかし」開始とゲーム内容の説明
highlights.description: 癒月ちょこが「バレずに夜ふかし」ゲームを開始。ゲームの基本的なルールとして、寝ている人に見つからずに様々な行動をしてスコアを稼ぐという内容を説明します。

highlights.title: 1ステージ目：病院での夜ふかしと看護師からの怒り
highlights.description: 病院のステージで、患者を起こさないようにアイテムを使用したり叩いたりしてスコアを稼ぎます。しかし、看護師に見つかってしまい、怒られるコミカルな一幕があります。

highlights.title: 2ステージ目：寺での隠密行動と和尚の鋭い目
highlights.description: 寺のステージに移動。ここでは和尚の見回りが特徴で、見つからないように布団に隠れて寝たふりをする戦略がとられます。見つかると減点されてしまいます。

highlights.title: 3ステージ目：学校での先生との攻防
highlights.description: 学校のステージで、授業中に居眠りをしている先生に見つからないように、机の引き出しを漁ったり、物を食べたりします。先生が画面外から突然現れることに注意を払います。

highlights.title: 4ステージ目：キャンプ場でのクマの脅威
highlights.description: キャンプ場のステージ。ここではクマがテントの見回りをしています。リュックサックを漁ったりしてポイントを稼ぎますが、クマに見つかるとマイナスポイントになります。

highlights.title: 5ステージ目：オフィスでの上司との駆け引き
highlights.description: オフィスのステージ。会社員（上司）に見つからないようにパソコンを触ったり、物を食べたりします。ちょこ先生の巧みな隠密行動が見られます。

highlights.title: 6ステージ目：再度の病院ステージでスキルアップ
highlights.description: 再び病院のステージへ。以前の失敗を活かし、看護師の動きをよく見て隠密行動を試みます。序盤よりスムーズな動きを見せるちょこ先生。

highlights.title: 7ステージ目：寺での熟練された隠れ術
highlights.description: 再び寺のステージ。和尚の動きを予測し、より洗練された方法で布団に隠れる技術を披露します。

highlights.title: 8ステージ目：学校での大胆不敵な夜ふかし
highlights.description: 再び学校のステージ。先生の監視の目をかいくぐり、より大胆な行動で高得点を狙います。見つかるリスクも高まり、スリルが増します。

highlights.title: 9ステージ目：キャンプ場でのクマとの遭遇戦
highlights.description: 再びキャンプ場のステージ。クマの巡回パターンを見極めながら、アイテム漁りを行います。ギリギリのところでクマを回避する場面も。

highlights.title: 10ステージ目：オフィスでの最終決戦
highlights.description: 再びオフィスのステージ。最終ラウンドに向けて、これまでの経験を活かし、会社員にバレずに最大限のスコアを目指します。

highlights.title: 最終ステージ：病院での思わぬ結末
highlights.description: 病院のステージで、ゲームの最終局面を迎えます。緊張感が高まる中、看護師に最後の夜ふかし行動がバレてしまい、ゲームが終了します。

highlights.title: 最終ステージ結果発表と「才人」評価獲得
highlights.description: 今回プレイした病院ステージのスコアが0:55.18を記録し、「才人」の評価を獲得。ハイアスコアを更新し、オンラインランキングでは39位にランクインした。

highlights.title: 病院ステージ再挑戦とギリギリのフィニッシュ
highlights.description: ちょこ先生が病院ステージに再挑戦。見回りの看護師の動きを慎重に読みながら患者を叩いてスコアを稼ぐ。終盤にボタン操作の不具合に見舞われながらも、ギリギリのところでフィニッシュする。

highlights.title: 55秒切り達成！「熟人」評価とローカルランキング1位獲得
highlights.description: 病院ステージの再挑戦でスコアが0:54.75を記録し、「熟人」評価にランクアップ。念願の55秒切りを達成し、ローカルランキングで1位を獲得したことに喜びの声をあげる。

highlights.title: キャンプ場ステージ再挑戦とボタン操作トラブル
highlights.description: キャンプ場ステージに再挑戦。クマの巡回パターンを予測し、隠密行動でスコアを稼ごうと奮闘するが、途中でボタンが効かなくなるトラブルに見舞われ、クマに見つかってしまう。

highlights.title: 寺ステージ再挑戦と惜敗
highlights.description: 寺ステージに再挑戦し、和尚の動きを見ながら隠密行動を試みる。しかし、ここでもボタン操作の不具合が発生し、和尚に見つかりゲームオーバーとなる。

highlights.title: ゲーム「バレずに夜ふかし」の紹介と魅力解説
highlights.description: ゲームの対戦モードやCPUの強さ変更機能など、様々な魅力を紹介。コントローラーが推奨だが、自身はキーボードでプレイしたことを明かす。500円という手頃な価格もアピール。

highlights.title: 配信エンディングと視聴者への感謝
highlights.description: 配信のエンディングに入り、視聴者への感謝を伝える。今回のゲリラ配信について触れつつ、ゲームのシンプルさや意外な難しさ、そして面白さについて語り、ゆっくり休むよう促して配信を締めくくる。

overview_en.summary: This is a stream where Yuzuki Choco from Hololive plays 'Don't Get Caught Staying Up Late'. Choco-sensei, disguised as a late-night teacher, takes on a thrilling game where she must act without being discovered by sleeping people. Sometimes, she teases viewers with a slightly sadistic voice, while struggling to avoid various characters like patients, students, and office workers. This stream offers unpredictable patrols and Choco-sensei's comical reactions when she sometimes fails. Ultimately, she achieves her long-cherished goal of clearing the game under 55 seconds and receives high praise. The stream concludes lively, touching upon the game's enjoyment and the possibilities for multiplayer.
overview_en.mood: Thrilling yet consistently cute and comical, ending with a sense of accomplishment and high praise for the game.

highlights_en.title: Self-introduction before the stream starts and Yuzuki Choco's voice play
highlights_en.description: On the waiting screen before the stream begins, Yuzuki Choco addresses viewers with an ASMR-like sweet voice and a slightly sadistic tone, building anticipation even before the game starts. There are also moments where she teases viewers with a teacher-like demeanor.

highlights_en.title: Game 'Don't Get Caught Staying Up Late' starts and game content explanation
highlights_en.description: Yuzuki Choco starts the game 'Don't Get Caught Staying Up Late'. She explains the basic rules of the game: earn scores by performing various actions without being discovered by sleeping people.

highlights_en.title: Stage 1: Staying up late in a hospital and anger from the nurse
highlights_en.description: In the hospital stage, she uses or hits items to earn scores without waking up patients. However, she gets caught by the nurse, leading to a comical scolding.

highlights_en.title: Stage 2: Stealth action in a temple and the sharp eyes of the monk
highlights_en.description: Moves to the temple stage. Here, the monk's patrol is a key feature, and the strategy is to hide in a futon and pretend to be asleep to avoid being found. Getting caught results in a score penalty.

highlights_en.title: Stage 3: Offense and defense with the teacher at school
highlights_en.description: In the school stage, she rummages through desk drawers and eats things without being caught by the teacher who is dozing during class. She pays attention to the teacher suddenly appearing from off-screen.

highlights_en.title: Stage 4: The threat of bears at the campsite
highlights_en.description: The campsite stage. Here, bears are patrolling the tents. She earns points by rummaging through backpacks, but getting caught by a bear results in negative points.

highlights_en.title: Stage 5: Dealing with the boss in the office
highlights_en.description: The office stage. She interacts with computers and eats things without being caught by the office worker (boss). Choco-sensei's skillful stealth actions can be seen.

highlights_en.title: Stage 6: Skill improvement in the hospital stage again
highlights_en.description: Back to the hospital stage. Learning from previous failures, she carefully observes the nurse's movements and attempts stealth actions. Choco-sensei shows smoother movements than in the early stages.

highlights_en.title: Stage 7: Masterful hiding techniques in the temple
highlights_en.description: Back to the temple stage. She predicts the monk's movements and demonstrates more refined techniques for hiding in the futon.

highlights_en.title: Stage 8: Fearless late-night antics at school
highlights_en.description: Back to the school stage. She evades the teacher's watchful eyes and aims for high scores with bolder actions. The risk of being caught also increases, adding to the thrill.

highlights_en.title: Stage 9: Encounter battle with a bear at the campsite
highlights_en.description: Back to the campsite stage. She scavenges for items while discerning the bear's patrol patterns. There are also moments where she narrowly avoids the bear.

highlights_en.title: Stage 10: Final battle in the office
highlights_en.description: Back to the office stage. Heading into the final round, she utilizes her past experience to aim for the maximum score without being caught by the office worker.

highlights_en.title: Final Stage: Unexpected outcome in the hospital
highlights_en.description: In the hospital stage, the game reaches its climax. As tension builds, her final late-night action is discovered by the nurse, ending the game.

highlights_en.title: Final stage results announcement and 'Talented Person' rating acquisition
highlights_en.description: The score for the hospital stage played this time was 0:55.18, earning the 'Talented Person' rating. She updated her high score and ranked 39th in the online rankings.

highlights_en.title: Hospital stage re-challenge and a narrow finish
highlights_en.description: Choco-sensei re-challenges the hospital stage. She carefully observes the patrolling nurse's movements while hitting patients to earn scores. Despite encountering button operation issues near the end, she manages to finish just in time.

highlights_en.title: Achieved under 55 seconds! 'Master' rating and 1st place in local ranking
highlights_en.description: In the re-challenge of the hospital stage, she recorded a score of 0:54.75, upgrading to the 'Master' rating. She expresses joy at achieving her long-awaited sub-55-second clear and securing 1st place in the local ranking.

highlights_en.title: Campsite stage re-challenge and button operation trouble
highlights_en.description: She re-challenges the campsite stage. She struggles to predict the bear's patrol patterns and earn scores through stealth, but halfway through, she encounters a button malfunction and gets caught by the bear.

highlights_en.title: Temple stage re-challenge and a close defeat
highlights_en.description: She re-challenges the temple stage, attempting stealth actions while observing the monk's movements. However, a button malfunction occurs here as well, leading to her being discovered by the monk and a game over.

highlights_en.title: Introduction and appeal explanation of the game 'Don't Get Caught Staying Up Late'
highlights_en.description: She introduces various appealing features of the game, such as the versus mode and the ability to change CPU strength. She reveals that while a controller is recommended, she played with a keyboard. She also highlights its affordable price of 500 yen.

highlights_en.title: Stream ending and thanks to viewers
highlights_en.description: Entering the stream's ending, she expresses gratitude to her viewers. She touches upon this spontaneous stream, discusses the game's simplicity, unexpected difficulty, and fun, then encourages viewers to get some rest before concluding the broadcast.

title: 【#リグと乾杯 】来月で2周年ってまじ！？！？な飲み会配信【一条莉々華/儒烏風亭らでん/音乃瀬奏/轟はじめ 】

overview.summary: 来月で2周年を迎えるホロライブReGLOSSの一条莉々華、儒烏風亭らでん、音乃瀬奏、轟はじめの4人が集まり、ピザやお酒を楽しみながら、ゆるゆる飲み会配信を実施。これまでの活動やプライベートのエピソード、メンバー間の仲良しトークで大いに盛り上がる。終盤では、もし100万円が手に入ったら何に使うかという夢のある話題や、各メンバーのソロ楽曲、ReGLOSS全体の今後の活動について熱く語り、2周年への期待感を高めた。全員がそれぞれのペースでリラックスしながら、視聴者との交流も楽しむ和やかな配信。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、笑いの絶えない賑やかな配信

highlights.title: 配信開始とオープニング
highlights.description: 配信が始まり、一条莉々華、音乃瀬奏、轟はじめ、儒烏風亭らでんの4人が揃って元気に挨拶。配信のテーマが「ゆるゆる飲み会」であることが発表される。

highlights.title: メンバーの自己紹介
highlights.description: 改めてメンバー全員が自己紹介を行う。一条莉々華は酒飲みであることを公言し、配信への意気込みを語る。

highlights.title: 飲み物の選定と乾杯前のハプニング
highlights.description: マスカット酒、桃酒、ピオーネ酒など様々なお酒が用意され、メンバーがそれぞれ飲みたいお酒を選ぶ。莉々華が乾杯前に桃酒をうっかり飲んでしまい、一同爆笑する。

highlights.title: ピザパーティー開始と岡山の裏話
highlights.description: 飲み物だけでなくピザも用意されていることが発表され、メンバーが各自ピザを取る。らでんが岡山に行った際の裏話として、自分たちが桃太郎と犬・猿・雉の役だったと明かす。

highlights.title: ReGLOSS2周年と活動の振り返り
highlights.description: 来月で2周年を迎えることに驚きつつ、これまでの活動や成長について語り合う。轟はじめが岡山遠征の裏話を暴露し、メンバーにツッコミを入れられる。

highlights.title: メンバー間の連絡と返信ペース
highlights.description: メンバー間のLINEやDiscordでの連絡のやり取りのペースについて語り合う。それぞれの返信スタイルや、連絡頻度に関する考え方が明らかになる。

highlights.title: 箱根ガラスの森美術館の思い出
highlights.description: らでんが音声ガイドを担当した箱根ガラスの森美術館での思い出を語る。ガラス作品や風鈴の展示の美しさについて語り、メンバーもその魅力に耳を傾ける。

highlights.title: 配信前のエピソードとメンバーの個性
highlights.description: 配信前の裏話として、メンバー間で交わされたLINEのやり取りについて語る。返信の速さや内容から、それぞれの個性や関係性が垣間見える。

highlights.title: ReGLOSSの成長と3年目への期待
highlights.description: 1年目と2年目の活動の違いを振り返り、それぞれの成長を実感する。3年目に向けての抱負や、今後の活動への期待について語り合う。

highlights.title: 酔いが回ってきたメンバーたち
highlights.description: お酒が進み、メンバーの酔いが回ってきて、さらにトークがヒートアップ。普段見られない姿や面白い発言が飛び出す。

highlights.title: 配信中のハプニングと暴露話
highlights.description: 配信中に起きた小さなハプニングや、メンバー同士の暴露話で盛り上がる。普段の仲の良さが伝わる会話が続く。

highlights.title: 視聴者への感謝と締め
highlights.description: メンバーが視聴者への感謝を述べ、改めて2周年への思いを語る。和やかな雰囲気で配信の締めに入る。

highlights.title: マネージャーの飲酒注意と美術館デザート談義
highlights.description: 配信が後半に差し掛かり、マネージャーからの飲酒注意のポップアップにメンバーが「今日ぐらい良いだろ」と反発。らでんのマネージャーが両手でバイバイしてくれるエピソードで盛り上がる。その後、美術館で食べたスコーンやクロテッドクリームの美味しさについて語り、「ズコーン」ネタが生まれる。

highlights.title: 莉々華の驚きの食欲とらでんの空腹事情
highlights.description: 莉々華が美術館でメロンのシフォンケーキをペロリと平らげた話にメンバーが驚く。一方、らでんは夜ご飯のために胃を空けておいたため、美術館では何も食べていなかったことを明かし、メンバーを笑わせる。

highlights.title: ポーラ美術館の感動体験とニワトコの杖発見
highlights.description: らでんが音声ガイドを担当した箱根ガラスの森美術館だけでなく、ポーラ美術館での体験を語る。「ゴッホ・インパクト展」の作品の迫力や、遊歩道でニワトコの木を発見して盛り上がったことを振り返る。

highlights.title: ポムのモノマネ披露とリグロスの夢
highlights.description: らでんが突如、ポムのモノマネを披露しメンバーを爆笑させる。「ぽむぽむぷりん」のような声で話し続けるらでんに、メンバーは「似てる！」と大盛り上がり。その後、全員で現地でのライブがしたいという夢を語り合う。

highlights.title: メンバーの個人的な夢と挑戦したいこと
highlights.description: 各メンバーが「雲を食べてみたい」「スノーケリングしたい」「イルカに乗りたい」といった個人的な夢を語る。そして、リグロスとして「ピラミッドの頂点に登る」という大きな目標を掲げ、今後の活動への意欲を示す。

highlights.title: 配信の締めとリグロス全員でのライブへの期待
highlights.description: 配信終了の時間が近づき、メンバーは視聴者への感謝を述べつつ、改めてリグロス全員でのライブ実現への強い期待を語る。和やかな雰囲気の中で飲み会配信が締めくくられる。

highlights.title: 岡山土産の果実酒紹介
highlights.description: 岡山県産の「完熟とろける清水白桃酒」や「岡山フルーツの女王マスカット酒」などが紹介される。莉々華がマスカット酒の美味しさを「GO TO HEAVEN」と表現する。

highlights.title: 3D指スマ大会の夢
highlights.description: メンバー全員で3Dモデルで指スマ大会をしたいと盛り上がるが、らでんのボケが流されたり、足の指も使うという提案が出たりと自由な雰囲気に。賞金100万円の使い道で夢が膨らむ。

highlights.title: 100万円の夢の使い道
highlights.description: 100万円の賞金を手に入れた場合の使い道を語り合う。らでんは美術館の貸し切り、莉々華は高級食材の食べ比べ、奏は機材の購入、はじめはフリーチケットを望む。

highlights.title: 奏の歌声とReGLOSSソロシリーズ
highlights.description: 奏のオリジナル曲「パンダヒーロー」の話題から、そのイケメンボイスが絶賛される。ReGLOSSメンバー全員が参加するYouTube Music Weekendへの出演告知と、ソロシリーズ楽曲の紹介が行われる。

highlights.title: ReGLOSS2周年と未来への期待
highlights.description: 来月9月10日にReGLOSSが2周年を迎えることを改めて告知。YouTube Music Weekendへの参加も告知し、ReGLOSSソロシリーズの紹介とともに、今後の活躍に期待を込める。

overview_en.summary: Four members of hololive ReGLOSS—Ichijou Ririka, Juufuutei Raden, Otonose Kanade, and Todoki Hajime—who will celebrate their 2nd anniversary next month, gathered for a relaxed drinking party stream, enjoying pizza and alcohol. The stream was lively with discussions about their past activities, private anecdotes, and friendly chats among members. Towards the end, they enthusiastically discussed dreamy topics like what they would do with 1 million yen, each member's solo songs, and ReGLOSS's future activities, heightening anticipation for their 2nd anniversary. It was a peaceful stream where everyone relaxed at their own pace and enjoyed interacting with viewers.
overview_en.mood: A lively stream filled with laughter and a consistently harmonious atmosphere.

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Opening
highlights_en.description: The stream began with Ichijou Ririka, Otonose Kanade, Todoki Hajime, and Juufuutei Raden gathering and giving energetic greetings. The theme of the stream was announced as a 'relaxed drinking party.'

highlights_en.title: Member Self-Introductions
highlights_en.description: All members re-introduced themselves. Ichijou Ririka openly declared herself a drinker and spoke about her enthusiasm for the stream.

highlights_en.title: Drink Selection and Pre-Toast Incident
highlights_en.description: Various alcoholic beverages such as Muscat wine, peach wine, and Pione wine were prepared, and members each chose what they wanted to drink. Ririka accidentally drank some peach wine before the toast, causing everyone to burst into laughter.

highlights_en.title: Pizza Party Begins and Behind-the-Scenes from Okayama
highlights_en.description: It was announced that not only drinks but also pizza were prepared, and members each took a slice. Raden revealed a behind-the-scenes story from her trip to Okayama, saying they played the roles of Momotaro and his companions (dog, monkey, pheasant).

highlights_en.title: ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary and Activity Reflection
highlights_en.description: Surprised that their 2nd anniversary is next month, they discussed their past activities and growth. Todoki Hajime revealed a behind-the-scenes story from the Okayama expedition, getting tsukkomi (retorts) from the members.

highlights_en.title: Member Communication and Reply Pace
highlights_en.description: They discussed the pace of their communication on LINE and Discord. Each member's reply style and thoughts on communication frequency were revealed.

highlights_en.title: Memories of Hakone Glass no Mori Museum
highlights_en.description: Raden spoke about her memories at the Hakone Glass no Mori Museum, where she served as the audio guide. She talked about the beauty of the glass artworks and wind chime exhibits, and the members listened attentively to their charm.

highlights_en.title: Pre-Stream Episodes and Member Personalities
highlights_en.description: They shared behind-the-scenes stories from before the stream, discussing their LINE exchanges. The speed and content of their replies offered glimpses into their individual personalities and relationships.

highlights_en.title: ReGLOSS's Growth and Expectations for the 3rd Year
highlights_en.description: They reflected on the differences between their first and second years of activities, feeling their individual growth. They discussed their aspirations for the third year and their expectations for future activities.

highlights_en.title: Members Getting Tipsy
highlights_en.description: As the alcohol flowed, the members got tipsy, and the conversation heated up even more. Unseen sides and funny remarks emerged.

highlights_en.title: In-Stream Incidents and Revealing Stories
highlights_en.description: They got excited over small incidents that occurred during the stream and revealing stories about each other. The conversation continued, conveying their usual close bond.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude to Viewers and Closing
highlights_en.description: The members expressed gratitude to their viewers and reiterated their feelings about the 2nd anniversary. The stream entered its closing in a harmonious atmosphere.

highlights_en.title: Manager's Warning About Drinking and Museum Dessert Talk
highlights_en.description: As the stream entered its latter half, members retorted 'It's fine for today, isn't it?' to a pop-up warning about drinking from their manager. They got excited over an episode where Raden's manager waved goodbye with both hands. Afterwards, they discussed the deliciousness of scones and clotted cream they ate at the museum, giving birth to the 'Zukkon' gag.

highlights_en.title: Ririka's Surprising Appetite and Raden's Hunger Situation
highlights_en.description: Members were surprised by Ririka's story of effortlessly finishing a melon chiffon cake at the museum. Meanwhile, Raden revealed that she hadn't eaten anything at the museum because she had saved room for dinner, making the members laugh.

highlights_en.title: Moving Experience at Pola Museum and Discovery of Elder Wand
highlights_en.description: Raden spoke not only about her experience at the Hakone Glass no Mori Museum, where she was an audio guide, but also about her experience at the Pola Museum. She recalled the power of the artworks at the 'Van Gogh Impact Exhibition' and how excited they got discovering an elder tree on the promenade.

highlights_en.title: Pom's Impression and ReGLOSS's Dream
highlights_en.description: Raden suddenly performed an impression of Pom, making the members burst into laughter. The members were thrilled, exclaiming 'It's spot on!' as Raden continued to speak in a Pompompurin-like voice. Afterwards, they all discussed their shared dream of performing live in person.

highlights_en.title: Members' Personal Dreams and Things They Want to Try
highlights_en.description: Each member shared their personal dreams, such as 'I want to eat clouds,' 'I want to go snorkeling,' and 'I want to ride a dolphin.' Then, as ReGLOSS, they set a big goal of 'climbing to the top of a pyramid,' showing their enthusiasm for future activities.

highlights_en.title: Stream Closing and Anticipation for a Full ReGLOSS Live Concert
highlights_en.description: As the stream approached its end, the members expressed their gratitude to the viewers while reiterating their strong anticipation for a full ReGLOSS live concert. The drinking party stream concluded in a harmonious atmosphere.

highlights_en.title: Introducing Okayama Souvenir Fruit Wines
highlights_en.description: Okayama-produced 'Ripe and Melting Shimizu White Peach Wine' and 'Okayama Fruit Queen Muscat Wine' were introduced. Ririka described the deliciousness of the Muscat wine as 'GO TO HEAVEN.'

highlights_en.title: Dream of a 3D Finger Smashing Contest
highlights_en.description: The members got excited about wanting to hold a Finger Smashing Contest with 3D models, but Raden's jokes were brushed aside, and suggestions like using toe fingers came up, creating a free-spirited atmosphere. Dreams expanded around how to spend the 1 million yen prize money.

highlights_en.title: Dream Uses for 1 Million Yen
highlights_en.description: They discussed how they would spend the 1 million yen prize money if they received it. Raden wished to rent out a museum, Ririka wanted to compare high-end ingredients, Kanade wanted to buy equipment, and Hajime desired free tickets.

highlights_en.title: Kanade's Singing Voice and ReGLOSS Solo Series
highlights_en.description: From the topic of Kanade's original song 'Panda Hero,' her handsome voice was highly praised. An announcement was made about ReGLOSS members participating in YouTube Music Weekend, and their solo series songs were introduced.

highlights_en.title: ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary and Expectations for the Future
highlights_en.description: It was re-announced that ReGLOSS will celebrate its 2nd anniversary on September 10th next month. Their participation in YouTube Music Weekend was also announced, and along with the introduction of the ReGLOSS solo series, expectations for their future activities were expressed.

title: Triple Cutie Threats【Dark and Darker】

overview.summary: ホロライブIDのAnya MelfissaとVesytia Zetaをゲストに迎え、「Dark and Darker」をプレイする配信。3人組でダンジョン探索に挑み、度重なる敵との戦闘やトラップに苦戦しつつも、アイテム収集や装備の強化を試みます。Shioriはパーティーメンバーの度重なる死亡に嘆きながらも、自身は生き残ろうと奮闘します。度重なるゲームオーバーにもめげず、何度もキャラクターを変更してはダンジョンに再挑戦し、ついにはパーティー全員での脱出に成功する場面もありました。全体を通して、ゲームの奥深さとメンバーの楽しいやり取りが見どころです。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、メンバー間の仲の良さが伝わる。ゲームプレイでは苦戦しつつも、挑戦を楽しむ様子がうかがえる。

highlights.title: ゲーム開始と挨拶
highlights.description: 配信が始まり、ゲーム画面に切り替わると共にShioriとゲストのAnya Melfissa、Vesytia Zetaが挨拶を交わす。

highlights.title: Anya Melfissaの自己紹介
highlights.description: ホロライブID 2nd GenerationのAnya Melfissaが自己紹介を行う。

highlights.title: Vesytia Zetaの自己紹介
highlights.description: Vesytia Zetaが自己紹介を行う。ゲームプレイ経験について語る。

highlights.title: Shioriの自己紹介とゲーム経験
highlights.description: ホロライブのアーカイブ係であるShioriが自己紹介。ゲームの経験は数年前だが、ほとんど覚えていないと話す。

highlights.title: ゲームの明るさ設定に関する話題
highlights.description: ゲーム画面の明るさ設定について話が盛り上がり、Zetaがライトモードを使っているとShioriに指摘される。

highlights.title: チーム構成と戦略に関する議論
highlights.description: ローグ、アーチャー、クレリック（Zeta）というチーム構成で、今後の戦略について話し合う。

highlights.title: ダンジョン「The Goblin Caves」の選択とゲーム開始
highlights.description: ダンジョン選択画面で「The Goblin Caves」を選び、初めての冒険が始まる。ロード画面ではゲームのヒントが表示される。

highlights.title: ダンジョン探索開始とスケルトン戦
highlights.description: ダンジョンに到着し、最初の敵であるスケルトンに遭遇。Shioriが弓で攻撃しようとするが、弾薬がないことに気づく。

highlights.title: Shioriがトーチを拾う
highlights.description: Shioriが暗いダンジョンでトーチを発見し、視界を確保する。

highlights.title: ZetaによるShioriの回復とゴブリン遭遇
highlights.description: Zetaが負傷したShioriを回復。直後にゴブリンとスケルトンの集団に遭遇し、緊迫した状況になる。

highlights.title: ミミックとの遭遇とShioriの死亡
highlights.description: Shioriがチェストに近づくと、それがミミックであることが判明し、攻撃を受けて倒されてしまう。

highlights.title: ZetaによるShioriのポーション回収とAnyaとのやり取り
highlights.description: Zetaが倒れたShioriのポーションを回収。AnyaはZetaのパンチを受けて回復を妨害されたと文句を言う。

highlights.title: AnyaとShioriの論争、ゲームの難易度について
highlights.description: ゲームの難易度や親切さについてAnyaとShioriが冗談を交えながら口論する。

highlights.title: 最初のダンジョンからの脱出失敗
highlights.description: 時間切れが迫る中、Zetaが敵に倒され、Shioriは脱出に失敗。全員がゲームオーバーとなる。

highlights.title: ロビーに戻り、結果の確認と反省
highlights.description: ゲームオーバー後、ロビーに戻り今回の冒険の結果（キル数や戦利品）を確認し、反省点について話し合う。

highlights.title: 2回目のダンジョンスタート
highlights.description: 最初の失敗を教訓に、再びダンジョンへと出発。今回はVesytia Zetaの音声問題も解決している。

highlights.title: ゴブリンとの戦闘、ShioriがZetaにダメージを与えてしまう
highlights.description: ダンジョン内でゴブリンに遭遇し戦闘。ShioriがZetaに誤ってダメージを与えてしまい、ZetaはShioriのパンチで回復を中断されてしまう。

highlights.title: ゴブリンシャーマンを倒す
highlights.description: ShioriとZetaの連携でゴブリンシャーマンを撃破。周囲の敵を一層する。

highlights.title: Giant Centipedeと戦闘、毒ダメージ
highlights.description: 巨大なムカデのようなモンスターに遭遇。攻撃を受けてShioriは毒ダメージを負う。

highlights.title: Giant Centipedeを撃破
highlights.description: Shioriがポーションを使い回復し、Giant Centipedeを無事に倒す。

highlights.title: Shioriのバッグが一杯になる
highlights.description: ダンジョン探索中にアイテムが満載になり、Shioriのインベントリが一杯になる。

highlights.title: 商人を訪問するShiori
highlights.description: インベントリを整理するため、Shioriが商人を訪れ、アイテムを売却し、新しいポーションを購入する。

highlights.title: 最後のダンジョン再挑戦の準備
highlights.description: ShioriとZetaが最後のダンジョン挑戦に備え、ポーションを共有するなど準備を進める。

highlights.title: ダンジョン「The Ruins of Forgotten Castle」を選択
highlights.description: より高難易度のダンジョン「The Ruins of Forgotten Castle」を選択し、意気揚々と出発する。

highlights.title: ゴブリンとの戦闘開始
highlights.description: 新たなダンジョンでゴブリンに遭遇し、戦闘が始まる。今回は慎重に立ち回る。

highlights.title: ミミックと再び遭遇、Shioriの死亡
highlights.description: 再びミミックに遭遇。Shioriは前回の経験を活かそうとするが、攻撃を受けて再度倒されてしまう。

highlights.title: ZetaがMimicを倒す
highlights.description: Shioriが倒れた後、ZetaがMimicを撃破する。

highlights.title: Shioriが死亡から復活
highlights.description: ZetaがMimicを倒した後、Shioriが謎の力で復活する。

highlights.title: 今後の戦略に関する会話
highlights.description: ShioriとZetaは、このダンジョンからどう脱出するか、また生き残るための今後の戦略について話し合う。

highlights.title: Shioriが装備を確認
highlights.description: Shioriが自身の装備を再確認し、次の戦いに備える。

highlights.title: ダンジョン再開と会話
highlights.description: ロード画面が終わり、ダンジョン内での会話が始まる。Zetaがゲーム内でShioriの声が聞こえると話す。

highlights.title: ゴブリンとの戦闘
highlights.description: 通路でゴブリンと遭遇し、戦闘開始。Shioriは戦闘中に味方への誤射をしてしまう。

highlights.title: インベントリ整理とアイテム発見
highlights.description: チェストから「Old Shoes」などを発見し、インベントリを整理する。Anyaがマジックスタッフを見つける。

highlights.title: トラップの発見
highlights.description: Zetaがトラップを発見し、Shioriに注意を促す。

highlights.title: Shioriの装備変更
highlights.description: チェストから「Recurve Bow」と「Buttoned Leggings」を発見し、装備する。Shioriは装備の見た目の変化について話す。

highlights.title: 新しいエリアでの戦闘
highlights.description: Wooden Doorを開けて新しいエリアへ。複数のゴブリンと遭遇し、狭い通路で戦闘になる。

highlights.title: Shioriが武器ロスト、AnyaとZetaも死亡
highlights.description: 戦闘中にShioriが武器を落とし、AnyaとZetaも次々と敵に倒されてしまう。

highlights.title: Shioriの絶望と皮肉
highlights.description: Shioriが武器をロストし、仲間も倒れた状況に絶望しつつも、AnyaがShioriをからかう。

highlights.title: マップ機能の発見
highlights.description: Shioriがマップ機能があることに気づき、驚きと興奮を見せる。

highlights.title: Shiori単独での脱出を目指す
highlights.description: Shioriは仲間が倒れた状況で一人で脱出を目指し、アイテムを漁る。

highlights.title: 脱出ポータル出現とゴブリンの追撃
highlights.description: 脱出ポータルが起動するが、ゴブリンに追いつかれShioriも倒されてしまう。

highlights.title: リザルト画面とキャラクター選択の制限
highlights.description: ゲームオーバー後のリザルト画面で、Shioriが無料アカウントの制限により新しいキャラクターを作成できないことに気づく。

highlights.title: 新キャラクターでの再挑戦
highlights.description: Shioriは諦めず、既存のキャラクター「Fighter」で新たなダンジョン「The Frost Mountain」に挑戦する。

highlights.title: スライムとの戦闘
highlights.description: Shioriがスライムとの戦闘で苦戦し、遠距離攻撃を仕掛ける。

highlights.title: 聖なる像の利用
highlights.description: Shioriが「Shrine of Protection」を発見し利用する。一時的に防御力が上昇する。

highlights.title: 仲間との合流
highlights.description: AnyaとZetaがShioriに合流し、共に探索を続ける。

highlights.title: 「Ruin of Forgotten Castle」での戦闘
highlights.description: 「Ruin of Forgotten Castle」で敵と戦闘。Shioriが炎のトラップに苦戦する。

highlights.title: Shioriが一人で脱出
highlights.description: Shioriが一人でポータルに入り脱出に成功。仲間は取り残されてしまう。

highlights.title: 今回のリザルト
highlights.description: Shioriのリザルト画面が表示される。多くのアイテムを獲得していることが判明。

highlights.title: ロビーでの会話
highlights.description: ロビーに戻り、Shioriが無料アカウントの制限について不満を述べる。

highlights.title: キャラクターの変更と再挑戦
highlights.description: ShioriがキャラクターをRangerに変更し、「The Frost Mountain」ダンジョンでの再挑戦を決定する。

highlights.title: ゴブリンとの戦闘
highlights.description: ダンジョン「The Frost Mountain」でのゴブリンとの戦闘。敵を倒しアイテムを収集する。

highlights.title: 新たな敵「Axeman」の登場
highlights.description: 斧を持った新たな敵「Axeman」に遭遇し、苦戦する。

highlights.title: 再び仲間が倒れる
highlights.description: AnyaとZetaが敵に倒れ、Shioriは再び一人になる。

highlights.title: 最後の戦いとゲームオーバー
highlights.description: Shioriも力尽き、ゲームオーバー。最終的にリザルト画面が表示される。

highlights.title: 氷のダンジョンでの探索再開
highlights.description: 新たなゲームが始まり、凍りついたダンジョンでの探索を続ける。Anyaが自分のクレリックキャラクターの髪型についてShioriにからかわれている。

highlights.title: 宝箱からアイテム発見
highlights.description: Shioriが氷の塊の中に隠された宝箱を見つける。Templar ArmorやMystic Vestmentsなどのアイテムを回収する。

highlights.title: 大量の敵との遭遇
highlights.description: Shioriたちが通路を進むと、Flying SkullやSkeleton Footmanなどの複数の敵と遭遇し、Zetaが奮戦する。

highlights.title: 新たなアイテム「Hunting Trap」入手
highlights.description: ShioriがチェストからDashing BootsやHunting Trapを見つけ、インベントリがいっぱいになる。

highlights.title: 体力回復と今後の戦略
highlights.description: Shioriが体力回復のため休憩を提案し、Zetaが同意して座る。今後のダンジョン攻略について話し合う。

highlights.title: Fluteの発見
highlights.description: Shioriが別のチェストからFluteを発見するが、インベントリに空きがないため諦める。

highlights.title: Zetaへの誤射
highlights.description: ゴブリンとの戦闘中、Shioriが誤ってZetaを攻撃してしまい、Zetaの回復を妨害してしまう。

highlights.title: パーティー連携で敵を撃破
highlights.description: ShioriがZetaに指示を出し、協力して敵を倒す。Shioriは「Bald Cleric」Zetaを褒め称える。

highlights.title: 装備品の更新と休憩の検討
highlights.description: ShioriがOak ChestからDarkleaf Bootsを発見し、装備する。パーティーの体力が低下しているため、再度休憩を検討する。

highlights.title: 敵の接近とShioriのパニック
highlights.description: ゴブリンが接近し、Shioriが「No! Curry!」と叫びながら逃走するが、ZetaとAnyaも攻撃を受ける。Shioriは混乱して味方に誤射してしまう。

highlights.title: 全員で休憩と回復
highlights.description: ShioriがZetaの体力回復を促し、全員で座って休憩することにする。回復魔法を使い体力とスキルをチャージする。

highlights.title: マップ機能の発見と驚き
highlights.description: Anyaがマップ機能の存在を指摘し、Shioriが驚きと興奮を見せながらマップを開く。ゲームの奥深さに感動する。

highlights.title: 危険な扉と「Purple Egg」
highlights.description: Shioriが扉を開けて先に進もうとするが、敵がいるためすぐに閉じる。Zetaが紫のオーラをまとっているのを見て「Purple Egg」と呼びからかう。

highlights.title: 激しい戦闘とパーティー全滅
highlights.description: ダンジョン奥の通路で、Skeleton SpearmanやFrost Giant Berserkerなどの強力な敵と遭遇。Shioriが必死で応戦するも、仲間が次々と倒れていき、Shioriも力尽きてしまう。

highlights.title: 脱出成功！
highlights.description: Shioriが最後の脱出ポータルを発見し、見事脱出に成功する。ゲームオーバーが続く中で、一筋の光が差し込む。

highlights.title: 大量のアイテムを持ち帰り
highlights.description: リザルト画面で、Shioriが今回の冒険で多くのアイテムを持ち帰ったことが判明。歓声が上がる。

highlights.title: ロビーでの会話とキャラクター再選択
highlights.description: ロビーに戻り、Shioriが無料アカウントでのキャラクター作成制限に不満を述べる。次のゲームに向けて「Ranger」を選択する。

highlights.title: 「The Frost Mountain」再挑戦
highlights.description: Shioriたちが新たなダンジョン「The Frost Mountain」へ挑戦。厳しい戦いが再び始まる。

highlights.title: ゴブリンの撃破とアイテム収集
highlights.description: ダンジョン内でゴブリンと戦闘し、敵を倒してアイテムを収集する。

highlights.title: 強敵「Axeman」との遭遇
highlights.description: 斧を持った新たな敵「Axeman」に遭遇し、攻撃力の高さに苦戦する。

highlights.title: パーティー壊滅、Shiori一人に
highlights.description: AnyaとZetaが敵に倒され、Shioriは再び一人になる。絶望的な状況に陥る。

highlights.title: ミミックとの再戦と回復
highlights.description: Shioriがミミックに遭遇し、体力を吸収されるが、見事ミミックを倒し、体力を回復する。

highlights.title: 「Shrine of Protection」で防御力アップ
highlights.description: Shioriが「Shrine of Protection」を発見し、利用する。一時的に防御力が上昇する。

highlights.title: Shioriの孤軍奮闘
highlights.description: Shioriが一人で敵と戦い続ける。敵を倒し、アイテムを漁る。

highlights.title: 脱出ポータル発見、しかし…
highlights.description: Shioriが脱出ポータルを発見し、喜ぶが、ポータルに入ろうとした瞬間に別の敵に倒されてしまい、脱出失敗となる。

highlights.title: ゲームオーバー、最後の結果表示
highlights.description: Shioriが力尽き、ゲームオーバーとなる。リザルト画面で今回の冒険の結果が表示される。

highlights.title: ロビーに戻り、最後のアイテム整理
highlights.description: ロビーに戻り、Shioriが最後のゲーム結果と持ち物を確認。次回の配信に向けてアイテムを整理する。

highlights.title: スキル・パークの確認と変更
highlights.description: ロビーに戻ったShioriがクラスメニューで自身のスキルとパークを確認し、AnyaとZetaと変更について話し合う。

highlights.title: Anyaの装備スコアに驚くShiori
highlights.description: ShioriがAnyaのギアスコアが高いことに気づき、彼女の装備が強力であることに驚きと感心を示す。

highlights.title: 新たな装備の検討と購入
highlights.description: ShioriはTailorやArmourerなどの商人を確認し、新しいファッションや強力な装備品を探す。

highlights.title: マップ選択と出発前の会話
highlights.description: ダンジョンマップを選択し、「The Frost Mountain」へ出発する準備を進める。Shioriは自身のギアスコアが低いと自虐し、仲間を頼る。

highlights.title: ダンジョン探索開始とスケルトン戦
highlights.description: ダンジョンに入るとすぐにスケルトンと遭遇。Shioriはクロスボウで応戦するが、トーチを落としてしまい視界が悪くなる。

highlights.title: スライムとの遭遇と撃破
highlights.description: Shioriたちが通路を進むと、緑色のスライムに遭遇。近接武器で攻撃し、無事に撃破する。

highlights.title: 隠された宝箱の発見
highlights.description: Shioriが壁際に隠された宝箱を発見し、Watchman CloakやGreat Helmなどのレアなアイテムを手に入れる。

highlights.title: Shiori、暗闇で迷子になる
highlights.description: Shioriがパーティーから離れてしまい、暗闇の中で方向を見失う。AnyaとZetaが彼女を誘導しようと試みる。

highlights.title: 出口発見と全員脱出成功！
highlights.description: Shioriが暗闇の中を彷徨いながらも脱出ポータルを発見。パーティーメンバー全員がダンジョンから無事に脱出する。

highlights.title: 配信終了の挨拶とプロモーション
highlights.description: 配信が終了し、Shioriとゲストたちが視聴者に感謝を伝える。各々の今後の活動やコラボ、オリジナル曲についてプロモーションを行う。

overview_en.summary: A live stream playing 'Dark and Darker' with Hololive ID's Anya Melfissa and Vesytia Zeta as guests. The trio embarked on dungeon exploration, struggling with repeated enemy encounters and traps, yet attempting to collect items and enhance their equipment. Shiori lamented the frequent deaths of her party members while striving to survive herself. Undeterred by numerous game overs, they repeatedly changed characters and re-attempted the dungeon, even succeeding in a full party escape in one instance. Overall, the stream highlights the game's depth and the enjoyable interactions among the members.
overview_en.mood: A consistently amicable atmosphere, conveying the good relationship among the members. Despite struggling in gameplay, they appear to enjoy the challenge.

highlights_en.title: Game Start and Greetings
highlights_en.description: The stream begins, and as the screen switches to the game, Shiori, along with guests Anya Melfissa and Vesytia Zeta, exchange greetings.

highlights_en.title: Anya Melfissa's Self-Introduction
highlights_en.description: Anya Melfissa of Hololive ID 2nd Generation introduces herself.

highlights_en.title: Vesytia Zeta's Self-Introduction
highlights_en.description: Vesytia Zeta introduces herself and talks about her gaming experience.

highlights_en.title: Shiori's Self-Introduction and Gaming Experience
highlights_en.description: Shiori, Hololive's archivist, introduces herself. She mentions having gaming experience from several years ago but remembers almost nothing.

highlights_en.title: Discussion on Game Brightness Settings
highlights_en.description: The conversation heats up about the game screen's brightness settings, with Shiori pointing out that Zeta is using light mode.

highlights_en.title: Discussion on Team Composition and Strategy
highlights_en.description: They discuss future strategies with a team composition of Rogue, Archer, and Cleric (Zeta).

highlights_en.title: Selecting 'The Goblin Caves' Dungeon and Game Start
highlights_en.description: They select 'The Goblin Caves' on the dungeon selection screen, and their first adventure begins. Game hints are displayed on the loading screen.

highlights_en.title: Dungeon Exploration Begins and Skeleton Battle
highlights_en.description: Arriving in the dungeon, they encounter the first enemy, a skeleton. Shiori tries to attack with her bow but realizes she has no ammo.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Picks Up a Torch
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds a torch in the dark dungeon and secures her vision.

highlights_en.title: Zeta Heals Shiori and Goblin Encounter
highlights_en.description: Zeta heals the injured Shiori. Immediately after, they encounter a group of goblins and skeletons, creating a tense situation.

highlights_en.title: Encounter with a Mimic and Shiori's Death
highlights_en.description: As Shiori approaches a chest, it turns out to be a Mimic, which attacks and defeats her.

highlights_en.title: Zeta Recovers Shiori's Potion and Interaction with Anya
highlights_en.description: Zeta recovers Shiori's potion after she falls. Anya complains that Zeta's punch interrupted her healing.

highlights_en.title: Anya and Shiori's Argument on Game Difficulty
highlights_en.description: Anya and Shiori playfully argue about the game's difficulty and user-friendliness.

highlights_en.title: Failed Escape from the First Dungeon
highlights_en.description: As time runs out, Zeta is defeated by an enemy, and Shiori fails to escape. Everyone gets a game over.

highlights_en.title: Returning to Lobby, Checking Results and Reflecting
highlights_en.description: After the game over, they return to the lobby to check the results of their adventure (kills and loot) and discuss their reflections.

highlights_en.title: Second Dungeon Start
highlights_en.description: Learning from their first failure, they set off for the dungeon again. Vesytia Zeta's audio issues have also been resolved this time.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Goblins, Shiori Accidentally Damages Zeta
highlights_en.description: They encounter goblins in the dungeon and engage in battle. Shiori accidentally damages Zeta, interrupting Zeta's healing with her punch.

highlights_en.title: Defeating the Goblin Shaman
highlights_en.description: Shiori and Zeta cooperate to defeat the Goblin Shaman, clearing out surrounding enemies.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Giant Centipede, Poison Damage
highlights_en.description: They encounter a huge centipede-like monster. Shiori takes poison damage from its attack.

highlights_en.title: Defeating the Giant Centipede
highlights_en.description: Shiori uses a potion to heal and successfully defeats the Giant Centipede.

highlights_en.title: Shiori's Bag Becomes Full
highlights_en.description: During dungeon exploration, items pile up, and Shiori's inventory becomes full.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Visits a Merchant
highlights_en.description: To organize her inventory, Shiori visits a merchant, sells items, and purchases new potions.

highlights_en.title: Preparing for the Final Dungeon Re-challenge
highlights_en.description: Shiori and Zeta prepare for their final dungeon attempt, sharing potions and making other preparations.

highlights_en.title: Selecting 'The Ruins of Forgotten Castle' Dungeon
highlights_en.description: They enthusiastically set off, choosing the higher difficulty dungeon 'The Ruins of Forgotten Castle'.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Goblins Begins
highlights_en.description: They encounter goblins in the new dungeon, and battle begins. This time, they proceed cautiously.

highlights_en.title: Re-encounter with a Mimic, Shiori's Death
highlights_en.description: They encounter a Mimic again. Shiori tries to use her previous experience but is attacked and defeated once more.

highlights_en.title: Zeta Defeats the Mimic
highlights_en.description: After Shiori falls, Zeta defeats the Mimic.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Resurrects from Death
highlights_en.description: After Zeta defeats the Mimic, Shiori resurrects through a mysterious power.

highlights_en.title: Conversation on Future Strategy
highlights_en.description: Shiori and Zeta discuss how to escape from this dungeon and their future strategies for survival.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Checks Her Equipment
highlights_en.description: Shiori re-checks her equipment, preparing for the next battle.

highlights_en.title: Dungeon Resumes and Conversation
highlights_en.description: The loading screen ends, and conversation begins inside the dungeon. Zeta mentions hearing Shiori's voice in the game.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Goblins
highlights_en.description: They encounter goblins in the corridor, and battle begins. Shiori accidentally hits an ally during the fight.

highlights_en.title: Inventory Management and Item Discovery
highlights_en.description: They discover 'Old Shoes' and other items from a chest and organize their inventory. Anya finds a magic staff.

highlights_en.title: Trap Discovery
highlights_en.description: Zeta discovers a trap and warns Shiori.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Changes Equipment
highlights_en.description: She discovers 'Recurve Bow' and 'Buttoned Leggings' from a chest and equips them. Shiori talks about the change in equipment appearance.

highlights_en.title: Battle in a New Area
highlights_en.description: Opening a Wooden Door to a new area. They encounter multiple goblins, leading to a battle in a narrow passage.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Loses Weapon, Anya and Zeta Also Die
highlights_en.description: During battle, Shiori drops her weapon, and Anya and Zeta are successively defeated by enemies.

highlights_en.title: Shiori's Despair and Irony
highlights_en.description: While Shiori despairs over losing her weapon and her companions falling, Anya teases her.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of Map Feature
highlights_en.description: Shiori realizes the existence of a map feature and shows surprise and excitement.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Aims for Solo Escape
highlights_en.description: With her companions defeated, Shiori aims to escape alone, scavenging for items.

highlights_en.title: Escape Portal Appears and Goblin Pursuit
highlights_en.description: The escape portal activates, but goblins catch up, and Shiori is also defeated.

highlights_en.title: Results Screen and Character Selection Restrictions
highlights_en.description: On the results screen after game over, Shiori realizes she cannot create new characters due to free account limitations.

highlights_en.title: Re-challenge with New Character
highlights_en.description: Undeterred, Shiori challenges the new dungeon 'The Frost Mountain' with an existing character, 'Fighter'.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Slimes
highlights_en.description: Shiori struggles in battle with slimes and initiates long-range attacks.

highlights_en.title: Using the Holy Statue
highlights_en.description: Shiori discovers and uses a 'Shrine of Protection'. Her defense temporarily increases.

highlights_en.title: Reunion with Companions
highlights_en.description: Anya and Zeta rejoin Shiori, and they continue exploring together.

highlights_en.title: Battle in 'Ruin of Forgotten Castle'
highlights_en.description: They battle enemies in 'Ruin of Forgotten Castle'. Shiori struggles with fire traps.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Escapes Alone
highlights_en.description: Shiori enters the portal alone and successfully escapes. Her companions are left behind.

highlights_en.title: This Round's Results
highlights_en.description: Shiori's results screen is displayed, showing that she acquired many items.

highlights_en.title: Conversation in the Lobby
highlights_en.description: Returning to the lobby, Shiori complains about the free account limitations.

highlights_en.title: Character Change and Re-challenge
highlights_en.description: Shiori changes her character to Ranger and decides to re-challenge 'The Frost Mountain' dungeon.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Goblins
highlights_en.description: Battle with goblins in 'The Frost Mountain' dungeon. They defeat enemies and collect items.

highlights_en.title: Appearance of a New Enemy, 'Axeman'
highlights_en.description: They encounter a new axe-wielding enemy, 'Axeman', and struggle against it.

highlights_en.title: Companions Fall Again
highlights_en.description: Anya and Zeta are defeated by enemies, and Shiori is once again alone.

highlights_en.title: Final Battle and Game Over
highlights_en.description: Shiori also falls, resulting in a game over. The final results screen is displayed.

highlights_en.title: Resuming Exploration in the Ice Dungeon
highlights_en.description: A new game begins, and they continue exploring the frozen dungeon. Anya is teased by Shiori about her Cleric character's hairstyle.
