highlights_en.title: Item Discovery from Treasure Chest
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds a treasure chest hidden within a block of ice. She retrieves items like Templar Armor and Mystic Vestments.

highlights_en.title: Encounter with Many Enemies
highlights_en.description: As Shiori and her companions proceed through the passage, they encounter multiple enemies such as Flying Skull and Skeleton Footman, and Zeta fights bravely.

highlights_en.title: Acquiring New Item 'Hunting Trap'
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds Dashing Boots and a Hunting Trap from a chest, and her inventory becomes full.

highlights_en.title: Health Recovery and Future Strategy
highlights_en.description: Shiori suggests taking a break to recover health, and Zeta agrees and sits down. They discuss future dungeon strategies.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of a Flute
highlights_en.description: Shiori discovers a Flute from another chest but gives up on it due to lack of inventory space.

highlights_en.title: Accidental Shot on Zeta
highlights_en.description: During battle with goblins, Shiori accidentally attacks Zeta, interrupting Zeta's healing.

highlights_en.title: Party Cooperation to Defeat Enemies
highlights_en.description: Shiori gives instructions to Zeta, and they cooperate to defeat the enemies. Shiori praises 'Bald Cleric' Zeta.

highlights_en.title: Equipment Update and Consideration of Rest
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds Darkleaf Boots from an Oak Chest and equips them. As the party's health is low, they consider resting again.

highlights_en.title: Enemy Approach and Shiori's Panic
highlights_en.description: Goblins approach, and Shiori flees, shouting 'No! Curry!', but Zeta and Anya also take damage. Shiori gets confused and accidentally fires at her allies.

highlights_en.title: Full Party Rest and Recovery
highlights_en.description: Shiori encourages Zeta to recover health, and they all decide to sit down and rest. They use healing magic to recharge health and skills.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of Map Feature and Surprise
highlights_en.description: Anya points out the existence of a map feature, and Shiori opens the map with surprise and excitement, impressed by the game's depth.

highlights_en.title: Dangerous Door and 'Purple Egg'
highlights_en.description: Shiori tries to open a door and proceed, but quickly closes it due to enemies. Seeing Zeta enveloped in a purple aura, she teases her by calling her 'Purple Egg'.

highlights_en.title: Fierce Battle and Party Wipe
highlights_en.description: In a passage deep within the dungeon, they encounter powerful enemies such as Skeleton Spearman and Frost Giant Berserker. Shiori desperately fights back, but her companions fall one after another, and Shiori also succumbs.

highlights_en.title: Escape Successful!
highlights_en.description: Shiori discovers the final escape portal and successfully escapes. Amidst a series of game overs, a ray of light appears.

highlights_en.title: Bringing Back Numerous Items
highlights_en.description: On the results screen, it is revealed that Shiori brought back many items from this adventure. Cheers erupt.

highlights_en.title: Lobby Conversation and Character Re-selection
highlights_en.description: Returning to the lobby, Shiori expresses dissatisfaction with the free account character creation restrictions. She selects 'Ranger' for the next game.

highlights_en.title: Re-challenge 'The Frost Mountain'
highlights_en.description: Shiori and her companions challenge the new dungeon 'The Frost Mountain'. The tough battles begin again.

highlights_en.title: Defeating Goblins and Collecting Items
highlights_en.description: They battle goblins inside the dungeon, defeating enemies and collecting items.

highlights_en.title: Encounter with Strong Enemy 'Axeman'
highlights_en.description: They encounter a new axe-wielding enemy, 'Axeman', and struggle against its high attack power.

highlights_en.title: Party Annihilation, Shiori Left Alone
highlights_en.description: Anya and Zeta are defeated by enemies, and Shiori is once again alone. They fall into a desperate situation.

highlights_en.title: Rematch with a Mimic and Recovery
highlights_en.description: Shiori encounters a Mimic and has her health absorbed, but she successfully defeats the Mimic and recovers her health.

highlights_en.title: Defense Boost with 'Shrine of Protection'
highlights_en.description: Shiori discovers and uses a 'Shrine of Protection'. Her defense temporarily increases.

highlights_en.title: Shiori's Solitary Struggle
highlights_en.description: Shiori continues to fight enemies alone. She defeats enemies and scavenges for items.

highlights_en.title: Escape Portal Found, But...
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds the escape portal and rejoices, but as she tries to enter, she is defeated by another enemy, resulting in a failed escape.

highlights_en.title: Game Over, Final Results Display
highlights_en.description: Shiori succumbs, resulting in a game over. The results of this adventure are displayed on the results screen.

highlights_en.title: Returning to Lobby, Final Item Organization
highlights_en.description: Returning to the lobby, Shiori checks her final game results and inventory. She organizes items for the next stream.

highlights_en.title: Checking and Changing Skills/Perks
highlights_en.description: Back in the lobby, Shiori checks her skills and perks in the class menu and discusses changes with Anya and Zeta.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Surprised by Anya's Equipment Score
highlights_en.description: Shiori notices Anya's high gear score, showing surprise and admiration for her powerful equipment.

highlights_en.title: Considering and Purchasing New Equipment
highlights_en.description: Shiori checks merchants like Tailor and Armourer, looking for new fashion and powerful equipment.

highlights_en.title: Map Selection and Pre-departure Conversation
highlights_en.description: They select a dungeon map and prepare to depart for 'The Frost Mountain'. Shiori self-deprecatingly mentions her low gear score and relies on her companions.

highlights_en.title: Dungeon Exploration Begins and Skeleton Battle
highlights_en.description: Upon entering the dungeon, they immediately encounter a skeleton. Shiori fights back with her crossbow but drops her torch, impairing her vision.

highlights_en.title: Encounter and Defeat of Slimes
highlights_en.description: As Shiori and her companions proceed through the passage, they encounter green slimes. They attack with melee weapons and successfully defeat them.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of Hidden Treasure Chest
highlights_en.description: Shiori finds a treasure chest hidden against the wall and obtains rare items such as a Watchman Cloak and Great Helm.

highlights_en.title: Shiori Gets Lost in the Dark
highlights_en.description: Shiori gets separated from the party and loses her way in the dark. Anya and Zeta try to guide her.

highlights_en.title: Exit Found and Full Party Escape Successful!
highlights_en.description: Shiori, while wandering in the dark, finds the escape portal. All party members successfully escape the dungeon.

highlights_en.title: Stream End Greetings and Promotions
highlights_en.description: The stream ends, and Shiori and her guests thank the viewers. They promote their upcoming activities, collaborations, and original songs.

title: 【Dark and Darker】It Sure Is Dark Here...【hololive ID 2nd Gen | Anya Melfissa】

overview.summary: ホロライブID2期生のアニャが、Vestia Zeta、Kaela Kovalskiaと共に「Dark and Darker」をプレイ。ゲームはPvP要素があり、プレイヤーはダンジョンを探索しモンスターと戦いながら脱出を目指します。序盤はオーディオトラブルに見舞われるも解決し、3人は協力してダンジョンを探索。スケルトンや狼などのモンスターと戦い、ミミックとの戦闘で全滅。2度目の挑戦も罠と猛攻で全滅するが、3度目の挑戦ではキャラクター構成を変更し、新たな強敵 goblin mage に苦戦しつつも、チームワークと粘り強さでついにダンジョンからの脱出に成功する。その後、より難易度の高い新マップ「The Frost Mountain」に挑戦するが、ハーピーや巨大なゴブリン、コカトリスなど新たな強敵に苦戦し、連続で全滅。アイテムを全て失うも、ダンジョンで獲得したアイテムを商人に売却し、新たな資金とクエストを獲得。スキルや装備の最終調整を行い、過去最高のアイテム獲得総額を記録し、次の高難度ダンジョンへの挑戦を決意する。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気だが、ゲームのプレイ中は緊迫感もあり、時折笑いも起きる。

highlights.title: ゲーム開始とメンバー紹介
highlights.description: 配信が始まり、アニャ、Vestia Zeta、Kaela Kovalskiaの3人がゲーム内ボイスチャットで挨拶。Zetaはボイスチェンジャーを使用していることを明かし、アニャとKaelaはZetaの画面が真っ暗なことに言及して笑いを誘う。

highlights.title: オーディオトラブルとゲーム設定の確認
highlights.description: アニャが自身のマイクが機能していないのではないかと心配し、チャットに確認。その後、ゲーム内オーディオ設定の問題に気づき調整。ゲームがPvPモードであることやPvEモードの有無について話し合う。

highlights.title: ダンジョン探索開始
highlights.description: 「Forgotten Castle」ダンジョンへの挑戦が始まり、アニャが松明を拾う。Zetaが毒の池に落ちてダメージを受け、回復ポーションの使い方について試行錯誤する。

highlights.title: スケルトンとの戦闘
highlights.description: 最初の敵としてスケルトンに遭遇。Ranger（Kaela）が弓矢で攻撃し、見事撃破する。

highlights.title: ゴブリンアーチャーと狼の討伐
highlights.description: ゴブリンアーチャーと狼が出現し、Rangerが弓矢で応戦。チームワークで敵を倒す。

highlights.title: 宝箱の発見とミミックの襲撃
highlights.description: 複数の宝箱を発見し、アイテムを漁る。しかし、最後に開けた宝箱がミミック（擬態した敵）であり、チームは奇襲を受ける。

highlights.title: 全滅と反省会
highlights.description: ミミックとの戦闘で追い詰められ、Poisonダメージを受けながら逃げるも、最終的に全員が倒されてしまう。ロビーに戻り、今回の結果について話し合う。

highlights.title: マイク音声問題の再発と解決
highlights.description: アニャがゲームを再開すると再びマイクの音声がゲーム内で機能しない問題が発生。試行錯誤の末、Discordの音声設定を調整することで解決し、安堵する。

highlights.title: 2度目のダンジョン挑戦
highlights.description: 再び「Forgotten Castle」に挑戦。今度はスムーズに進み、最初のスケルトンを倒す。チームメイトが毒ダメージを受けてもすぐさま回復できる余裕を見せる。

highlights.title: 罠と敵の猛攻
highlights.description: 床のトゲ罠でCleric（アニャ）がダメージを受け、その後の戦闘でゴブリンアーチャーとウォーリアに囲まれてRogue（Zeta）とRanger（Kaela）が倒される。Clericもフロアの毒と敵の攻撃で倒れてしまい、再び全滅となる。

highlights.title: 3度目の全滅
highlights.description: 毒沼でRanger（Kaela）がダメージを受け、その後現れた敵と床の罠、毒沼のコンボで全員が倒されてしまう。アニャは自身のマイクがオフになっていたことに気づき驚く。

highlights.title: ロビーでの反省と脱出方法の確認
highlights.description: 全滅後、ロビーに戻り、脱出方法について話し合う。アニャがレベルアップしたことを報告し、皆で喜びを分かち合う。ボイスチャットの問題がゲーム内の音声設定にあることが判明し、Discordを使用することに切り替える。

highlights.title: 4度目のダンジョン挑戦開始
highlights.description: キャラクター構成を変更し、Fighter（Kaela）、Cleric（Anya）、Rogue（Zeta）でダンジョンに再挑戦。今回は順調に探索を進め、壷を壊しながらアイテムを回収する。

highlights.title: ミイラとの遭遇とチームワーク
highlights.description: ミイラと遭遇し、Zetaが先に攻撃を受ける。アニャが回復呪文でZetaをサポートし、協力してミイラを倒す。

highlights.title: 多数の敵との激戦
highlights.description: ゴブリンウォーリアとアーチャーに囲まれ、激しい戦闘が繰り広げられる。アニャはKaelaとZetaを回復させながら戦い、なんとか敵を撃破する。

highlights.title: ゴブリンメイジとの戦い
highlights.description: 多数のスケルトンとゴブリン弓兵に加えて、強力な魔法を操るゴブリンメイジが出現。アニャとKaelaが敵の攻撃を引きつけ、Zetaが敵の背後から奇襲を仕掛けるなど、連携して戦う。

highlights.title: 初のダンジョン脱出に成功
highlights.description: 激しい戦闘の中、Zetaが一人で脱出ポータルを発見し、起動させる。その後、アニャとKaelaもポータルに合流し、三人で初めてダンジョンからの脱出に成功する。

highlights.title: 脱出後の結果確認と反省会
highlights.description: ダンジョン脱出後、今回の結果を確認する。獲得したアイテムの総額は105ゴールドで、初めて収益を得ることができた。今後の戦略について話し合い、新たなキャラクターの試用を検討する。

highlights.title: 激しい戦闘と全滅
highlights.description: 前回から続くダンジョン探索。多数のゴブリンウォーリアとアーチャーとの激しい戦闘が繰り広げられる。アニャは仲間を回復しながら奮闘するも、最終的に全滅してしまう。

highlights.title: アイテムロストと新マップ検討
highlights.description: ロビーに戻り、今回の全滅で全てのアイテムを失ったことを確認。次のダンジョンとして「The Frost Mountain」を検討し、PvPモードの有無について話し合う。

highlights.title: 新マップ「The Frost Mountain」へ
highlights.description: 新しいマップ「The Frost Mountain」への挑戦を決定。PvP要素がないことを確認し、今回は戦闘ではなくアイテム収集に専念する方針を固める。

highlights.title: ランチャーダウンロードの苦労話
highlights.description: ロード画面中、アニャが以前ゲームのランチャーをダウンロードする際に直面した困難な経験について語る。ZetaとKaelaもそれに同意し、ダウンロードの苦労が共通の話題となる。

highlights.title: 「The Frost Mountain」探索開始
highlights.description: 新しいダンジョン「The Frost Mountain」の探索を開始。凍った地面が特徴的で、氷の柱や雪が積もった景色が広がる。

highlights.title: 新しい敵「ハーピー」との戦闘
highlights.description: 空を飛ぶ新しい敵「ハーピー」に遭遇。俊敏な動きと攻撃に苦戦するが、Kaelaの弓攻撃が有効で、協力して撃破に成功する。

highlights.title: スケルトンとの戦闘と新たなアイテム発見
highlights.description: 複数のスケルトンと戦闘し、素早く撃破。その後、大きな宝箱と新しいタイプの防具「Visored Sallet（バイザー付きサレット）」を発見し、装備する。

highlights.title: 体力回復とクラススキル再確認
highlights.description: 戦闘で減少した体力を回復するため、アニャは休憩して回復スキルを使用する。同時に、自身のクラススキル「Sanctuary」が味方にも有効であることを再確認する。

highlights.title: 強敵「コカトリス」とゴブリン部隊
highlights.description: 巨大な敵「コカトリス」と複数のゴブリンアーチャー、ウォーリアに遭遇。毒ガスを放つ強敵に苦戦し、仲間が倒れるが、粘り強く戦い続ける。

highlights.title: キャラクター変更への誘惑
highlights.description: アニャが現在のクラスから別のクラス（ウィザード）への変更を検討するが、再度キャラクター作成のプロセスが面倒だと葛藤する。Zetaが「Free-to-Playプレイヤーの宿命」だと冗談を言う。

highlights.title: さらなる強敵と連続全滅
highlights.description: 複数のスケルトンやゴブリンに加えて、より強力な「Frost Giant Berserker」や「Cockatrice」などの強敵に連続して遭遇。チームは次々と倒され、三度目の全滅となる。

highlights.title: 再度の全滅とアイテム価値の確認
highlights.description: ロビーに戻り、今回の結果を確認。獲得したアイテムの総額が268ゴールドとなり、これまでのプレイで最も良い成果だったことに驚く。

highlights.title: 次のマップへの挑戦決定
highlights.description: 次のダンジョンとして、難易度の高い「The Forgotten Castle (Normal)」（PvP要素あり）に挑戦することを決定。今回の成果を弾みに、さらなる高みを目指す。

highlights.title: アイテムの整理と売却方法の確認
highlights.description: ダンジョンから持ち帰ったアイテムを整理し、シルバーコインやゴールドキャンドルホルダーなど、売却可能なアイテムの確認と価値を仲間と話し合う。商人の「The Collector」にアイテムを売却し、ゴールドを獲得する。特定の商人が特定のアイテムのみ買い取ることに気づく。

highlights.title: 高価な包帯の購入と資金管理
highlights.description: 商人「Surgeon」から包帯をまとめ買いしようとするが、予想以上の値段に驚く。仲間からインベントリだけでなく倉庫のゴールドも使えることを教わり、包帯を5スタック購入。次のダンジョンに向けて準備を進める。

highlights.title: クエストの大量受諾とアモの補充
highlights.description: 不要なアイテムを「The Collector」に売却し、さらに資金を増やす。クロスボウのボルトを「Woodsman」から購入し、各商人のクエストを次々と受諾していく。クエスト報酬として経験値や追加アイテムが得られることを確認。

highlights.title: スキルとパークの最終調整、次なる挑戦へ
highlights.description: 各商人のクエストをすべて受諾し、アニャはクロスボウのパーク「Crossbow Mastery」を取得。ギアスコアが上昇し、アイテムの準備も整う。最後に「The Forgotten Castle: Normal」への再挑戦を決定し、PvP要素があることを再確認しながら、新たな冒険へと出発する。

overview_en.summary: Anya, a 2nd generation Hololive ID member, plays "Dark and Darker" with Vestia Zeta and Kaela Kovalskia. The game features PvP elements, where players explore dungeons, fight monsters, and aim to escape. Early on, they faced and resolved audio issues. The trio then cooperatively explored dungeons, battling monsters like skeletons and wolves. They were wiped out in a fight with a Mimic. Their second attempt also ended in a wipeout due to traps and fierce attacks, but on their third try, they changed their character composition. Despite struggling with a new formidable enemy, the goblin mage, their teamwork and perseverance finally led to a successful escape from the dungeon. Afterward, they challenged the more difficult new map, "The Frost Mountain," where they struggled against new powerful enemies such as Harpies, giant Goblins, and Cockatrices, resulting in successive wipeouts. Although they lost all their items, they sold the items acquired in the dungeon to merchants, gaining new funds and quests. They made final adjustments to their skills and equipment, recorded their highest total item value to date, and decided to challenge the next high-difficulty dungeon.
overview_en.mood: A consistently amicable atmosphere, yet intense during gameplay, with occasional bursts of laughter.

highlights_en.title: Game Start and Member Introduction
highlights_en.description: The stream begins with Anya, Vestia Zeta, and Kaela Kovalskia greeting each other via in-game voice chat. Zeta reveals she's using a voice changer, and Anya and Kaela provoke laughter by commenting on Zeta's dark screen.

highlights_en.title: Audio Trouble and Game Settings Check
highlights_en.description: Anya worries her microphone might not be working and checks in chat. She then realizes and adjusts an issue with in-game audio settings. They discuss whether the game is PvP mode or if a PvE mode exists.

highlights_en.title: Dungeon Exploration Begins
highlights_en.description: The challenge in "Forgotten Castle" dungeon begins, and Anya picks up a torch. Zeta falls into a poisoned pond and takes damage, then struggles to figure out how to use a healing potion.

highlights_en.title: Combat with Skeletons
highlights_en.description: They encounter skeletons as their first enemies. The Ranger (Kaela) attacks with arrows and successfully defeats them.

highlights_en.title: Defeating Goblin Archers and Wolves
highlights_en.description: Goblin archers and wolves appear, and the Ranger retaliates with arrows. They defeat the enemies with teamwork.

highlights_en.title: Treasure Chest Discovery and Mimic Attack
highlights_en.description: They discover multiple treasure chests and loot items. However, the last chest they opened turns out to be a Mimic (a disguised enemy), and the team is ambushed.

highlights_en.title: Wipeout and Debriefing
highlights_en.description: Cornered in the fight against the Mimic, they try to escape while taking Poison damage but are ultimately all defeated. They return to the lobby and discuss the outcome.

highlights_en.title: Recurrence and Resolution of Microphone Audio Issue
highlights_en.description: When Anya restarts the game, the microphone audio issue reoccurs in-game. After trial and error, she resolves it by adjusting Discord's audio settings, feeling relieved.

highlights_en.title: Second Dungeon Attempt
highlights_en.description: They challenge "Forgotten Castle" again. This time, they proceed smoothly and defeat the first skeleton. They show a readiness to quickly heal teammates even if they take poison damage.

highlights_en.title: Traps and Fierce Enemy Assault
highlights_en.description: The Cleric (Anya) takes damage from floor spike traps. In the subsequent battle, the Rogue (Zeta) and Ranger (Kaela) are surrounded by goblin archers and warriors and are defeated. The Cleric also falls to floor poison and enemy attacks, resulting in another wipeout.

highlights_en.title: Third Wipeout
highlights_en.description: The Ranger (Kaela) takes damage in a poison swamp. Subsequently, a combo of newly appearing enemies, floor traps, and the poison swamp leads to everyone being defeated. Anya is surprised to realize her microphone was off.

highlights_en.title: Lobby Debriefing and Escape Method Confirmation
highlights_en.description: After the wipeout, they return to the lobby and discuss escape methods. Anya reports leveling up, and everyone shares in the joy. It's revealed that the voice chat issue was due to in-game audio settings, so they switch to using Discord.

highlights_en.title: Fourth Dungeon Attempt Begins
highlights_en.description: They change their character composition, with Fighter (Kaela), Cleric (Anya), and Rogue (Zeta) re-challenging the dungeon. This time, they proceed smoothly, breaking pots and collecting items.

highlights_en.title: Mummy Encounter and Teamwork
highlights_en.description: They encounter a mummy, and Zeta takes the first hit. Anya supports Zeta with healing spells, and they cooperate to defeat the mummy.

highlights_en.title: Fierce Battle with Numerous Enemies
highlights_en.description: Surrounded by goblin warriors and archers, a fierce battle ensues. Anya fights while healing Kaela and Zeta, managing to defeat the enemies.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Goblin Mage
highlights_en.description: In addition to numerous skeletons and goblin archers, a powerful magic-wielding goblin mage appears. Anya and Kaela draw enemy attacks, while Zeta ambushes enemies from behind, fighting cooperatively.

highlights_en.title: First Successful Dungeon Escape
highlights_en.description: Amidst fierce combat, Zeta single-handedly discovers and activates an escape portal. Anya and Kaela then join her at the portal, and for the first time, all three successfully escape the dungeon.

highlights_en.title: Post-Escape Results Check and Debriefing
highlights_en.description: After escaping the dungeon, they review their results. The total value of acquired items was 105 gold, marking their first time gaining profit. They discuss future strategies and consider trying out new characters.

highlights_en.title: Fierce Combat and Wipeout
highlights_en.description: Dungeon exploration continues from the previous session. A fierce battle unfolds against numerous goblin warriors and archers. Anya struggles to heal her teammates but ultimately, they are wiped out.

highlights_en.title: Item Loss and New Map Consideration
highlights_en.description: They return to the lobby and confirm that all items were lost in this wipeout. They consider "The Frost Mountain" as the next dungeon and discuss whether it has PvP mode.

highlights_en.title: To the New Map: "The Frost Mountain"
highlights_en.description: They decide to challenge the new map, "The Frost Mountain." Confirming it has no PvP elements, they resolve to focus on item collection rather than combat this time.

highlights_en.title: Launcher Download Struggles
highlights_en.description: During the loading screen, Anya shares her past difficulties encountered while downloading the game's launcher. Zeta and Kaela agree, making the download struggles a shared topic of conversation.

highlights_en.title: Beginning "The Frost Mountain" Exploration
highlights_en.description: They begin exploring the new dungeon, "The Frost Mountain." It features frozen ground, with ice pillars and snowy landscapes stretching out.

highlights_en.title: Combat with New Enemy: Harpy
highlights_en.description: They encounter a new flying enemy, a "Harpy." They struggle with its agile movements and attacks, but Kaela's bow attacks prove effective, and they successfully defeat it together.

highlights_en.title: Combat with Skeletons and New Item Discovery
highlights_en.description: They fight multiple skeletons and quickly defeat them. Afterward, they discover a large treasure chest and a new type of armor, a "Visored Sallet," which they equip.

highlights_en.title: Health Recovery and Class Skill Reconfirmation
highlights_en.description: To recover health lost in combat, Anya rests and uses a healing skill. At the same time, she reconfirms that her class skill "Sanctuary" is also effective for allies.

highlights_en.title: Formidable Foe "Cockatrice" and Goblin Troops
highlights_en.description: They encounter a giant enemy, a "Cockatrice," and multiple goblin archers and warriors. They struggle against the formidable foe that emits poison gas, and teammates fall, but they continue to fight tenaciously.

highlights_en.title: Temptation to Change Characters
highlights_en.description: Anya considers changing from her current class to another (Wizard) but struggles with the hassle of repeating the character creation process. Zeta jokes that it's the "fate of Free-to-Play players."

highlights_en.title: Further Formidable Foes and Consecutive Wipeouts
highlights_en.description: In addition to multiple skeletons and goblins, they continuously encounter more powerful enemies such as "Frost Giant Berserker" and "Cockatrice." The team is defeated one after another, resulting in their third wipeout.

highlights_en.title: Another Wipeout and Item Value Confirmation
highlights_en.description: They return to the lobby and review the results. They are surprised that the total value of acquired items reached 268 gold, which was their best achievement to date.

highlights_en.title: Decision to Challenge the Next Map
highlights_en.description: They decide to challenge the high-difficulty "The Forgotten Castle (Normal)" (with PvP elements) as their next dungeon. Using their current success as momentum, they aim for even greater heights.

highlights_en.title: Item Organization and Sales Method Confirmation
highlights_en.description: They organize the items brought back from the dungeon and discuss with teammates the value and tradability of items like silver coins and gold candle holders. They sell items to the merchant "The Collector" to gain gold. They realize that specific merchants only buy specific items.

highlights_en.title: Purchasing Expensive Bandages and Fund Management
highlights_en.description: They attempt to buy bandages in bulk from the merchant "Surgeon" but are surprised by the unexpectedly high price. Teammates inform them that gold from the stash can also be used, not just inventory. They purchase 5 stacks of bandages, preparing for the next dungeon.

highlights_en.title: Mass Quest Acceptance and Ammo Resupply
highlights_en.description: They sell unnecessary items to "The Collector" to further increase their funds. They purchase crossbow bolts from "Woodsman" and accept quests from various merchants one after another. They confirm that quest rewards include experience points and additional items.

highlights_en.title: Final Skill and Perk Adjustments, Towards the Next Challenge
highlights_en.description: After accepting all quests from the various merchants, Anya acquires the "Crossbow Mastery" perk for crossbows. Their gear score increases, and item preparations are complete. Finally, they decide to re-challenge "The Forgotten Castle: Normal," reconfirming its PvP elements, and embark on a new adventure.

title: 【＃ぺこマリ体操】ホロメン来るかな？マリン枠最終日！！！ここまで走り抜けた！14日目【ホロライブ/兎田ぺこら/宝鐘マリン】

overview.summary: 「ぺこマリ体操」最終日の配信。兎田ぺこらと宝鐘マリンが中心となり、ビビ（アユンダ・リス）、リーダー（カエラ・コヴァルスキア）、チハ（鷹嶺ルイ）、フロフグロ（星街すいせい）、肉タム（不知火フレア）といったマスコット姿のホロメンたちも登場。元気いっぱいの体操本番や、マスコットたちの個性あふれる掛け合い、自由奔放な動きで終始笑顔の絶えない配信となりました。
overview.mood: 終始明るく、賑やかで楽しい雰囲気

highlights.title: 配信開始とバースデーグッズ紹介
highlights.description: 配信開始時の待機画面では、宝鐘マリンのバースデーグッズ紹介アニメが流れています。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操最終日！
highlights.description: 兎田ぺこらと宝鐘マリンが3Dで登場し、「ぺこマリ体操」企画が最終日を迎えたことを話します。二人は今朝の調子や健康生活について語り合います。

highlights.title: ビビ（アユンダ・リス）登場
highlights.description: マスコット姿のビビが登場し、ぺこらに会いたかった気持ちを伝えます。

highlights.title: チハ（鷹嶺ルイ）登場
highlights.description: マスコット姿のチハが登場し、ビビとハートを飛ばし合う可愛らしい交流を見せます。

highlights.title: フロフグロ（星街すいせい）登場
highlights.description: マスコット姿のフロフグロが登場。体が「ちびっこ」になってしまい、すねた表情を見せます。

highlights.title: 肉タム（不知火フレア）登場
highlights.description: マスコット姿の肉タムが登場。他のマスコットたちよりも一回り大きい姿で現れます。

highlights.title: 全員集合とポーズ
highlights.description: 全てのゲスト（マスコットキャラ）がステージに集合し、記念撮影に向けてそれぞれ個性的なポーズを取ります。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操本番
highlights.description: いよいよ「ぺこマリ体操」本番。マリン、ぺこら、そしてゲストのマスコットキャラたちが全員で楽しく体操を踊ります。

highlights.title: マスコットたちの自由な動き
highlights.description: 体操後もマスコットキャラたちはステージ上で自由に動き回り、デングリ返しをしたり、お互いに抱き合ったりして楽しむ様子が見られます。

highlights.title: 記念スタンプ押印タイム
highlights.description: 企画の締めくくりとして、各マスコットキャラが記念スタンプを画面に押していきます。中には失敗したり、予想外の行動を見せるキャラもいます。

highlights.title: エンディング
highlights.description: 「ぺこマリ体操」の全日程を無事に終え、配信は感動的なエンディングへと移行します。

tags: カエラ・コヴァルスキア

overview_en.summary: The final day stream of 'PekoMari Exercise'. Usada Pekora and Houshou Marine took center stage, joined by holomem in mascot costumes: Bibi (Ayunda Risu), Leader (Kaela Kovalskia), Chiha (Takane Lui), Furofugu-ro (Hoshimachi Suisei), and Nikutamu (Shiranui Flare). The stream was filled with endless smiles, featuring energetic exercise, unique interactions among the mascots, and their free-spirited movements.
overview_en.mood: Consistently bright, lively, and fun atmosphere

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Birthday Goods Introduction
highlights_en.description: During the waiting screen at the start of the stream, an animated introduction to Houshou Marine's birthday goods is played.

highlights_en.title: PekoMari Exercise: Final Day!
highlights_en.description: Usada Pekora and Houshou Marine appear in 3D and announce that the 'PekoMari Exercise' project has reached its final day. They discuss how they feel this morning and their healthy lifestyles.

highlights_en.title: Bibi (Ayunda Risu) Appears
highlights_en.description: Bibi appears in a mascot costume and expresses her desire to meet Pekora.

highlights_en.title: Chiha (Takane Lui) Appears
highlights_en.description: Chiha appears in a mascot costume and shows a cute interaction, exchanging hearts with Bibi.

highlights_en.title: Furofugu-ro (Hoshimachi Suisei) Appears
highlights_en.description: Furofugu-ro appears in a mascot costume. Their body has become 'tiny,' and they show a pouting expression.

highlights_en.title: Nikutamu (Shiranui Flare) Appears
highlights_en.description: Nikutamu appears in a mascot costume. They appear noticeably larger than the other mascots.

highlights_en.title: All Gather and Pose
highlights_en.description: All the guests (mascot characters) gather on stage and strike unique poses for a commemorative photo.

highlights_en.title: PekoMari Exercise Main Event
highlights_en.description: Finally, it's time for the 'PekoMari Exercise' main event. Marine, Pekora, and all the guest mascot characters happily perform the exercise together.

highlights_en.title: Mascots' Free Movements
highlights_en.description: Even after the exercise, the mascot characters move freely on stage, seen enjoying themselves by doing somersaults and hugging each other.

highlights_en.title: Commemorative Stamp Imprinting Time
highlights_en.description: As a culmination of the project, each mascot character presses a commemorative stamp onto the screen. Some characters fail or show unexpected actions.

highlights_en.title: Ending
highlights_en.description: Having safely completed all scheduled 'PekoMari Exercise' sessions, the stream transitions into an emotional ending.

title: 【朝活】金曜の朝活！色々お話しするぞ～！【虎金妃笑虎】

overview.summary: 配信者の虎金妃笑虎が、前日のカレーによる顔のむくみをネタにしつつ、友人との鹿児島での流しそうめん体験やその絶品つゆについて熱く語った。そこから派生して、映画「鬼滅の刃」の鑑賞体験、特に登場人物の魅力や自身が作品から受けた影響について深く語った。また、ホロライブの仲間たちとの交流や、自身の「虎」としてのアイデンティティと「人間」への憧れについて哲学的な考察を繰り広げた。終始ユーモアを交えながら、食べ物の話、映画、そして深い人生観に至るまで多岐にわたる話題で盛り上がった。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、配信者の自虐ネタやリスナーとの軽妙なやり取りが笑いを誘う。時に真面目な人生観も語られ、感情豊かな配信。

highlights.title: 配信開始時の挨拶と顔のむくみについて
highlights.description: 配信者の虎金妃笑虎が、可愛らしいハムスターのような顔で挨拶。視聴者からは顔が膨らんでいることについてコメントが寄せられる。

highlights.title: 顔がむくんだ原因は夜のカレーと歯磨きなしで寝たこと
highlights.description: 前日の夜にカレーを食べ、歯磨きをせずにそのまま寝てしまったため、顔がパンパンにむくんだと説明。アイドルとしての尊厳をカレーに置いてきたと自虐的に語る。

highlights.title: 顔のむくみのレベルが尋常でないと驚かれる
highlights.description: むくみがひどく、視聴者から「むくみレベルじゃない」「ハムスター」などとツッコミが入る。むくみの原因はカレーの塩分だと補足。

highlights.title: 朝のコーヒー習慣とリスナーからのおすすめ
highlights.description: 普段は起きてから1時間後にコーヒーを飲むが、朝活のためすぐに飲んでいると説明。リスナーからおすすめのコーヒーについて尋ねられ、コーヒー談義が始まる。

highlights.title: 恵比寿コーヒーと味覚の覚醒
highlights.description: リスナーからウィスキー風味の恵比寿コーヒーの情報を得たが、試す機会がなかったと話す。風邪で味覚がおかしくなった際にコーヒーを克服した体験を語り、苦味を感じなくなったコーヒーを美味しいと感じるようになったと明かす。

highlights.title: むくみ対策と年齢に関するいじり
highlights.description: 顔のむくみはカレーの塩分が原因で、歯磨きをしていれば軽減された可能性に言及。リスナーから年齢をいじられ、「まだ24歳だ！」と反論する。

highlights.title: おすすめのスティックコーヒーとマックスコーヒー
highlights.description: 手軽に飲めるパウダータイプのスティックコーヒーを推薦。お湯をたっぷり入れて飲むのがポイント。マックスコーヒーは脳が焼けるほど甘いと評価する。

highlights.title: 過去の過激なエナドリ摂取経験
highlights.description: レッドブルゼロシュガーを飲みすぎた時期があり、カフェイン中毒になったと告白。過剰摂取で体調を崩したため、飲むのをやめたと語る。

highlights.title: 美容と健康のための油と水のこだわり
highlights.description: オリーブオイルを顔に塗る美容法や、飲む水の種類にこだわるなど、健康に関する話題で盛り上がる。それぞれの体に合う水や油の重要性を説く。

highlights.title: 鹿児島県での流しそうめん体験
highlights.description: 友人との鹿児島旅行で訪れた流しそうめんの店で、特製のタレが絶品だったと熱弁。そうめんのタレの奥深さに感動したエピソードを語る。

highlights.title: むくんだ顔でのぺこまり体操参加宣言
highlights.description: ぺこまり体操にこのむくんだ顔で参加するのかとリスナーに突っ込まれる。本人はこの顔で参加することを宣言し、笑いを誘う。福福と膨らんだ顔で配信を続ける。

highlights.title: 鹿児島そうめんつゆの美味しさ再来
highlights.description: 前回に続き、鹿児島で食べた流しそうめんの「激ウマ」なつゆについて熱弁。甘じょっぱく濃厚な味が忘れられないと語る。

highlights.title: リスナーからの「ふぐり」コメントに反撃
highlights.description: むくんだ顔をリスナーに「ふぐり」といじられ、怒りながらも冗談でホロライブ運営に報告すると返す。顔面へのツッコミが絶えない。

highlights.title: 流しそうめんパーティーを企画
highlights.description: 鹿児島のそうめんつゆが通販で手に入ると知り、リスナーと流しそうめんパーティーの開催を夢見る。ポケモンに出てくるレックウザを借りるという冗談も飛び出す。

highlights.title: レックウザと流しそうめんパーティーの妄想
highlights.description: レックウザを借りて流しそうめんパーティーをするというアイデアに興奮。リスナーから冷静になるよう促され、自身の顔のむくみにも触れながら、まだ朝だと自分に言い聞かせる。

highlights.title: 「ふぐり」顔をネタにリスナーを翻弄
highlights.description: 自身の「ふぐり」顔を再度ネタにし、リスナーから「my leg」コールが来るなど、リスナーとの軽妙なやり取りが続く。

highlights.title: 映画「鬼滅の刃」とポップコーン体験
highlights.description: 父親と一緒に映画「鬼滅の刃」を観に行った話。映画館のトイレが想像以上に混んでいて驚いたこと、ポップコーンのMサイズを2つ買って食べきったエピソードを語る。

highlights.title: コーヒーの味の変化と新たな発見
highlights.description: 朝活中に飲んでいるコーヒーの味が時間が経つにつれてまろやかになり、より美味しくなったと報告。空気に触れて酸化したことで味が変化したことに驚き、味覚が覚醒したと感じる。

highlights.title: 映画「鬼滅の刃」の冨岡義勇への熱い思い
highlights.description: 鬼滅の刃のキャラクターで一番好きなのが冨岡義勇だと熱弁。彼の不器用さや、父親のような存在感に深く感動し、涙をこらえきれないほどの感情移入を見せる。

highlights.title: 不器用な父親キャラへの深い共感
highlights.description: 冨岡義勇だけでなく、クレヨンしんちゃんの野原ひろしなど、不器用ながらも家族を愛する父親キャラクターに強く惹かれることを語る。自身の理想の父親像でもあると明かす。

highlights.title: 顔のむくみの変化と「友達っていいな」
highlights.description: 顔のむくみが徐々に引いてきたと報告。リスナーとの交流を通して「友達っていいな」という感情が芽生えたと語り、そのきっかけとなった作品や自身の人生経験に触れる。

highlights.title: ホロライブメンバーとの絆と感謝
highlights.description: 「友達っていいな」というテーマで、普段から仲良くしてくれるホロライブメンバーへの感謝を語る。焼肉の思い出や、誕生日のお祝いなど、温かいエピソードを紹介。

highlights.title: 虎としてのアイデンティティと人間への憧れ
highlights.description: 自身が虎であるという設定を改めて強調し、虎だからこそ人間への憧れや、「友達」という感情が生まれたと話す。いつか人間になったら友達を作りたいという夢を語る。

highlights.title: リオンの早起きと応援
highlights.description: 配信中にリオンが起床したことが判明し、体操に行くリオンにエールを送る。リオンの頑張りを応援すると話す。

highlights.title: 顔のむくみの最終報告
highlights.description: 配信の終盤になり、顔のむくみがさらに引いてきていると報告。リスナーからの「むくみ取れた？」というコメントに嬉しそうに答える。

overview_en.summary: The streamer, Toragane Kisera, humorously discussed her face swelling from the previous day's curry, then passionately recounted her nagashi somen (flowing noodles) experience with a friend in Kagoshima and the delicious dipping sauce. From there, the conversation branched into her experience watching the movie "Demon Slayer," particularly the appeal of its characters and the impact the work had on her. She also delved into philosophical reflections on her interactions with Hololive members and her identity as a "tiger" with a longing to be "human." Throughout the stream, she kept the conversation lively and varied, incorporating humor while discussing food, movies, and even profound life perspectives.
overview_en.mood: The atmosphere was consistently amicable, with the streamer's self-deprecating humor and lighthearted exchanges with viewers eliciting laughter. At times, serious life philosophies were also shared, making for an emotionally rich stream.

highlights_en.title: Greetings at the Start of the Stream and Discussion of Facial Swelling
highlights_en.description: The streamer, Toragane Kisera, greeted viewers with a cute, hamster-like swollen face. Viewers commented on her puffy appearance.

highlights_en.title: The Cause of Facial Swelling: Late-Night Curry and Sleeping Without Brushing Teeth
highlights_en.description: She explained that her face was very swollen because she ate curry the night before and went to bed without brushing her teeth. She self-deprecatingly remarked that she had left her dignity as an idol to the curry.

highlights_en.title: Surprise at the Unusual Level of Facial Swelling
highlights_en.description: Her swelling was severe, leading viewers to comment "It's not just swelling" and "hamster." She added that the swelling was due to the salt content in the curry.

highlights_en.title: Morning Coffee Routine and Viewer Recommendations
highlights_en.description: She explained that she usually drinks coffee an hour after waking up, but for her morning stream, she drank it immediately. Viewers asked for coffee recommendations, starting a coffee discussion.

highlights_en.title: Ebisu Coffee and the Awakening of Taste
highlights_en.description: She mentioned hearing about whiskey-flavored Ebisu Coffee from a viewer but hadn't had a chance to try it. She recounted overcoming her aversion to coffee when her taste buds were off due to a cold, revealing that she started finding coffee delicious once she couldn't taste its bitterness.

highlights_en.title: Swelling Countermeasures and Teasing About Age
highlights_en.description: She mentioned that her facial swelling was caused by the salt in the curry, and brushing her teeth might have lessened it. Viewers teased her about her age, to which she retorted, "I'm still 24!"

highlights_en.title: Recommended Stick Coffee and Max Coffee
highlights_en.description: She recommended easy-to-drink powdered stick coffee, emphasizing to use plenty of hot water. She described Max Coffee as so sweet it could 'burn your brain'.

highlights_en.title: Past Experience with Excessive Energy Drink Consumption
highlights_en.description: She confessed to a period of excessive Red Bull Zero Sugar consumption, leading to caffeine addiction. She said she stopped drinking it because the overconsumption made her feel ill.

highlights_en.title: Commitment to Oils and Water for Beauty and Health
highlights_en.description: The conversation became lively with health-related topics, such as applying olive oil to her face for beauty and her pickiness about the type of water she drinks. She emphasized the importance of using water and oils that suit one's body.

highlights_en.title: Nagashi Somen Experience in Kagoshima Prefecture
highlights_en.description: She passionately spoke about the exceptionally delicious special dipping sauce at a nagashi somen restaurant she visited with a friend during a trip to Kagoshima. She recounted how deeply impressed she was by the complexity of somen dipping sauces.

highlights_en.title: Declaration to Participate in Pekomari Exercise with a Swollen Face
highlights_en.description: Viewers teased her about whether she would participate in Pekomari Exercise with her swollen face. She declared she would, drawing laughter. She continued the stream with her round, puffy face.

highlights_en.title: The Deliciousness of Kagoshima Somen Dipping Sauce Revisited
highlights_en.description: Continuing from before, she passionately described the "super delicious" dipping sauce for nagashi somen she ate in Kagoshima. She said she could not forget its sweet, savory, and rich taste.

highlights_en.title: Countering Viewer's 'Fuguri' Comment
highlights_en.description: Viewers teased her swollen face by calling it "fuguri" (scrotum), to which she jokingly threatened to report them to Hololive management, though she was angry. The teasing about her face continued relentlessly.

highlights_en.title: Planning a Nagashi Somen Party
highlights_en.description: Upon learning that Kagoshima somen dipping sauce is available online, she dreamed of holding a nagashi somen party with viewers. A joke about borrowing Rayquaza from Pokémon also came up.

highlights_en.title: Fantasy of Rayquaza and a Nagashi Somen Party
highlights_en.description: She became excited about the idea of holding a nagashi somen party by borrowing Rayquaza. Viewers urged her to calm down, and she reminded herself that it was still morning, also touching on her facial swelling.

highlights_en.title: Toying with Viewers by Joking About Her 'Fuguri' Face
highlights_en.description: She once again made fun of her 'fuguri' (scrotum) face, leading to lighthearted exchanges with viewers, including 'my leg' calls.

highlights_en.title: The Movie 'Demon Slayer' and Popcorn Experience
highlights_en.description: She talked about going to see the movie 'Demon Slayer' with her father. She expressed surprise at how crowded the movie theater restrooms were and recounted eating two medium-sized popcorns by herself.

highlights_en.title: Changes in Coffee Taste and New Discoveries
highlights_en.description: She reported that the taste of the coffee she was drinking during her morning stream became mellower and more delicious over time. She was surprised by the change in taste due to oxidation from exposure to air and felt her sense of taste had awakened.

highlights_en.title: Passionate Feelings for Giyu Tomioka from the Movie 'Demon Slayer'
highlights_en.description: She passionately declared that Giyu Tomioka is her favorite character from Demon Slayer. She was deeply moved by his clumsiness and father-like presence, showing such empathy that she could barely hold back tears.

highlights_en.title: Deep Empathy for Clumsy Father Characters
highlights_en.description: She spoke about being strongly drawn to father characters who, despite their clumsiness, deeply love their families, such as Giyu Tomioka and Hiroshi Nohara from Crayon Shin-chan. She revealed that this also represents her ideal father figure.

highlights_en.title: Changes in Facial Swelling and 'It's Nice to Have Friends'
highlights_en.description: She reported that her facial swelling was gradually receding. She spoke about a feeling of 'It's nice to have friends' blossoming through her interactions with viewers, touching upon works that inspired this feeling and her own life experiences.

highlights_en.title: Bonds and Gratitude with Hololive Members
highlights_en.description: Under the theme of 'It's nice to have friends,' she expressed gratitude to the Hololive members who are always kind to her. She shared heartwarming anecdotes, such as memories of yakiniku and birthday celebrations.

highlights_en.title: Identity as a Tiger and Longing to be Human
highlights_en.description: She re-emphasized her setting as a tiger and stated that precisely because she is a tiger, she developed a longing to be human and the feeling of 'friends.' She shared her dream of making friends if she ever becomes human.

highlights_en.title: Rion's Early Rising and Encouragement
highlights_en.description: It was revealed that Rion woke up during the stream, and she cheered Rion on as she went for her exercise. She said she would support Rion's efforts.

highlights_en.title: Final Report on Facial Swelling
highlights_en.description: Towards the end of the stream, she reported that her facial swelling had further receded. She happily responded to viewers' comments asking, "Has the swelling gone down?"

title: 【MUSIC】『Wind-Up』digital release party with behind the scenes music look YAY

overview.summary: Ceciliaが自身の新曲「Wind-Up」のデジタルリリースパーティーと楽曲制作の裏側を語る配信です。Gigi MurinのPCを使用しているため、慣れないセットアップに苦戦しつつも、新曲のリリースを喜び、その詳細や制作過程をDAW画面を共有しながら解説しました。楽曲の歌詞が自身の完璧主義との闘いや、SNS社会における他者との比較から生じる苦悩をテーマにしていることを深く掘り下げて説明しました。制作に協力してくれたクリエイター陣への感謝を述べ、各担当パートを具体的に紹介。終盤では、楽曲のフル歌唱を披露し、スーパーチャットが読めないトラブルがあったものの、視聴者への感謝と今後の活動予定を伝え、和やかな雰囲気で配信を締めくくりました。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、時折ユーモアを交えながら進行。

highlights.title: 配信開始と挨拶
highlights.description: 配信者が登場し、音声チェックなどを行いながら視聴者に挨拶します。慣れないセットアップ環境からのスタートです。

highlights.title: 新曲「Wind-Up」リリース告知
highlights.description: 自身の新曲「Wind-Up」がデジタルリリースされたことを告知します。現在、Gigi Murinの家に滞在しており、彼女のPCを使用しているため、通常のセットアップではないことを説明します。

highlights.title: FL Studioの紹介と楽曲制作の裏側
highlights.description: 楽曲制作に使用しているDAWが「FL Studio」であることを明かし、まるでGenius動画のように楽曲の裏側を解説する意図を語ります。新曲のインストゥルメンタル版と歌入り版の違いについても言及します。

highlights.title: 楽曲制作のきっかけと苦悩
highlights.description: 新曲制作のきっかけが1周年記念のオリジナル曲だったと語り、制作における苦労や、プロの助けを借りることを決めた経緯を説明します。

highlights.title: クリエイター陣の紹介と感謝
highlights.description: 楽曲制作に携わったAethoroなどのクリエイター陣を紹介し、彼らへの感謝を述べます。

highlights.title: 楽曲デモ版の解説とドラムの進化
highlights.description: 楽曲の初期デモ版についてDAW画面で詳しく解説します。特にドラムパートの初期の音が「赤ちゃんドラム」のようだったと話し、完成版との比較を通じてその進化を強調します。

highlights.title: Labsプラグインの活用とストリングスへの愛着
highlights.description: 無料のプラグイン「Labs」を使用してベース音源を制作したことや、その音が「ダイスが転がる音」に似ていることを紹介します。自身のPCにSpitfire Labs Strings Ensembleプラグインがインストールされていないため、オリジナルのストリングスサウンドを再現できないことに落胆します。

highlights.title: 歌詞の変更とパーフェクショニズム
highlights.description: 楽曲の歌詞が当初は暗い内容だったが、よりポジティブなものに変更した経緯を語ります。また、歌詞の一部がミクの歌に似ていたため修正したこと、自身の「パーフェクショニズム」と「先延ばし癖」についてユーモアを交えて話します。

highlights.title: デモ版から完成版へのプロセス
highlights.description: 最初のデモ版から完成版までの楽曲の各パート（ドラム、ベース、コード進行など）の変化をDAWで示しながら、制作過程の詳細を説明します。

highlights.title: 制作の苦労と楽曲のテーマ
highlights.description: 楽曲制作における「パーフェクショニズム」による「地獄の苦しみ」について語ります。最終的にこの曲がパーフェクショニズムを乗り越えたテーマになったことを示唆します。

highlights.title: 歌詞の表示と楽曲テーマの紹介
highlights.description: 楽曲の歌詞を画面に表示し、「Wind-Up」のテーマが自身の完璧主義と、それによって物事を先延ばしにしてしまう傾向にあることを説明します。

highlights.title: 完璧主義とSNSとの葛藤
highlights.description: 自分が「良いものでない」と感じるため、物事を始めるのに苦労すると語ります。特にSNSが普及した現代では、常に最高の作品だけが目に触れるため、自己比較に陥りやすいと説明します。

highlights.title: 趣味における完璧主義との戦い
highlights.description: 音楽制作だけでなく、アートやクラフト、モーションデザイン（After Effects）など、様々な趣味においても完璧主義と戦っていることを語ります。特にバイオリンのようにプロのレベルに達していないと感じると、練習を怠ってしまう傾向があると説明します。

highlights.title: 歌詞の構成と意味の深掘り
highlights.description: 「Wind-Up」の歌詞の構成について深く掘り下げます。Verse 1が苦悩、Verse 2が諦念、Bridgeが自己受容と希望、Chorusが「空が限界」というメッセージで完璧主義を乗り越えようとするテーマを表現していることを解説します。

highlights.title: 楽曲制作協力者とクレジット紹介
highlights.description: 楽曲制作に関わったクリエイター全員への感謝を述べ、クレジットを順に紹介します。プロデューサー・作詞・作曲をCecilia Immergreenが、プロデューサー・アレンジをAethoroが担当したと説明します。

highlights.title: ボーカルミキシングとマスタリング担当者紹介
highlights.description: ボーカルミキシングとマスタリングを担当したBiangoへの感謝を伝えます。ボーカル録音に苦労したエピソードも語ります。

highlights.title: ハーモニー、チューニング、タイミング担当者紹介
highlights.description: ハーモニー、チューニング、タイミングを担当したMiori Celestaに感謝を伝えます。

highlights.title: ヴィオラソロ担当者紹介
highlights.description: ヴィオラソロを担当したMoeko Kikuchiに感謝を伝えます。

highlights.title: FXアニメーション担当者紹介
highlights.description: FXアニメーションを担当したMami Sonokawaに感謝を伝えます。動画のアニメーションが手描きで描かれていることに言及し、その複雑さに驚きを示します。

highlights.title: Plingsの音とGigiのPCの不具合
highlights.description: 楽曲の「Plings」の音がうまく再生できないPCの不具合に言及し、視聴者に想像して聞くように促します。

highlights.title: 歌詞の変更経緯（再解説）
highlights.description: 「La la la」のパートについて、元々は歌詞があったが、歌うと息切れするような感じになりストレスフルだったため、敢えて歌詞をなくしたことを再説明します。

highlights.title: 視聴者への感謝とSuper Chat読み上げ不能の謝罪
highlights.description: 配信を見てくれた視聴者への感謝を述べ、Super Chatを読めない現在のPC設定トラブルについて謝罪します。

highlights.title: 新曲「Wind-Up」のフル歌唱
highlights.description: 歌詞ページを開きながら、自身の新曲「Wind-Up」をフルで歌唱します。

highlights.title: Gigi Murinによるジャンプスケア
highlights.description: 楽曲歌唱後、配信中にGigi Murinが部屋に入ってきてCeciliaを驚かせるハプニングが発生します。

highlights.title: 感謝と今後の活動予定
highlights.description: 配信の締めくくりとして、改めて視聴者や協力者への感謝を述べ、来週開催される「All for One Concert」で歌とダンスを披露する予定であることを告知します。

highlights.title: 配信終了
highlights.description: Ceciliaが視聴者に最後の挨拶を述べ、配信が終了しエンディングアニメーションに移行します。

overview_en.summary: This is a stream where Cecilia discusses the digital release party for her new song 'Wind-Up' and the behind-the-scenes process of its creation. Although she struggled with an unfamiliar setup as she was using Gigi Murin's PC, she expressed joy for the new song's release and explained its details and production process while sharing her DAW screen. She delved deeply into how the song's lyrics explore her struggle with perfectionism and the suffering that arises from comparing herself to others in SNS society. She expressed gratitude to the creators who collaborated on the production, specifically introducing each person's role. Towards the end, she performed a full vocal rendition of the song and, despite a technical issue preventing her from reading Super Chats, she conveyed her thanks to viewers and outlined her future plans, concluding the stream in a friendly atmosphere.
overview_en.mood: A consistently friendly atmosphere, occasionally progressing with humor.

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Greetings
highlights_en.description: The streamer appears and greets viewers while performing sound checks. The stream starts from an unfamiliar setup environment.

highlights_en.title: New Song 'Wind-Up' Release Announcement
highlights_en.description: She announces that her new song 'Wind-Up' has been digitally released. She explains that she is currently staying at Gigi Murin's house and using her PC, so it's not her usual setup.

highlights_en.title: Introduction to FL Studio and Song Production Behind the Scenes
highlights_en.description: She reveals that her DAW for music production is 'FL Studio' and expresses her intention to explain the song's behind-the-scenes, much like a Genius video. She also mentions the difference between the instrumental and vocal versions of the new song.

highlights_en.title: Origin and Struggles of Song Production
highlights_en.description: She explains that the new song was originally intended as an original song for her 1st anniversary, detailing the struggles during production and how she decided to seek professional help.

highlights_en.title: Introduction and Gratitude to Creators
highlights_en.description: She introduces the creators involved in the song's production, such as Aethoro, and expresses her gratitude to them.

highlights_en.title: Explanation of Song Demo Version and Drum Evolution
highlights_en.description: She elaborates on the song's initial demo version using the DAW screen. She specifically mentions that the early sound of the drum part was like 'baby drums' and emphasizes its evolution by comparing it to the completed version.

highlights_en.title: Utilization of Labs Plugin and Affection for Strings
highlights_en.description: She talks about creating the bass sound source using the free 'Labs' plugin and how its sound resembles 'rolling dice.' She expresses disappointment that she cannot reproduce the original string sound because the Spitfire Labs Strings Ensemble plugin is not installed on her PC.

highlights_en.title: Lyric Changes and Perfectionism
highlights_en.description: She discusses how the song's lyrics were initially dark but were changed to be more positive. She also mentions revising parts of the lyrics because they resembled Miku's singing and humorously talks about her 'perfectionism' and 'procrastination habit'.

highlights_en.title: Process from Demo Version to Completed Version
highlights_en.description: She explains the detailed production process, showing the changes in each part of the song (drums, bass, chord progression, etc.) from the first demo version to the completed version using the DAW.

highlights_en.title: Production Struggles and Song Theme
highlights_en.description: She talks about the 'hellish suffering' caused by 'perfectionism' during song production. She implies that this song ultimately became a theme of overcoming perfectionism.

highlights_en.title: Lyric Display and Song Theme Introduction
highlights_en.description: She displays the song's lyrics on screen and explains that the theme of 'Wind-Up' is her perfectionism and the tendency to procrastinate because of it.

highlights_en.title: Perfectionism and Conflict with SNS
highlights_en.description: She explains that she struggles to start things because she feels they are 'not good enough.' Especially in today's SNS-prevalent society, where only the best works are constantly seen, it's easy to fall into self-comparison.

highlights_en.title: Battle with Perfectionism in Hobbies
highlights_en.description: She talks about battling perfectionism not only in music production but also in various hobbies such as art, crafts, and motion design (After Effects). She explains that she tends to neglect practice, especially when she feels she hasn't reached a professional level, like with the violin.

highlights_en.title: Lyric Structure and Deeper Meaning
highlights_en.description: She delves deeper into the structure of 'Wind-Up' lyrics. She explains that Verse 1 expresses suffering, Verse 2 resignation, the Bridge self-acceptance and hope, and the Chorus conveys the theme of overcoming perfectionism with the message 'the sky is the limit'.

highlights_en.title: Song Production Collaborators and Credit Introduction
highlights_en.description: She thanks all the creators involved in the song's production and introduces the credits in order. She explains that Cecilia Immergreen handled production, lyrics, and composition, while Aethoro was responsible for production and arrangement.

highlights_en.title: Vocal Mixing and Mastering Engineer Introduction
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude to Biango, who handled vocal mixing and mastering. She also shares an anecdote about struggling with vocal recording.

highlights_en.title: Harmony, Tuning, and Timing Engineer Introduction
highlights_en.description: She thanks Miori Celesta, who was responsible for harmony, tuning, and timing.

highlights_en.title: Viola Solo Performer Introduction
highlights_en.description: She thanks Moeko Kikuchi, who performed the viola solo.

highlights_en.title: FX Animation Artist Introduction
highlights_en.description: She thanks Mami Sonokawa, who handled the FX animation. She mentions that the video's animation is hand-drawn and expresses surprise at its complexity.

highlights_en.title: Pling Sound and Gigi's PC Glitch
highlights_en.description: She mentions a PC glitch that prevents the song's 'Pling' sound from playing correctly and encourages viewers to imagine it.

highlights_en.title: Lyric Change Background (Re-explanation)
highlights_en.description: She re-explains that the 'La la la' part originally had lyrics, but because singing them felt breathless and stressful, she intentionally removed them.

highlights_en.title: Thanks to Viewers and Apology for Unable to Read Super Chat
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude to viewers for watching the stream and apologizes for the current PC setup issue that prevents her from reading Super Chats.

highlights_en.title: Full Vocal Performance of New Song 'Wind-Up'
highlights_en.description: She performs a full vocal rendition of her new song 'Wind-Up' while displaying the lyric page.

highlights_en.title: Jump Scare by Gigi Murin
highlights_en.description: After the song performance, an incident occurs where Gigi Murin enters the room during the stream and jump-scares Cecilia.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude and Future Activity Plans
highlights_en.description: To conclude the stream, she reiterates her thanks to viewers and collaborators and announces her plan to perform singing and dancing at the 'All for One Concert' next week.

highlights_en.title: Stream End
highlights_en.description: Cecilia gives her final greetings to viewers, the stream ends, and it transitions to the ending animation.

title: 【朝活 】あさですよ～～【#輪堂千速 / #hololivedev_is  #FLOWGLOW 】

overview.summary: 輪堂千速が夏らしい水着の新衣装を初お披露目した朝活雑談配信。自身の新衣装だけでなく、同期「FLOWGLOW」メンバーの3Dモデルの写真を見せながら、それぞれの衣装や特徴について語った。自身のスマホの調子が悪く、アプリの更新ができない、バッテリーの持ちが悪いなど、古いスマホの悩みを打ち明ける場面も。漫画アプリの広告に表示されるゲームが面白すぎて時間を浪費してしまうという、自身の体験談で盛り上がった。広告の質が低下している現状や、閉じにくい小さなバツボタンに関する不満を爆発させる一幕も。最終的にはスマホの買い替えを決意し、視聴者から様々なアドバイスが寄せられた。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、時折爆笑や自虐ネタが飛び出す楽しい配信

highlights.title: 新衣装のお披露目
highlights.description: 輪堂千速が夏らしい水着の新衣装を初お披露目。背後の白いオーラはパネルのサイズ調整ミスだったことが判明し、笑いが起こる。視聴者からの新衣装に対するコメントに喜ぶ。

highlights.title: FLOWGLOWの3Dモデル紹介
highlights.description: 同期FLOWGLOWメンバーの3Dモデルのスクショを公開。ラプラス・ダークネスの尻尾の五芒星や、ぺこら先輩のふわふわの尻尾、マリン船長のダンス中の様子など、それぞれの個性的な特徴を熱く語る。

highlights.title: スマホの不調と買い替え決意
highlights.description: 自身のスマホが古すぎてアプリのアップデートができない、バッテリーが持たないなどの悩みを打ち明ける。視聴者からのアドバイスを受け、最終的にスマホの買い替えを決意する。

highlights.title: 過去のゲーム遍歴と現在のアプリ事情
highlights.description: 過去にプレイしていた多数のゲームタイトルを列挙。現在は容量不足のためほとんどのゲームは削除済みであること、漫画アプリやSNSアプリ、電子決済アプリなどで容量が埋まっている現状を語る。

highlights.title: スマホ買い替えに関する悩みと決意
highlights.description: 古いAndroidスマホのOSアップデートが終了し、セキュリティリスクがあること、データ移行の手間、新しい機種への乗り換えの難しさについて悩みを語る。最終的には、視聴者からの助言もあり、買い替えを約束する。

highlights.title: 早朝配信と仕事について
highlights.description: 滅多にない早朝からの配信について言及し、自身が夜型人間であることを改めて語る。お盆休み中の視聴者が多いことに触れつつ、自身はこれから仕事に向かうため早めに配信を終了すると伝える。

highlights.title: スマホのアプリと容量問題
highlights.description: 自身のスマホに入っているアプリの多さ（漫画、SNS、電子決済など）を語り、容量不足とOSの古さによるアプリの更新不可の問題について詳しく説明。ゲームアプリは容量の問題で削除済みであることを明かす。

highlights.title: 漫画アプリの広告ゲームに関するトーク
highlights.description: 漫画を読むつもりが、広告に出てくるゲームが面白くてついつい始めてしまい、時間を無駄にしていることについて話す。広告のゲームで時間を潰すことの自覚と葛藤を語る。

highlights.title: 広告ゲームの楽しさと時間浪費の葛藤
highlights.description: 広告ゲームで時間を無駄にしていると自覚しつつも、「でも面白いんだよ」とやめられない葛藤を語る。特に深夜に眠れなくて始めると、気づけば時間が過ぎていると笑う。

highlights.title: 好きなパズルゲームのジャンルと難しさ
highlights.description: テトリスのような時間制限のあるゲームは苦手だが、焦らせないタイプのパズルゲームが好きだと話す。色指定されたネジを正しい順序で抜いていくパズルゲームは難しくて面白いと語る。

highlights.title: 広告ゲームでのRTA
highlights.description: 漫画アプリの広告で試遊できるゲームがあり、広告が表示されている間にどこまで進められるかを自分の中でRTA（リアルタイムアタック）として楽しんでいると明かす。広告に全力を注ぐという独特な楽しみ方を語る。

highlights.title: 広告の質と閉じるボタン問題
highlights.description: 最近のアプリ広告は質が低下しており、特に閉じるボタンが小さすぎたり見つけにくい場所に配置されていることに不満を爆発させる。誤って広告先のアプリをインストールさせられた経験も語る。

highlights.title: 広告に関する熱い語りからのテーマチェンジ
highlights.description: 広告の話題で大いに盛り上がった後、「何の話ししてんだろ」と我に返り、配信テーマの「あさかつ」に話を戻すことを試みる。

highlights.title: 配信終了の挨拶と感謝
highlights.description: 配信が終了する時間を迎え、視聴者への感謝を伝える。「明日も頑張るね」と前向きな言葉で締めくくる。

tags: ラプラス・ダークネス

overview_en.summary: Rindo Chihaya's morning chat stream where she unveiled her new summer-themed swimsuit outfit for the first time. She not only showed off her own new outfit but also displayed photos of her fellow FLOWGLOW members' 3D models, discussing each of their outfits and features. There were moments where she confessed her struggles with her old smartphone, such as being unable to update apps and poor battery life. The stream got lively when she shared her experience of wasting time on games displayed in manga app ads because they were too fun. She also expressed her frustration with the current decline in ad quality and the small, hard-to-close 'x' buttons. Ultimately, she decided to buy a new smartphone, receiving various advice from viewers.
overview_en.mood: A consistently friendly and fun stream, occasionally punctuated by bursts of laughter and self-deprecating humor.

highlights_en.title: New Outfit Reveal
highlights_en.description: Rindo Chihaya unveiled her new summer-themed swimsuit outfit for the first time. Laughter erupted when it was revealed that the white aura behind her was due to a panel size adjustment error. She was delighted by viewers' comments on her new outfit.

highlights_en.title: Introduction of FLOWGLOW's 3D Models
highlights_en.description: She revealed screenshots of the 3D models of her fellow FLOWGLOW members. She passionately discussed each of their unique characteristics, such as La+ Darknesss's pentagram tail, Pekora-senpai's fluffy tail, and Captain Marine's appearance while dancing.

highlights_en.title: Smartphone Malfunction and Decision to Replace
highlights_en.description: She confessed her struggles with her smartphone being too old to update apps and having poor battery life. After receiving advice from viewers, she ultimately decided to buy a new smartphone.

highlights_en.title: Past Gaming History and Current App Situation
highlights_en.description: She listed numerous game titles she used to play. She explained that most games are now deleted due to insufficient storage and that her storage is currently filled with manga apps, social media apps, and e-payment apps.

highlights_en.title: Concerns and Decision Regarding Smartphone Replacement
highlights_en.description: She shared her concerns about her old Android smartphone's OS updates having ended, posing security risks, the hassle of data migration, and the difficulty of switching to a new model. Ultimately, with advice from viewers, she promised to buy a new one.

highlights_en.title: Morning Stream and Work
highlights_en.description: She mentioned the rare early morning stream and reiterated that she is a night person. While noting many viewers were on Obon holidays, she stated she would end the stream early as she was heading to work.

highlights_en.title: Smartphone Apps and Storage Issues
highlights_en.description: She discussed the large number of apps on her smartphone (manga, social media, e-payment, etc.) and elaborated on the issues of insufficient storage and inability to update apps due to an old OS. She revealed that game apps had been deleted due to storage problems.

highlights_en.title: Talk About Games in Manga App Ads
highlights_en.description: She talked about how she intended to read manga but ended up starting games from ads because they were so fun, leading her to waste time. She discussed her awareness and internal conflict about spending time on ad games.

highlights_en.title: The Enjoyment of Ad Games and the Conflict of Wasting Time
highlights_en.description: She described her internal conflict of knowing she's wasting time on ad games but being unable to stop, saying, 'But they're fun!' She laughed, mentioning how time flies, especially when she starts playing late at night when she can't sleep.

highlights_en.title: Favorite Puzzle Game Genres and Difficulty
highlights_en.description: She said she dislikes time-limited games like Tetris but enjoys puzzle games that don't rush her. She found puzzle games where you have to remove color-coded screws in the correct order to be difficult yet interesting.

highlights_en.title: RTA in Ad Games
highlights_en.description: She revealed that there are games playable as trials in manga app ads, and she enjoys them as a personal RTA (Real-Time Attack) to see how far she can progress while the ad is displayed. She described this unique way of enjoying ads by giving her full effort.

highlights_en.title: Ad Quality and Close Button Issue
highlights_en.description: She furiously expressed her frustration that recent app ads have declined in quality, especially with close buttons being too small or placed in hard-to-find locations. She also shared her experience of accidentally installing apps from ads.

highlights_en.title: Transitioning from Passionate Talk about Ads
highlights_en.description: After getting very animated about ads, she came back to her senses, thinking, 'What am I even talking about?', and tried to bring the conversation back to the stream's theme, 'Asakatsu' (morning activities/stream).

highlights_en.title: Stream Ending Greeting and Gratitude
highlights_en.description: As the stream approached its end, she expressed gratitude to her viewers. She concluded with positive words, saying, 'I'll do my best tomorrow too.'

title: 【HOLOLIVE GOROGORO MOUNTAIN】rolling up to the top of hololive hill 🐾 【FUWAMOCO】

overview.summary: FUWAMOCOの3Dモデルがお披露目された後、ホロライブメンバーをデフォルメしたボールを転がしてゴールを目指すゲーム「HOLOLIVE GOROGORO MOUNTAIN」をプレイ。ときのそらステージで好記録を出した後、「Return of the Houshou Pirate Island」のステージ3、そして「Polka Show!」「This Is Work Daily Life Edition」と次々に新しいステージをクリアしていく。さらに「FUWAMOCO Island!」と「Holo Graffiti」ステージもクリアし、最終ステージ「hololive Fes Final Stage」に挑戦するが、時間切れでゲームオーバーとなる。各ステージではホロメンの異なる姿のボールが登場し、可愛らしいリアクションとハプニングを交えながら楽しんでプレイしている。
overview.mood: 終始和やかで楽しげな雰囲気、時々ハプニングに焦る場面もあり、終盤は悔しさもにじむ

highlights.title: OPアニメーション
highlights.description: FUWAMOCOの可愛らしいOPアニメーションが流れる。

highlights.title: 3Dお披露目＆オープニングトーク
highlights.description: FUWAMOCOの3Dモデルがお披露目され、視聴者への挨拶と今回の配信でプレイするゲーム「HOLOLIVE GOROGORO MOUNTAIN」について説明。

highlights.title: ゲーム概要説明
highlights.description: ゲームのメイン画面が表示され、FUWAMOCOの2人がゲーム内容について説明。ホロメンを転がしてゴールを目指すゲーム。

highlights.title: 宝鐘マリン登場とルール説明
highlights.description: 宝鐘マリンが3Dで登場し、ゲームのルール説明とステージ紹介を行う。今回のゲームのテーマが「宝鐘マリンの宝物マウンテン」であること、ホロメンを転がしてゴールを目指すこと、そして「推し活」の重要性について語る。

highlights.title: 操作方法説明
highlights.description: ゲームのルール説明画面で、移動と投げる操作について説明される。

highlights.description: ときのそらが進化し、水着衣装のときのそらボールが登場。引き続きコインを集めながら進む。

highlights.title: ときのそら進化（私服衣装）
highlights.description: ときのそらがさらに進化し、私服衣装のときのそらボールが登場。引き続きゴールを目指す。

highlights.title: 1ステージ目クリア
highlights.description: ときのそらステージをクリアし、リザルト画面でクリアタイムと獲得コイン数が表示される。2つ星を獲得。

highlights.title: 1ステージ目再挑戦
highlights.description: FUWAMOCOがより良いスコアを目指してときのそらステージに再挑戦。

highlights.description: 再挑戦で2段階目のときのそらボールが登場。

highlights.description: 何度も挑戦した末、スムーズにときのそらボールを転がし、3分53秒でステージをクリア。3つ星を獲得し、新記録を達成した。

overview_en.summary: After FUWAMOCO's 3D models were unveiled, they played "HOLOLIVE GOROGORO MOUNTAIN," a game where they roll Hololive members in deformed ball forms to reach the goal. After setting a good record on the Tokino Sora stage, they successively cleared new stages: "Return of the Houshou Pirate Island" Stage 3, "Polka Show!", and "This Is Work Daily Life Edition". They also cleared "FUWAMOCO Island!" and "Holo Graffiti" stages, then challenged the final stage, "hololive Fes Final Stage," but ran out of time and got a game over. In each stage, Holomem balls with different appearances emerged, and they enjoyed playing with cute reactions and occasional mishaps.
overview_en.mood: A consistently peaceful and cheerful atmosphere, occasionally with moments of panic due to mishaps, and a touch of frustration towards the end.

highlights_en.title: OP Animation
highlights_en.description: A cute OP animation of FUWAMOCO plays.

highlights_en.title: 3D Debut & Opening Talk
highlights_en.description: FUWAMOCO's 3D models are unveiled, followed by greetings to viewers and an explanation of "HOLOLIVE GOROGORO MOUNTAIN," the game they will play in this stream.

highlights_en.title: Game Overview Explanation
highlights_en.description: The game's main screen is displayed, and FUWAMOCO explains the game content. It's a game where you roll Holomems to reach the goal.

highlights_en.title: Houshou Marine Appears and Rules Explained
highlights_en.description: Houshou Marine appears in 3D to explain the game rules and introduce the stages. She talks about the game's theme being "Houshou Marine's Treasure Mountain," rolling Holomems to reach the goal, and the importance of "oshi-katsu" (supporting your favorite idol).

highlights_en.title: Controls Explanation
highlights_en.description: The game rules screen explains how to move and throw.

highlights_en.title: Tokino Sora Stage Starts
highlights_en.description: Stage 1 begins. The first target is Tokino Sora. They roll Tokino Sora like a rock, collecting coins as they go.

highlights_en.title: Tokino Sora Evolution (Swimsuit Outfit)
highlights_en.description: Tokino Sora evolves, and a Tokino Sora ball in a swimsuit outfit appears. They continue to collect coins as they progress.

highlights_en.title: Tokino Sora Evolution (Casual Outfit)
highlights_en.description: Tokino Sora further evolves, and a Tokino Sora ball in a casual outfit appears. They continue aiming for the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 1 Clear
highlights_en.description: They clear the Tokino Sora stage, and the clear time and number of coins acquired are displayed on the results screen. They earn 2 stars.

highlights_en.title: Retrying Stage 1
highlights_en.description: FUWAMOCO retries the Tokino Sora stage, aiming for a better score.

highlights_en.title: 2nd Evolution Tokino Sora Reappears
highlights_en.description: The second evolution of the Tokino Sora ball appears during the retry.

highlights_en.title: 3rd Evolution Tokino Sora Reappears
highlights_en.description: The third evolution of the Tokino Sora ball appears during the retry.

highlights_en.title: FUWAMOCO Challenges Repeatedly
highlights_en.description: The Tokino Sora ball repeatedly falls into unexpected places or gets stuck in walls, leading to continuous struggles and repeated challenges.

highlights_en.title: Stage Clear with a Good Record!
highlights_en.description: After many attempts, they smoothly rolled the Tokino Sora ball and cleared the stage in 3 minutes and 53 seconds. They earned 3 stars and achieved a new record.

highlights_en.title: Tokino Sora Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Tokino Sora Treasure" as a reward for clearing the Tokino Sora stage.

highlights_en.title: Stage 3 Start: "Return of the Houshou Pirate Island"
highlights_en.description: They challenge Stage 3 of the new stage, "Return of the Houshou Pirate Island." It's a night stage with many cannons and barrels.

highlights_en.title: Rolling Shirakami Fubuki
highlights_en.description: The first target is Shirakami Fubuki. They proceed while avoiding cannonballs.

highlights_en.title: Rolling Oozora Subaru
highlights_en.description: The target switches to Oozora Subaru.

highlights_en.title: Rolling Minato Aqua
highlights_en.description: The target switches to Minato Aqua.

highlights_en.title: Rolling Roboco-san

highlights_en.title: Rolling Yuzuki Choco
highlights_en.description: The target switches to Yuzuki Choco.

highlights_en.title: Rolling Nakiri Ayame

highlights_en.title: Rolling Usada Pekora

highlights_en.title: Rolling Houshou Marine

highlights_en.title: Rolling Shirakami Fubuki
highlights_en.description: The target switches to Shirakami Fubuki.

highlights_en.description: The target switches to Roboco-san.

highlights_en.description: They continue to roll Roboco-san, the final target of Stage 3, being careful of obstacles and walls. There was a mishap where the ball got stuck in a wall, but they successfully aimed for the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 3 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Roboco-san's stage, with a clear time of 07:30 and 64 coins acquired, earning 2 stars.

highlights_en.title: Roboco-san Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Roboco-san Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.description: They cleared Usada Pekora's stage, with a clear time of 09:30 and 39 coins acquired, earning 1 star.

highlights_en.description: They challenge the next stage, "This Is Work Daily Life Edition." It's an office-like stage, and the first target is Momosuzu Nene.

highlights_en.title: Momosuzu Nene Evolution (Ponytail)
highlights_en.description: The Momosuzu Nene ball evolves into a ponytail appearance. Bookshelves and desks appear as obstacles.

highlights_en.title: Momosuzu Nene Evolution (Bear Ears)
highlights_en.description: The Momosuzu Nene ball evolves into an appearance with bear ears and a tail.

highlights_en.title: Momosuzu Nene Evolution (Final Form)
highlights_en.description: The Momosuzu Nene ball evolves into its final form. They roll it towards the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 6 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Momosuzu Nene's stage, with a clear time of 09:30 and 44 coins acquired, earning 1 star.

highlights_en.title: Momosuzu Nene Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Momosuzu Nene Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.title: Stage 7 Start: "FUWAMOCO Island!"
highlights_en.description: They challenge the next stage, "FUWAMOCO Island!". It's an island-themed stage, and the first target is Shirakami Fubuki.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Evolution (Flower Ornament)
highlights_en.description: The Shirakami Fubuki ball evolves into a swimsuit appearance with a flower ornament on its head.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Evolution (Casual Outfit)
highlights_en.description: The Shirakami Fubuki ball evolves into a casual civilian clothes appearance.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Evolution (Fox Ears and Tail)
highlights_en.description: The Shirakami Fubuki ball evolves into an appearance with fox ears and a tail.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Evolution (Final Form)
highlights_en.description: The Shirakami Fubuki ball evolves into its final form. They roll it towards the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 7 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Shirakami Fubuki's stage, with a clear time of 09:30 and 56 coins acquired, earning 1 star.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Shirakami Fubuki Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.title: Stage 8 Start: "First Live!"
highlights_en.description: They challenge the next stage, "First Live!". It's a concert venue-like stage, and the first target is Oozora Subaru.

highlights_en.title: Oozora Subaru Evolution (Cheerleader)
highlights_en.description: The Oozora Subaru ball evolves into a cheerleader-like outfit.

highlights_en.title: Oozora Subaru Evolution (Hoodie Outfit)
highlights_en.description: The Oozora Subaru ball evolves into a casual hoodie outfit.

highlights_en.title: Oozora Subaru Evolution (Sportswear)
highlights_en.description: The Oozora Subaru ball evolves into a sportswear-like outfit.

highlights_en.title: Oozora Subaru Evolution (Final Form)
highlights_en.description: The Oozora Subaru ball evolves into its final form. They roll it towards the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 8 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Oozora Subaru's stage, with a clear time of 09:30 and 55 coins acquired, earning 1 star.

highlights_en.title: Oozora Subaru Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Oozora Subaru Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.title: Stage 9 Start: "Holo Graffiti"
highlights_en.description: They challenge the next stage, "Holo Graffiti." It's an alley-like stage featuring graffiti art, and the first target is Minato Aqua.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Evolution (Maid Outfit)
highlights_en.description: The Minato Aqua ball evolves into a maid outfit.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Evolution (Hoodie Outfit)
highlights_en.description: The Minato Aqua ball evolves into a casual hoodie outfit.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Evolution (Apron Outfit)
highlights_en.description: The Minato Aqua ball evolves into an appearance wearing an apron and a hat.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Evolution (Final Form)
highlights_en.description: The Minato Aqua ball evolves into its final form. They roll it towards the goal.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Evolution (Final Form) Continued
highlights_en.description: They continue rolling the final form of the Minato Aqua ball, navigating through the office-like stage.

highlights_en.title: Stage 9 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Minato Aqua's stage, with a clear time of 05:49 and 39 coins acquired, earning 2 stars.

highlights_en.title: Minato Aqua Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Minato Aqua Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.title: Retrying Stage 7: "FUWAMOCO Island!"
highlights_en.description: They retry "FUWAMOCO Island!". It's an island-themed stage, and the first target is Shirakami Fubuki. The ball changes its appearance mid-stage.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Evolution (Final Form) Continued
highlights_en.description: They continue rolling the final form of the Shirakami Fubuki ball, avoiding stage gimmicks and aiming for the goal.

highlights_en.title: Stage 7 Clear and Results
highlights_en.description: They cleared Shirakami Fubuki's stage, with a clear time of 08:11 and 28 coins acquired, earning 2 stars.

highlights_en.title: Shirakami Fubuki Treasure Acquired
highlights_en.description: They acquire "Shirakami Fubuki Treasure" as a reward for clearing the stage.

highlights_en.title: Final Stage "hololive Fes Final Stage" Challenge Begins
highlights_en.description: They challenge the final stage, "hololive Fes Final Stage." The target is Tokino Sora. The stage is complex, and they fall off repeatedly.

highlights_en.title: Tokino Sora Evolution and Game Over
highlights_en.description: The Tokino Sora ball appears in various forms, but due to the complex stage, they repeatedly fall off and cannot reach the goal within the time limit, resulting in a game over.

highlights_en.title: Ending Talk
highlights_en.description: They express regret for not being able to clear all stages in this stream but convey how much fun they had. They announce future stream schedules and thank the viewers.

title: 【新ボイス】波音とチルタイム

overview.summary: ホロライブのキャラクター、雪花ラミィと虎金妃笑虎が海辺で過ごす様子を描いたASMR音声作品の紹介動画です。美しい星空や波の音に癒やされながら、二人の他愛ない会話が繰り広げられます。特に雪花ラミィによる甘い囁きボイスは、リスナーを心地よいリラックスタイムへと誘います。
overview.mood: 終始和やかで、癒やしとロマンスが混じり合った心地よい雰囲気

highlights.title: 虎金妃笑虎の星空への感動
highlights.description: 虎金妃笑虎が海辺の美しい星空とその水面への反射について語り、その美しさに感動する場面。

highlights.title: 虎金妃笑虎、流れ星にお願い事
highlights.description: 虎金妃笑虎が流れ星を見つけ、「浮気されませんように」と繰り返しお願い事をし、流れ星のサービス精神に言及するコミカルな場面。

highlights.title: 雪花ラミィの視線への気づき
highlights.description: 雪花ラミィが、海辺が混んでいることに触れ、周りから見られている気がすると少し恥ずかしがる様子。

highlights.title: 雪花ラミィの甘い囁き
highlights.description: 雪花ラミィが「安心して。可愛い彼女を独り占めできるのは、世界でキミだけなんだから。」と甘く囁くASMRパート。

overview_en.summary: This is an introductory video for an ASMR audio work featuring Hololive characters, Yukihana Lamy and Kokinbi Emi-ko, spending time at the beach. While being soothed by the beautiful starry sky and the sound of waves, the two engage in casual conversation. In particular, Yukihana Lamy's sweet whispering voice invites listeners into a comfortable, relaxing time.
overview_en.mood: Consistently peaceful, a comfortable atmosphere blending healing and romance

highlights_en.title: Kokinbi Emi-ko's Awe for the Starry Sky
highlights_en.description: A scene where Kokinbi Emi-ko talks about the beautiful starry sky at the beach and its reflection on the water's surface, expressing her awe at its beauty.

highlights_en.title: Kokinbi Emi-ko Makes a Wish on a Shooting Star
highlights_en.description: A comical scene where Kokinbi Emi-ko spots a shooting star, repeatedly wishes 'Please don't let me be cheated on,' and comments on the shooting star's 'service-mindedness.'

highlights_en.title: Yukihana Lamy's Awareness of Being Watched
highlights_en.description: Yukihana Lamy mentions that the beach is crowded and seems slightly embarrassed, feeling like she's being watched by others.

highlights_en.title: Yukihana Lamy's Sweet Whisper
highlights_en.description: An ASMR part where Yukihana Lamy sweetly whispers, 'Don't worry. You're the only one in the world who can have such a cute girlfriend all to yourself.'

title: チェリーポップ - DECO*27 / Covered by 風真いろは

overview.summary: 風真いろはさんによるDECO*27の楽曲「チェリーポップ」の歌ってみた動画です。ポップでリズミカルなサウンドに乗せて、恋愛における複雑な感情や、承認欲求、葛藤を表現した歌詞を、力強くも切なく歌い上げています。可愛らしいアニメーションと歌詞の表現が融合し、楽曲の世界観を豊かに彩る魅力的な作品となっています。
overview.mood: 切なくも力強い、ポップでリズミカル

highlights.title: 「チェリーポップ」歌唱開始
highlights.description: DECO*27「チェリーポップ」のカバーがスタート。イントロからアップテンポな曲調と、イラストのアニメーションが展開されます。

highlights.title: 「あたし一等賞が欲しいのよ」
highlights.description: 恋愛における認められたい願望や、少し自虐的な感情が込められた歌詞が歌われます。

highlights.title: 「本命になれないわ死んじまうわ」
highlights.description: 恋の切なさや、誰かに必要とされたいという強い思いが表現されています。

highlights.title: サビ「愛していいか」
highlights.description: 恋の駆け引きと爆発する感情が、パワフルな歌声で歌い上げられるサビが始まります。

highlights.title: 間奏のセリフ「いやーほんと…」
highlights.description: 曲のクールダウンと共に、風真いろはさんの感情がこもったセリフが挿入されます。

highlights.title: 「辞書にないやつをください」
highlights.description: 恋愛における純粋でありながらも、少し皮肉めいた問いかけの歌詞が印象的です。

highlights.title: 「おまえの好きは好きじゃない吐いちまうわ」
highlights.description: 恋の複雑な感情をストレートに吐露する歌詞が続きます。

highlights.title: 終盤のサビ「愛していいか」
highlights.description: 再び感情が高まるサビが始まり、曲のクライマックスへと向かいます。

highlights.title: 終盤のセリフ「ハイカイサン」
highlights.description: 曲の雰囲気に合わせた、ユニークで可愛らしいセリフで締めくくられます。

overview_en.summary: This is a cover song video of DECO*27's song 'Cherry Pop' by Kazama Iroha. Against a pop and rhythmic sound, she powerfully yet melancholically sings lyrics that express complex emotions in love, the desire for recognition, and internal conflicts. The charming animation and lyrical expressions merge, creating a captivating work that richly colors the song's world.
overview_en.mood: Melancholic yet powerful, pop and rhythmic

highlights_en.title: 'Cherry Pop' Singing Starts
highlights_en.description: The cover of DECO*27's 'Cherry Pop' begins. From the intro, an upbeat melody and animated illustrations unfold.

highlights_en.title: 'I want to be number one'
highlights_en.description: Lyrics expressing the desire to be acknowledged in love and slightly self-deprecating feelings are sung.

highlights_en.title: 'I can't be your main squeeze, I'll die'
highlights_en.description: The sadness of love and a strong desire to be needed by someone are expressed.

highlights_en.title: Chorus: 'Is it okay to love?'
highlights_en.description: The chorus begins, where the give-and-take of love and exploding emotions are sung with a powerful voice.

highlights_en.title: Interlude Dialogue: 'Well, truly...'
highlights_en.description: Along with the song's cooldown, Kazama Iroha's emotional dialogue is inserted.

highlights_en.title: 'Give me something not in the dictionary'
highlights_en.description: Lyrics that are pure yet slightly ironic questions about love are impressive.

highlights_en.title: 'Your 'like' isn't a 'like', I'm gonna throw up'
highlights_en.description: Lyrics continue, directly expressing the complex emotions of love.

highlights_en.title: Final Chorus: 'Is it okay to love?'
highlights_en.description: The chorus, where emotions rise again, begins, leading towards the song's climax.

highlights_en.title: Final Dialogue: 'Haikaisan'
highlights_en.description: The song concludes with unique and charming dialogue matching its atmosphere.

title: 【雑談/FreeTalk】かなたんソロライブゲストなど怒涛の一週間【ホロライブ / AZKi】

overview.summary: AZKiが天音かなたのソロライブ「Amane Kanata 1st Solo Live “LOOK ON”」のゲスト出演を振り返る雑談配信の終盤。リスナーからのスパチャを読み上げ、ライブへの深い感動や裏話、個人的な感想を共有する。高難易度楽曲のパフォーマンスやライブタイトルの「LOOK ON」に隠された「ROCK ON」（石）の多重意味に共感。海外からの日帰り参加者への感謝、ライブ後の打ち上げへの期待、そしてホロサマの告知も交え、リスナーとの温かい交流の中で、怒涛の一週間を締めくくる。
overview.mood: 全体的に和やかで、自身の経験を楽しく振り返る様子が伝わる。感動や驚き、苦労話も交えながら、終始ポジティブな雰囲気で進行する。ライブへの興奮と愛情が溢れている。

highlights.title: 雑談の開始とホロサマサマーパーク完成の話
highlights.description: AZKiが挨拶をして配信が開始。冒頭の告知映像について触れつつ、ホロサマサマーパークが完成したことについて言及する。

highlights.title: かなたソロライブの振り返りについて言及
highlights.description: 天音かなたのソロライブにゲスト出演したことについて、きちんと振り返りたいと語る。

highlights.title: 怒涛の一週間について話したい
highlights.description: 最近の「怒涛の一週間」の出来事を振り返りたいと語り、その中でも天音かなたのライブが最も印象的だったと話す。

highlights.title: かなたソロライブゲスト出演について
highlights.description: 天音かなたのソロライブ「LOOK ON」にゲスト出演したことについて、本格的に話し始める。時系列に沿ってリハーサルの話などもしたいと語る。

highlights.title: かなたソロライブを長年待ち望んだAZKi
highlights.description: 天音かなたのソロライブは3年前から待ち望んでいたこと、ファーストアルバムリリース時にもソロライブを期待していたことを語る。

highlights.title: かなたとの関係性の歴史を振り返る
highlights.description: かなたのオリジナル曲や、過去のフェスで一緒に歌ったことなど、かなたとの交流の歴史を振り返り、深い関係性を語る。

highlights.title: ゲスト出演のオファーを受けた時の喜び
highlights.description: かなたのソロライブへのゲスト出演のオファーを本当に想像していなかったため、オファーを受けた際に心から感謝し、とても嬉しかったと語る。
