highlights.title: 歌唱曲「史上主義アドトラック」と「蜜バナー結び目」の難しさ
highlights.description: ライブでかなたと一緒に歌った「史上主義アドトラック」と「蜜バナー結び目」について触れる。これらの曲が非常にリズムが難しく、リハーサルで苦戦したことを明かす。

highlights.title: リハーサルでの歌唱の苦労
highlights.description: 「蜜バナー結び目」のハモりラインとメインラインが複雑に入り混じる構成が非常に難しく、歌に集中しすぎて動きがぎこちなかったと振り返る。

highlights.title: かなたの「結石排出確認」ポストとAZKiのリプライ
highlights.description: ライブ当日の朝、天音かなたがX（旧Twitter）に投稿した「結石排出確認」のポストを見て、AZKiが「ROCK ON ってこと！？石とね」とリプライしたことについて語る。このリプライがライブタイトル「LOOK ON」と「石」をかけたトリプルミーニングだったことを明かす。

highlights.title: ライブMC裏話
highlights.description: 本番のMCでこの話題に触れたかったが時間が足りなかったこと、またゲネプロ（本番想定のリハーサル）での天音かなたの対応力の高さについて語る。銃の振り付けとレーザーが連動する演出が素晴らしかったと絶賛する。

highlights.title: ライブ当日のお弁当
highlights.description: ライブ当日の弁当が朝は豪華なうなぎ弁当、夜は叙々苑弁当だったことに驚いたと語り、その豪華さに感嘆する。

highlights.title: 客席からのライブ観戦の特権
highlights.description: ゲストパートのリハーサル終了後、スタッフから客席でライブを観戦して良いと言われたことに感動。人足先にライブが見られる特権を喜ぶ様子を話す。

highlights.title: 天音かなたの努力とライブ本番への想い
highlights.description: リハーサルでギリギリまで細かい部分を詰める天音かなたの姿を見て、本番での成功を願っていたことを語る。なかなか体験できない特別な瞬間だったと話す。

highlights.title: アンコール曲のサプライズ：巨大うぱおバルーンの登場
highlights.description: ライブのアンコール曲で巨大なうぱおのバルーンが登場したことに言及。リハーサルで黒いシートに隠された怪しげなシルエットの正体がうぱおだったことを明かし、驚きを語る。

highlights.title: 楽屋でのうぱお談義と観客の反応
highlights.description: 楽屋で「うぱおは丸くて可愛いから何にでもできる」という話で盛り上がったことを語る。ライブ会場でうぱおに触れた観客がいるか気にかけ、触れなかった自分は羨ましかったと話す。

highlights.title: 天音かなたライブがスポーツ報知の一面掲載
highlights.description: 天音かなたのライブがスポーツ報知の一面に大きく掲載されたことに触れる。自身も新聞を購入し、久しぶりに新聞を読んだことに感動。裏面には大谷選手が載っていたことも明かす。

highlights.title: MC裏話：ペンライト二択クイズの企画とボツになった質問
highlights.description: ライブMCでペンライトを使った二択クイズが予定されていたことを明かす。天音かなたが好きな「納豆」についての質問が企画されていたが、スタッフとの確認後、本番では別の質問に差し替えられたと語る。

highlights.title: 天音かなたと一緒に臨む円陣
highlights.description: ライブ本番直前、天音かなた、AZKi、バンドメンバー全員で円陣を組んだ時の様子を語る。天音かなたは緊張しているかと尋ねられ「していない」と答え、その集中力の高さに驚いたと話す。

highlights.title: ライブ開始！「Knock it out!」の熱狂
highlights.description: 開演前の期待感が最高潮に達する中、オープニングムービーが始まり、1曲目の「Knock it out!」で天音かなたが登場。イントロから会場全体が熱狂し、無料パートとは思えない豪華さにAZKiも興奮したと語る。

highlights.title: 「インキャライラバイ」のパフォーマンス
highlights.description: 「インキャライラバイ」の早口パートに驚き、技術力の高さを絶賛。楽曲の持つインのテーマがライブで陽のエネルギーに変わる瞬間に感動し、会場全体が一体となったと語る。

highlights.title: 「十万億度」の歌詞の秘密と天音かなたへの質問
highlights.description: 作詞作曲が天音かなたの「十万億度」の歌詞の意味を本人に直接聞いたエピソードを語る。リハーサル中に「十万億度はどういう意味か」と尋ね、真摯に答えてくれた天音かなたの姿勢を称賛する。

highlights.title: 「キューピット」でのサプライズ演出
highlights.description: 「キューピット」のパフォーマンスで、天音かなたの頭に大きな天使の輪が現れるサプライズ演出があったことに言及。リハーサルにはなかったこの演出に大いに驚き、感動を伝えた。この演出で天音かなたが「大天使」になったと語る。

highlights.title: 「ラストリゾート」から「アイドル」への最高の流れ
highlights.description: ライブ終盤の「ラストリゾート」から「アイドル」への楽曲繋がりの素晴らしさを熱く語る。特に「アイドル」で天音かなたが語った「お前ら、愛しい」というセリフが心に響いたと話し、感動を伝える。

highlights.title: ライブ終盤の感動とフライング演出
highlights.description: アンコール曲「特者生存ワンダラダー!!」で天音かなたがフライングし、ワイヤーアクションで飛んだことに触れる。歌唱力やバンドメンバーの演奏も素晴らしく、ライブ全体が感動的だったと振り返る。大天使への変身やラストリゾートなど、様々な演出を絶賛し、ぜひ見てほしいと語る。

highlights.title: AZKi自身のEPリリースとグッズ展開
highlights.description: 自身のEP『Re:Birth Re:Start』のリリースや、AZKiの新グッズ、ホロライブプロダクション公式ショップのグッズ展開について告知する。

highlights.title: 「アイドル」の完璧なパフォーマンスと一体感
highlights.description: 予想外の選曲でありながら、会場全体が一体となり、完璧にコールやサイリウムが揃った「アイドル」のパフォーマンスに驚きと感動を覚えたことを語る。

highlights.title: 本編ラストのMCへの感動
highlights.description: ライブ本編の締めくくりとなるMCで、天音かなたの様々な想いが語られたことに深い感動を覚えたと話す。特に普段見せないような天音かなたの一面が垣間見え、裏でビビり散らしたと告白。

highlights.title: 「私とあなたのせいだ」への特別な思い
highlights.description: 天音かなたが手紙を書くことを諦めたエピソードを交え、「私とあなたのせいだ」の歌詞に込められた特別な思いについて語る。現地でしか感じられない感動があったと強調し、感極まる。

highlights.title: 天音かなた作詞曲「世界で一番のアイドル」の深さ
highlights.description: 天音かなた作詞の「世界で一番のアイドル」がアンコールのラストに選曲されたことに言及。歌詞とメロディの完璧な融合、そして天音かなた自身が最高のアイドルであることを再認識し、感動の涙が止まらなかったと語る。

highlights.title: ライブ後の銀テープメッセージへの感動
highlights.description: ライブ終了後、銀テープに天音かなた直筆のメッセージが書かれていたことに感動し、改めて涙ぐんだことを語る。細やかなサプライズと、ライブの成功への感謝の気持ちが溢れる。

highlights.title: ライブセットと舞台装置の絶賛
highlights.description: 天音かなたのライブの舞台装置が非常に豪華だったと語る。特に荘厳な柱の演出や、楽曲ごとの背景の変化など、細部にわたるこだわりがライブのクオリティを一層高めていたと絶賛する。

highlights.title: VRchatアフターイベントへの参加と苦労
highlights.description: ライブ後に行われたVRchatでのアフターイベントについて触れる。ログインエラーやシステムトラブルに阻まれつつも、最終的には参加できた喜びと、イベントの楽しさを語る。オフラインでもオンラインでもファンと繋がれる機会に感謝を伝える。

highlights.title: スポンサー「花王」からの提供品
highlights.description: ライブスポンサーである花王からの景品（めぐリズム炭酸ジェルパックなど）が提供されたことに触れる。ライブの熱気を冷ますのに最適なアイテムだったと話し、スポンサーへの感謝を述べる。

highlights.title: ライブ全体の成功と感謝の総括
highlights.description: 大きなトラブルなくライブが成功し、多くの人が楽しんで帰路につけたことを心から喜ぶ。天候にも恵まれ、熱中症対策も万全だったことに触れ、関わった全ての人々への感謝を繰り返し伝える。改めて天音かなたの夢が叶ったことへの祝福と、この夏の最高の思い出となったことを強調する。

highlights.title: スパチャ読み開始と海外からのリスナーのコメント
highlights.description: AZKiがスーパーチャットの読み上げを開始し、天音かなたのソロライブのために韓国から日帰りで参加したリスナーからの感動的なコメントに共感を示す。また、ライブでの高難易度楽曲のパフォーマンスへの高評価も読み上げる。

highlights.title: 天音かなたライブタイトルに隠された意味と感動
highlights.description: リスナーからの「ロック（ROCK）が比喩表現で頼りがいのある人、支えという意味合いもある」というコメントを読み上げ、天音かなたの姿とライブタイトル「LOOK ON」に込められた意味が重なり感動を深める。MCでの「石」ネタについてもリスナーが調べてくれたことに言及し、感心する。

highlights.title: ライブ振り返りの感謝と次回の告知
highlights.description: 2時間にも及ぶライブ振り返り配信を共に楽しんだリスナーに感謝を伝え、この夏最高の思い出になったと語る。また、翌日公開されるホロサマサマーパークや、天音かなたとの個人的な打ち上げ計画について触れる。

highlights.title: 配信終了の挨拶
highlights.description: リスナーからの最後のスーパーチャットを読み上げ、改めて感謝を述べる。「また明日会いましょう」という次回の配信告知と「おやすきー！」の言葉で配信を締めくくる。

tags: ライブパフォーマンス

overview_en.summary: The latter half of a casual talk stream where AZKi reflects on her guest appearance at Amane Kanata's 1st Solo Live “LOOK ON”. She reads Super Chats from viewers, sharing her deep emotions, behind-the-scenes stories, and personal thoughts about the concert. She expresses empathy for the performance of high-difficulty songs and the multiple meanings hidden within the live title "LOOK ON" (which also alludes to "ROCK ON," referencing a 'stone' or 'kidney stone' that Kanata had). Amidst warm interactions with viewers, including expressing gratitude to day-trip attendees from overseas, anticipating the post-live celebration, and announcing HoloSummer, she concludes an eventful week.
overview_en.mood: Overall, the atmosphere is peaceful and conveys a sense of cheerfully reminiscing about her own experiences. While sharing moments of deep emotion, surprise, and even some struggles, the stream maintains a consistently positive vibe. Excitement and love for the live concert overflow throughout.

highlights_en.title: Start of Casual Talk and HoloSummer Summer Park Completion Talk
highlights_en.description: AZKi greets the viewers and starts the stream. She mentions the opening announcement video and the completion of HoloSummer Summer Park.

highlights_en.title: Mentioning the Reflection on Kanata's Solo Live
highlights_en.description: She talks about wanting to properly reflect on her guest appearance at Amane Kanata's solo live.

highlights_en.title: Wanting to Talk About an Eventful Week
highlights_en.description: She talks about wanting to look back on the events of her recent 'eventful week,' stating that Amane Kanata's live concert was the most memorable among them.

highlights_en.title: About Guest Appearance at Kanata's Solo Live
highlights_en.description: She seriously begins talking about her guest appearance at Amane Kanata's solo live 'LOOK ON'. She also says she wants to talk about rehearsals and other details in chronological order.

highlights_en.title: AZKi Long-Awaited Kanata's Solo Live
highlights_en.description: She talks about having waited for Amane Kanata's solo live for three years and having anticipated a solo live even when Kanata's first album was released.

highlights_en.title: Reflecting on the History of Her Relationship with Kanata
highlights_en.description: She looks back on the history of her interactions with Kanata, including Kanata's original songs and singing together at past festivals, describing their deep relationship.

highlights_en.title: Joy Upon Receiving the Guest Appearance Offer
highlights_en.description: She explains that she truly hadn't imagined receiving an offer to guest star at Kanata's solo live, so she felt deep gratitude and immense joy when she received the offer.

highlights_en.title: Difficulty of the Songs Performed: 'Shijou Shugi Ad Truck' and 'Mitsu Banner Musubime'
highlights_en.description: She mentions 'Shijou Shugi Ad Truck' and 'Mitsu Banner Musubime,' which she sang with Kanata at the live. She reveals that these songs had very difficult rhythms and she struggled during rehearsals.

highlights_en.title: Struggles with Singing During Rehearsals
highlights_en.description: She recalls that the complex intertwining of harmony and main lines in 'Mitsu Banner Musubime' was extremely difficult, leading her to focus so much on singing that her movements became awkward.

highlights_en.title: Kanata's 'Kidney Stone Expelled' Post and AZKi's Reply
highlights_en.description: She talks about seeing Amane Kanata's 'Kidney Stone Expelled' post on X (formerly Twitter) on the morning of the live concert and AZKi's reply, 'Does that mean ROCK ON!? With a stone?'. She reveals that this reply was a triple meaning, playing on the live title 'LOOK ON' and 'stone'.

highlights_en.title: Behind-the-Scenes of Live MC
highlights_en.description: She talks about wanting to mention this topic during the main MC but not having enough time, and also about Amane Kanata's high adaptability during the dress rehearsal (rehearsal simulating the actual performance). She praises the wonderful production where gun choreography and lasers synchronized.

highlights_en.title: Lunch Boxes on the Live Day
highlights_en.description: She expresses surprise and admiration at the luxurious lunch boxes provided on the day of the live: an extravagant eel bento for breakfast and a Jojoen bento for dinner.

highlights_en.title: Privilege of Watching the Live from the Audience Seats
highlights_en.description: She was deeply moved when staff told her she could watch the live from the audience seats after her guest part's rehearsal finished. She talks about her joy at the privilege of seeing the live before others.

highlights_en.title: Amane Kanata's Efforts and Thoughts Towards the Live Performance
highlights_en.description: She talks about seeing Amane Kanata meticulously refine details right up until the last minute during rehearsals and wishing for her success in the actual performance. She describes it as a special moment rarely experienced.

highlights_en.title: Encore Song Surprise: Appearance of a Giant Upao Balloon
highlights_en.description: She mentions the appearance of a giant Upao balloon during the live's encore song. She reveals that the suspicious silhouette hidden under a black sheet during rehearsals was Upao, expressing her surprise.

highlights_en.title: Upao Discussion in the Dressing Room and Audience Reaction
highlights_en.description: She talks about the lively discussion in the dressing room about how 'Upao is round and cute, so it can be anything.' She wonders if any audience members touched Upao at the live venue and expresses envy that she didn't get to.

highlights_en.title: Amane Kanata's Live Featured on Sports Hochi Front Page
highlights_en.description: She mentions that Amane Kanata's live concert was prominently featured on the front page of Sports Hochi. She herself bought the newspaper and was moved to read a newspaper after a long time. She also reveals that Shohei Ohtani was on the back page.

highlights_en.title: Behind-the-Scenes MC: Penlight Two-Option Quiz Plan and Scrapped Question
highlights_en.description: She reveals that a two-option quiz using penlights was planned for the live MC. A question about Amane Kanata's favorite 'natto' was initially planned, but after checking with staff, it was replaced with a different question for the actual performance.

highlights_en.title: Huddle with Amane Kanata
highlights_en.description: She talks about the huddle formed by Amane Kanata, AZKi, and all the band members right before the live performance. She recalls asking Amane Kanata if she was nervous, to which Kanata replied 'No,' and AZKi was surprised by her high level of concentration.

highlights_en.title: Live Starts! The Enthusiasm of 'Knock it out!'
highlights_en.description: As pre-show anticipation reached its peak, the opening movie began, and Amane Kanata appeared with the first song, 'Knock it out!'. AZKi describes how the entire venue erupted in excitement from the intro, and she herself was thrilled by the luxuriousness that felt far beyond a free segment.

highlights_en.title: Performance of 'Inkyara Irabai'
highlights_en.description: She expresses surprise at the rapid-fire part of 'Inkyara Irabai' and praises the high level of technical skill. She was deeply moved by the moment the song's introverted theme transformed into positive energy during the live, making the entire venue feel unified.

highlights_en.title: Secret of 'Juman Okudo' Lyrics and a Question to Amane Kanata
highlights_en.description: She recounts an episode where she directly asked Amane Kanata about the meaning of the lyrics for 'Juman Okudo,' a song written and composed by Kanata. She praises Amane Kanata's sincere attitude for answering her question during rehearsal about what 'Juman Okudo' meant.

highlights_en.title: Surprise Production in 'Cupid'
highlights_en.description: She mentions a surprise production during the performance of 'Cupid' where a large halo appeared above Amane Kanata's head. She expressed great surprise and emotion at this production, which wasn't present in rehearsals. She states that this production transformed Amane Kanata into an 'Archangel'.

highlights_en.title: The Best Flow from 'Last Resort' to 'Idol'
highlights_en.description: She passionately describes the wonderful song transition from 'Last Resort' to 'Idol' in the latter half of the live. She shares her deep emotion, stating that Amane Kanata's line 'You all, are precious' (or 'You all, are beloved') during 'Idol' particularly resonated with her heart.

highlights_en.title: Emotion in the Latter Half of the Live and Flying Production
highlights_en.description: She mentions that Amane Kanata flew using wire action during the encore song 'Tokusha Seizon Wanderader!!'. She reflects that the entire live was deeply moving, with excellent singing ability and splendid performances by the band members. She praises various productions, such as the transformation into an Archangel and 'Last Resort,' and strongly recommends watching it.

highlights_en.title: AZKi's Own EP Release and Merchandise Expansion
highlights_en.description: She announces the release of her own EP 'Re:Birth Re:Start,' new AZKi merchandise, and merchandise expansion at the Hololive Production Official Shop.

highlights_en.title: Perfect Performance and Sense of Unity in 'Idol'
highlights_en.description: She talks about her surprise and emotion at the performance of 'Idol,' where despite being an unexpected song choice, the entire venue became one, with perfectly synchronized calls and light sticks.

highlights_en.title: Emotion for the Main Part's Last MC
highlights_en.description: She talks about feeling deeply moved by Amane Kanata's various thoughts shared during the MC that concluded the main part of the live. She confesses that she was terrified backstage, especially seeing a side of Amane Kanata she usually doesn't show.

highlights_en.title: Special Feelings for 'Watashi to Anata no Seida'
highlights_en.description: She shares an episode where Amane Kanata gave up writing a letter, and talks about the special feelings embedded in the lyrics of 'Watashi to Anata no Seida'. She emphasizes that there was an emotion that could only be felt there (at the venue), and she becomes overwhelmed with emotion.

highlights_en.title: Depth of Amane Kanata's Lyrical Song 'Sekai de Ichiban no Idol'
highlights_en.description: She mentions that 'Sekai de Ichiban no Idol,' a song with lyrics by Amane Kanata, was chosen as the last song for the encore. She talks about the perfect fusion of lyrics and melody, and how she re-recognized Amane Kanata herself as the best idol, causing her tears of emotion to flow continuously.

highlights_en.title: Emotion for the Silver Tape Message After the Live
highlights_en.description: She talks about being moved by Amane Kanata's handwritten message on the silver tape after the live ended, and tearing up again. Her feelings of gratitude for the thoughtful surprise and the success of the live overflow.

highlights_en.title: Praise for the Live Set and Stage Equipment
highlights_en.description: She talks about how luxurious Amane Kanata's live stage equipment was. She particularly praises the majestic pillar productions and the changing backgrounds for each song, stating that such attention to detail further enhanced the quality of the live.

highlights_en.title: Participation and Struggles with the VRchat After-Event
highlights_en.description: She mentions the VRchat after-event held after the live. Despite being hindered by login errors and system troubles, she talks about her joy at finally being able to participate and the fun of the event. She expresses gratitude for the opportunity to connect with fans both offline and online.

highlights_en.title: Items Provided by Sponsor 'Kao'
highlights_en.description: She mentions that prizes (such as MegRhythm carbonated gel packs) were provided by Kao, the live sponsor. She talks about them being perfect items for cooling down after the live's excitement and expresses gratitude to the sponsor.

highlights_en.title: Summary of Overall Live Success and Gratitude
highlights_en.description: She sincerely rejoices that the live was successful without major issues and that many people enjoyed themselves and made their way home. She mentions the favorable weather and thorough heatstroke prevention measures, and repeatedly expresses gratitude to everyone involved. She re-emphasizes her congratulations on Amane Kanata's dream coming true and that it became the best memory of this summer.

highlights_en.title: Start of Super Chat Reading and Comments from Overseas Viewers
highlights_en.description: AZKi begins reading Super Chats, showing empathy for a touching comment from a viewer who came from Korea on a day trip specifically for Amane Kanata's solo live. She also reads out high praise for the performance of high-difficulty songs at the live.

highlights_en.title: Hidden Meaning and Emotion in Amane Kanata's Live Title
highlights_en.description: She reads a viewer's comment stating that 'rock' (ROCK) is a metaphor for a dependable person or support, and she feels deeper emotion as Amane Kanata's presence aligns with the meaning embedded in the live title 'LOOK ON'. She also expresses admiration that viewers researched the 'stone' (or kidney stone) joke from the MC.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude for Live Reflection and Next Announcement
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude to the viewers who enjoyed the two-hour live reflection stream with her, stating it became the best memory of this summer. She also mentions the HoloSummer Summer Park to be released the next day and her personal celebration plans with Amane Kanata.

highlights_en.title: End of Stream Greeting
highlights_en.description: She reads the final Super Chat from a viewer, expressing gratitude once again. She concludes the stream with an announcement for the next broadcast, 'Let's meet again tomorrow,' and the phrase 'Oyasuki!'

title: 【 ニコニコさん 】ホラゲウィーク最終夜／笑顔で終われるか？ #ホラゲウィーク2025【鷹嶺ルイ/ホロライブ】

overview.summary: 鷹嶺ルイがホラゲウィーク最終夜にホラーゲーム「ニコニコさん」に挑戦する配信。愛犬との絆で裏世界から脱出するという感動的なエンディングを迎える。ゲーム終了後は、ホラゲウィーク全体の振り返りやリスナーからの質問に答える形で、自身の持つ恐怖症について深く語る。恐怖症への独特な解釈や香水をつけるようになった意外なきっかけ、さらにはインターネットのネタに対する自身の知識不足や、触れてはいけない話題への言及に対する考えまで、幅広いテーマで深掘りする雑談が展開された。
overview.mood: 恐怖と絶叫が終始続きつつも、ゲーム後のトークでは、恐怖症へのユニークな解釈やユーモラスなエピソードで笑いも誘い、親しみやすい雰囲気。

highlights.title: ホラゲウィーク最終夜の挨拶
highlights.description: ホラゲウィーク最終夜であることを告げ、ゲーム「ニコニコさん」を笑顔で終えたいと意気込みを語る。自身のドM発言や、今年のホラゲウィークが短いこと、冬にも開催予定があることを明かす。

highlights.title: ゲーム開始と世界観の説明
highlights.description: ゲームのオープニングで、学校の古びた倉庫にまつわる妙な噂や、そこに立ち入った者が消息を絶つという背景が語られる。

highlights.title: 最初のジャンプスケア
highlights.description: 探索中に突如現れた白い人影に驚き、鷹嶺ルイさんが絶叫する。

highlights.title: ニコニコさんと初遭遇
highlights.description: 黒猫が横切った直後、笑顔の化け物「ニコニコさん」が目の前に現れ、鷹嶺ルイさんが大絶叫する。

highlights.title: 裏世界での探索開始
highlights.description: ゲームオーバー後、倉庫の前で目を覚ます主人公。周囲の街並みに違和感を覚え、裏世界に来てしまったことを悟る。脱出アイテムを探すミッションが提示される。

highlights.title: エナジードリンクと隠れ場所のクールタイム
highlights.description: 探索中にエナジードリンクを発見し拾う。ゴミ箱に隠れることが可能だと説明されるが、一度使用すると15秒間のクールタイムがあることが判明する。

highlights.title: ワープするニコニコさんとの遭遇
highlights.description: 隠れ場所が使用不可の間にニコニコさんが現れ、ワープ能力で追いかけてくることに絶叫する。

highlights.title: ロッカーの鍵と死
highlights.description: ロッカーのある部屋で廃墟の鍵を見つけるが、ロッカーの中からニコニコさんが現れて絶叫し、ゲームオーバーとなる。

highlights.title: 夢落ちとアイテム引き継ぎ
highlights.description: ゲームオーバー後、夢落ちのような形で倉庫の前から再開されるが、これまでに集めたアイテムが引き継がれていることに気付く。

highlights.title: 男子トイレの鍵発見
highlights.description: 公園の男子トイレを探索中に鍵を発見する。トイレで用を足した後にフタを閉めるという指示にユーモラスに反応する。

highlights.title: 隠れ場所の罠と死亡
highlights.description: ゴミ箱に隠れるが、クールタイム中で使用できず、追いかけてきたニコニコさんに捕まり、絶叫と共に死亡する。

highlights.title: ハンマーの発見
highlights.description: 探索中に壊れたオブジェクトの近くでハンマーを発見し、入手する。

highlights.title: ニコニコおみくじで大吉
highlights.description: 神社のような場所で「ニコニコおみくじ」を発見。引いてみると「大吉 来週いいことありそう」という結果が出る。

highlights.title: バールのようなものを発見
highlights.description: 物置のような暗い場所で「バールのようなもの」を入手する。ニコニコさんが近くにいる気配がする。

highlights.title: ゲームオーバー後の状況整理
highlights.description: ゲームオーバーになり、主人公が路地裏に再び倒れる。鷹嶺ルイがアイテムの確認と、未探索の場所をリストアップする。

highlights.title: 高速化するニコニコさんに絶叫
highlights.description: 探索中、突如として画面にノイズが走り、ニコニコさんが通常よりも遥かに速いスピードで接近。鷹嶺ルイが絶叫しながら逃げ惑う。

highlights.title: チェーンカッターを入手
highlights.description: 自転車置き場のような場所でチェーンカッターを発見し、入手する。これで壊れた鍵を破壊できることを期待する。

highlights.title: 謎のハシゴから赤い世界へ
highlights.description: 街の探索の末、辿り着いたハシゴを登ると、あたり一面が血のような赤色に染まった異世界に。不気味な声や文字が飛び交う中、走り続けるよう指示される。

highlights.title: 大量の「止まれ」看板と「ニコニコさん」の文字
highlights.description: 赤い世界で走り続ける中、画面いっぱいに「止まれ」の看板と「ニコニコさん」という文字が大量に出現。接触するとゲームオーバーになるが、避けるのは非常に困難。

highlights.title: 赤い世界の謎の存在と弾幕
highlights.description: 赤い世界で再び走り続ける中、今度は画面に巨大な白い顔の存在が出現。その口からは「あひゃひゃひゃ」という不気味な笑い声が聞こえ、文字の弾幕が激しくなる。

highlights.title: 赤い世界での最終局面、光の出口へ
highlights.description: 何度もゲームオーバーを繰り返す中で、赤い世界の先に白い光が見える出口を発見。最後の力を振り絞って走り続け、光の中へ飛び込む。

highlights.title: 現実世界への脱出とわんちゃんの無事
highlights.description: 目を覚ますと、そこは朝日が差し込む現実世界の倉庫の前。恐怖に震える手を見つめるが、あの笑顔の化け物はいなくなっていた。裏世界で出会ったわんちゃんも現実世界に脱出しており、飼い主と涙の再会を果たす。

highlights.title: エンディング「エンド2『一人と一匹』」
highlights.description: わんちゃんと共に無事脱出できたエンディングが表示される。その後、クレジットと共に他のエンディング分岐のヒントが表示される。

highlights.title: ホラゲウィークの振り返りとゲームの感想
highlights.description: ホラゲウィーク最終夜の挨拶と、今回のゲーム「ニコニコさん」の感想を語る。怖いだけでなく気持ち悪さが際立っていたと評価。

highlights.title: 今後のホラゲ配信への意欲
highlights.description: 「月1くらいでホラゲ見たい気分」と発言し、今後も定期的にホラゲ配信を続けていくことを示唆する。

highlights.title: 鷹嶺ルイの恐怖症について
highlights.description: リスナーからのコメントをきっかけに、自身が先端恐怖症であることを明かす。刃物を向けられる描写が苦手だと語る。

highlights.title: 恐怖症に対する持論
highlights.description: 「恐怖症を全て理解しようとするのは無駄」と、自身の経験を基にした持論を展開。人によって感じ方が違うことを強調する。

highlights.title: 満員電車での恐怖体験
highlights.description: ライブ帰りの満員電車で過呼吸になりかけた経験を語る。人が密集した空間でパーソナルスペースが奪われることへの恐怖を明かす。

highlights.title: 香水をつけるようになったきっかけ
highlights.description: 以前は香水が苦手だったが、叶姉妹のイベントをきっかけに香水をつけるようになったと語る。周囲への配慮として香水の役割を認識する。

highlights.title: 匂いの記憶と髪質
highlights.description: 匂いが記憶に残りやすいことに触れ、自身の髪質がシャンプーの匂いを残しにくいと説明。出かける前にシャワーを浴びる習慣も明かす。

highlights.title: 人混みでの不安とパーソナルスペース
highlights.description: 満員電車での経験から、自分が周囲に不快な匂いを発しているのではないかという不安や、パーソナルスペースが侵害されることへの苦痛を改めて語る。

highlights.title: 髪の匂いの残りやすさとヘアオイルの勧め
highlights.description: シャンプーだけでは髪に香りが残りにくいと語り、ヘアオイルの使用を推奨。適切な量を使えばベタつかず、髪のセットキープにも役立つと説明する。過去のサブ垢でのおすすめ情報の言及や、男性にもヘアオイルを勧める。

highlights.title: ネットネタと不適切な話題への言及
highlights.description: 髪がないというリスナーの自虐ネタコメントに対し、コンプレックスを持つ人がいるため触れないようにしていると話す。インターネットのネタやミームについて、自身が疎いことを明かし、不用意に触れてはいけない話題とそうでない話題の線引きの難しさ、そして「賢者タイム」のような具体的な例を挙げつつ、触れてはいけないネタへの配慮について語る。

highlights.title: ホラゲウィーク締めくくりと今後の配信予告
highlights.description: ホラゲウィーク最終夜の配信を締めくくり、リスナーへの感謝を伝える。明日の配信予定として、馬のゲーム「ウマ娘」と「龍が如く」を予定していたが、ホロライブ夏祭りの終了時間との兼ね合いで調整が必要だと話す。

overview_en.summary: A stream where Takane Lui challenges the horror game 'Niko Niko-san' on the final night of Horror Game Week. She reaches an emotional ending where she escapes the otherworld through the bond with her beloved dog. After the game, a zatsudan (chat) unfolds, deeply discussing her phobias, reflecting on the entire Horror Game Week, and answering listener questions. The conversation delves into various topics, including her unique interpretation of phobias, the unexpected reason she started wearing perfume, her lack of knowledge about internet memes, and her thoughts on mentioning off-limits topics.
overview_en.mood: Though constant fear and screaming persisted, the post-game talk was inviting and friendly, with unique interpretations of phobias and humorous anecdotes eliciting laughter.

highlights_en.title: Greetings on the Final Night of Horror Game Week
highlights_en.description: Announces it's the final night of Horror Game Week and expresses her determination to finish the game 'Niko Niko-san' with a smile. She reveals her own 'M' (masochist) statement, that this year's Horror Game Week is short, and that there are plans for another one in winter.

highlights_en.title: Game Start and Explanation of the Worldview
highlights_en.description: In the game's opening, strange rumors about an old school warehouse and the disappearance of those who enter it are narrated.

highlights_en.title: First Jump Scare
highlights_en.description: Takane Lui screams in surprise at a white figure that suddenly appeared during exploration.

highlights_en.title: First Encounter with Niko Niko-san
highlights_en.description: Immediately after a black cat crosses, the smiling monster 'Niko Niko-san' appears in front of her, making Takane Lui scream loudly.

highlights_en.title: Beginning of Exploration in the Otherworld
highlights_en.description: After a game over, the protagonist wakes up in front of the warehouse. Noticing something off with the surrounding townscape, they realize they've entered an otherworld. The mission to find escape items is presented.

highlights_en.title: Energy Drink and Hiding Spot Cooldown
highlights_en.description: Finds and picks up an energy drink during exploration. It's explained that it's possible to hide in a trash can, but it's revealed that there's a 15-second cooldown after each use.

highlights_en.title: Encounter with the Warping Niko Niko-san
highlights_en.description: During the time the hiding spot is unusable, Niko Niko-san appears and chases her with warping abilities, causing her to scream.

highlights_en.title: Locker Key and Death
highlights_en.description: Finds a rusty key in a room with a locker, but Niko Niko-san appears from inside the locker, leading to a scream and game over.

highlights_en.title: Dream Ending and Item Inheritance
highlights_en.description: After a game over, the game restarts in front of the warehouse as if it were a dream, but she notices that the items collected so far have been carried over.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of Men's Restroom Key
highlights_en.description: Discovers a key while exploring the men's restroom in the park. Reacts humorously to the instruction to close the lid after using the toilet.

highlights_en.title: Hiding Spot Trap and Death
highlights_en.description: Hides in a trash can, but it's on cooldown and unusable. Niko Niko-san catches her, leading to a scream and death.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of a Hammer
highlights_en.description: Discovers and obtains a hammer near a broken object during exploration.

highlights_en.title: Great Fortune from Niko Niko Omikuji
highlights_en.description: Discovers a 'Niko Niko Omikuji' (fortune slip) in a shrine-like place. When drawn, it reveals 'Great Fortune: Something good seems to happen next week'.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of a Crowbar-like Object
highlights_en.description: Obtains a 'crowbar-like object' in a dark, shed-like place. Senses Niko Niko-san is nearby.

highlights_en.title: Situation After Game Over
highlights_en.description: The game ends, and the protagonist collapses in an alley again. Takane Lui checks her items and lists unexplored areas.

highlights_en.title: Screaming at the Speeding Up Niko Niko-san
highlights_en.description: During exploration, the screen suddenly glitches, and Niko Niko-san approaches at a much faster speed than usual. Takane Lui screams and flees in panic.

highlights_en.title: Obtaining a Chain Cutter
highlights_en.description: Discovers and obtains a chain cutter in a place resembling a bicycle parking lot. Hopes it can be used to break a broken lock.

highlights_en.title: To the Red World via a Mysterious Ladder
highlights_en.description: After exploring the town, she climbs a ladder and finds herself in an eerie otherworld dyed blood-red all over. Eerie voices and texts fly around, and she is instructed to keep running.

highlights_en.title: Numerous 'Stop' Signs and 'Niko Niko-san' Text
highlights_en.description: While running through the red world, the screen is filled with numerous 'Stop' signs and 'Niko Niko-san' text. Touching them results in a game over, but avoiding them is extremely difficult.

highlights_en.title: Mysterious Entity and Bullet Hell in the Red World
highlights_en.description: As she continues to run in the red world, a giant white face appears on the screen. From its mouth, an eerie 'ahyaphyaphyaphyaphyap' laugh is heard, and the text bullet hell intensifies.

highlights_en.title: Final Phase in the Red World, Towards the Exit of Light
highlights_en.description: After repeatedly getting game overs, she discovers an exit with a white light in the red world. Gathering her last strength, she keeps running and leaps into the light.

highlights_en.title: Escape to the Real World and Dog's Safety
highlights_en.description: Waking up, she finds herself in front of the warehouse in the real world, illuminated by the morning sun. She looks at her trembling hands, realizing the smiling monster is gone. The dog she met in the otherworld has also escaped to the real world, and she has a tearful reunion with her owner.

highlights_en.title: Ending 'End 2: One Person and One Pet'
highlights_en.description: The ending showing her safe escape with the dog is displayed. Afterward, hints for other ending branches are shown with the credits.

highlights_en.title: Horror Game Week Recap and Game Impressions
highlights_en.description: Offers greetings for the final night of Horror Game Week and shares her impressions of this game, 'Niko Niko-san'. She evaluates it as not just scary, but particularly unsettling.

highlights_en.title: Enthusiasm for Future Horror Game Streams
highlights_en.description: States her desire to 'watch horror games about once a month,' hinting at continuing regular horror game streams in the future.

highlights_en.title: About Takane Lui's Phobias
highlights_en.description: Prompted by a listener's comment, she reveals she has aichmophobia (fear of sharp objects). She says she dislikes depictions of blades being pointed at her.

highlights_en.title: Her Own Theory on Phobias
highlights_en.description: Develops her own theory based on personal experience, stating that 'it's useless to try to understand all phobias.' She emphasizes that people's perceptions differ.

highlights_en.title: Terrifying Experience on a Crowded Train
highlights_en.description: Recounts an experience where she almost hyperventilated on a crowded train after a live event. She reveals her fear of personal space being invaded in densely packed spaces.

highlights_en.title: Reason for Starting to Wear Perfume
highlights_en.description: Explains that she used to dislike perfume but started wearing it after a Kanou Sisters event. She now recognizes the role of perfume as a consideration for others.

highlights_en.title: Scent Memory and Hair Type
highlights_en.description: Mentions that scents are easily remembered and explains that her hair type doesn't retain shampoo scent well. She also reveals her habit of showering before going out.

highlights_en.title: Anxiety in Crowds and Personal Space
highlights_en.description: Reiterates her anxiety from the crowded train experience, expressing worry about emitting an unpleasant smell to others and the discomfort of her personal space being invaded.

highlights_en.title: Hair's Scent Retention and Hair Oil Recommendation
highlights_en.description: States that shampoo alone doesn't easily leave fragrance in hair and recommends using hair oil. She explains that if used in appropriate amounts, it's not sticky and helps keep hair styled. Mentions past recommendations on a sub-account and recommends hair oil to men as well.

highlights_en.title: Internet Memes and Referencing Inappropriate Topics
highlights_en.description: In response to a listener's self-deprecating comment about having no hair, she explains that she avoids mentioning it because some people have complexes about it. She reveals her unfamiliarity with internet memes and acknowledges the difficulty in drawing the line between topics that shouldn't be touched upon and those that are acceptable, giving concrete examples like '賢者タイム' (post-coital clarity, 'sage mode') while discussing consideration for off-limits jokes.

highlights_en.title: Conclusion of Horror Game Week and Future Stream Announcements
highlights_en.description: Concludes the final night stream of Horror Game Week and expresses gratitude to listeners. For tomorrow's stream, she had planned horse racing game 'Uma Musume' and 'Like a Dragon' but mentions that adjustments are needed due to coordination with the Hololive Summer Festival's end time.

title: 【 Minecraft 】1会議２準備３政策　素敵建設する！！！！！！！！【 桃鈴ねね / hololive 】

overview.summary: 桃鈴ねねさんがMinecraftのホロライブサーバーで、夏祭り会場の整備とアトラクション「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」の建設に挑戦する配信です。水流ボート乗り場の最終調整から始まり、入口への誘導路整備、そして「一周しないと帰れない」というコンセプトに基づいたルール変更が行われました。大神ミオさんや星街すいせいさんが訪れ、ねねさんの大規模な建築に驚き、交流する場面も。創造性豊かなマイクラ建築の試行錯誤と完成への情熱が詰まった配信です。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気

highlights.title: 配信開始と挨拶
highlights.description: 桃鈴ねねがMinecraftのホロライブサーバーにログインし、配信を開始。昨日の建築の失敗を晴らすべく、今日も建築に励むことを宣言しました。

highlights.title: 夏祭り会場と金ピカの道
highlights.description: ホロライブサマーパークの夏祭り会場に到着。ねねが昨日作った「金ピカの道」を紹介し、その豪華さをアピールしました。

highlights.title: rindo_chihaya登場と建築物見学
highlights.description: ゲストのrindo_chihayaさんが登場し、互いの建築物を見学し合います。千早さんが作ったハート型のフォトスポットにねねは感動しました。

highlights.title: 金ピカの道への建築アドバイス
highlights.description: ねねが作った金ピカの道について千早さんに感想を求めると、千早さんは「同じブロックは3個まで」「ランダムに配置する」といった建築テクニックを教えました。

highlights.title: 金ピカの道、崩壊寸前？
highlights.description: ねねが作った金ピカの道の一部が壊れてしまい、ねねと千早が焦ります。千早さんがクリエイティブモードで破壊行為を止め、道を修復しました。

highlights.title: フォトスポットで記念撮影
highlights.description: 千早さんが作ったハートのフォトスポットへの上り方を確認し、2人で一緒にスクリーンショットを撮りました。初のソロでの記念撮影となりました。

highlights.title: 巨大な観覧車とミコチ像の発見
highlights.description: パーク内を散策中、巨大な観覧車やさくらみこの像（ミコチ像）など、他のライバーが作った壮大な建築物を発見し、そのスケールに驚嘆しました。

highlights.title: ジェットコースター体験
highlights.description: パーク内のジェットコースターを発見し、トロッコに乗って体験。水の中や火山のような場所を猛スピードで走り抜け、フリーフォール要素にも興奮しました。

highlights.title: コーヒーカップと他アトラクションの紹介
highlights.description: コーヒーカップや様々なアトラクションがクリーパーの形になっていることを発見。パーク内の多様なアトラクションを見て回りました。

highlights.title: 鉄道計画「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」開始
highlights.description: パーク内を一周できるモノレール（水流ボート）を作る計画「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」を考案。金ブロックで水流エレベーターの建設を開始しました。

highlights.title: 金ピカの水流エレベーター建設
highlights.description: 水流エレベーターを金ブロックとガラスで建設を開始。豪華な見た目にこだわりながら、巨大な水流エレベーターを建設していきました。

highlights.title: モモテツ計画の進捗と展望
highlights.description: 完成した金ピカの水流エレベーターに乗り、上まで登ってパーク全体を見渡します。これからこのエレベーターを中心に、パークを一周できる鉄道を建設していく展望を語りました。

highlights.title: モノレール（デンテツモモタロウモモテツ）の続き
highlights.description: 夏祭り会場の整備の続きとして、パークを一周できるモノレール（水流ボート）計画「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」を再開。まずは氷ブロックで足場を作り、規模感を把握する。

highlights.title: 遊園地一周モノレール構想
highlights.description: 桃鈴ねねが遊園地を一周できる足で漕ぐようなアトラクションをイメージし、氷の道でパーク全体を囲む計画を説明。パークの広大さを実感しながら建築を進める。

highlights.title: 氷の道と雪景色のコントラスト
highlights.description: 氷の道が夏祭り会場から広がり、雪景色のエリアとの境界線に到達。ねねが建築物の規模感を再確認しながら、周囲の環境との調和を考える。

highlights.title: 建築中の氷の道と夕暮れの景色
highlights.description: 氷の道の建設が進行し、夕暮れ時を迎える。遠くに見える巨大な構造物について言及し、今後の建築計画について考える。

highlights.title: 夜間の建築作業とライトアップ
highlights.description: 夜になり、氷の道の下にグロウストーンを設置し、道を明るく照らす。夜のパーク全体の雰囲気を楽しみながら建築作業を進める。

highlights.title: 飛行船との遭遇と氷の道の一周確認
highlights.description: パーク上空を移動する飛行船のような建物に遭遇。氷の道がパークの反対側から伸びていることを確認し、一周が近づいていることに興奮する。

highlights.title: 氷の道の巨大な規模と高低差の検討
highlights.description: 完成が近づく氷の道の巨大な規模に驚きを隠せないねね。ジェットコースターのような高低差は設けず、シンプルな一周コースにする方針を固める。

highlights.title: 氷の道「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」完成！
highlights.description: パーク全体を囲む氷の道が遂に完成し、ボートに乗って試運転を開始。高速で移動するボートから見える景色に感動する。

highlights.title: 高速ボート移動の感想と今後の展望
highlights.description: 完成した氷の道でボートに乗って移動。予想以上のスピードに景色が見えないことを笑いながら、今後の改良点や課題について言及する。

highlights.title: 氷の道のガラス壁建設開始
highlights.description: 氷の道の周囲にガラスの壁を設置する作業を開始。透明な壁にすることで、景色を楽しみながら移動できるアトラクションを目指す。

highlights.title: 夕焼けに染まるガラス壁建設
highlights.description: ガラス壁の建設が続き、夕焼けの美しい空が広がる。景色を楽しみながら、集中して建築を進める。

highlights.title: ガラス壁完成と「おじさん」の登場
highlights.description: 氷の道の周囲のガラス壁が完成し、朝焼けが広がる。途中、「Suisei_HONMOHO」がゲームに参加したことを知らせるメッセージが表示され、ねねが「おじさん」と呼んで反応する。

highlights.title: ガラス壁付きボートの再試乗
highlights.description: 完成したガラス壁付きの氷の道でボートの再試乗。視界がクリアになり、周囲の景色がより楽しめるようになったことを実感する。

highlights.title: ボートの速度課題とトロッコへの切り替え検討
highlights.description: ボートの速度が速すぎて景色をゆっくり楽しめないという課題が再燃。トロッコであれば速度調整が可能であり、より景観を楽しめることから、今後の「モモテツ」計画ではトロッコを使用する方向で検討する。

highlights.title: 氷の道、最終的なガラス壁設置
highlights.description: パーク全体を一周する氷の道「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」のガラス壁を最終調整。ねねが建築ブロックを丁寧に配置していく。

highlights.title: 水流エレベーター乗り場の建設開始
highlights.description: デンテツモモタロウモモテツの入口となる水流エレベーターの乗り場を建設し始める。金ブロックを使って豪華なデザインを施していく。

highlights.title: 乗り場の最終調整と水流の引き直し
highlights.description: 完成した乗り場にボートを設置し、うまく動作するか確認。水流が途切れている箇所を修正し、スムーズな乗降ができるように調整する。

highlights.title: 水流ボート「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」完成！
highlights.description: 全ての建設が完了し、水流ボート「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」が遂に完成。桃鈴ねねがボートに乗ってパーク内を一周する。

highlights.title: エンディングと次回への展望
highlights.description: ボートでの一周を終え、配信が終了。今回の建築の成果を振り返り、次回以降の配信への意気込みを語る。

highlights.title: デンテツモモタロウモモテツ乗り場最終調整
highlights.description: 前回の続きとなる「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」の乗り場最終調整を行います。ボートがスムーズに動作するよう、水流や足場の微調整を試みます。

highlights.title: 大神ミオの登場と建築物談義
highlights.description: 大神ミオがサーバーに登場し、ねねの作った水流エレベーターの高さに驚嘆。ねねはこれを「移動式展望台」と説明し、手動でボートを漕ぐアトラクションであることを明かすと、ミオはさらに驚きを隠せません。

highlights.title: 乗り場への誘導路整備
highlights.description: 大神ミオが去った後、ねねはボート乗り場へのアクセスを改善するため、光るグロウストーンの誘導路を設置し始めます。スムーズに利用できるよう道を整備します。

highlights.title: ボート補充用チェストとルール看板の設置
highlights.description: 水流エレベーターの乗り場にボート補充用のチェストを設置します。一度は降り口用の扉を設けますが、パーク一周のコンセプトに合わせ「一周しないと帰れないよ！」と書かれた看板を設置し直します。

highlights.title: 「この輝きに驚くことなかれ！」進捗達成
highlights.description: マインクラフトのゲーム内で「進歩達成！この輝きに驚くことなかれ！」という通知が表示され、ねねはその達成に喜びます。この快挙はねねの建築スキルを示すものです。

highlights.title: 鐘の設置と音の検証
highlights.description: 乗り場に鐘を設置し、その音を確認します。その後、遠くにある桜の木に設置された別の鐘を見つけ、その音にも反応し、マイクラの世界を満喫します。

highlights.title: 星街すいせい登場と建築物見学
highlights.description: 星街すいせいがサーバーに登場し、ねねの建築物（特に水流エレベーター）を見て「これ何？すごい高い建物がそびえ立ってるけど！」と驚きます。ねねは自分の建築を自慢げに紹介します。

highlights.title: すいせいの裏作業を覗く
highlights.description: ねねがすいせいをボートに誘いますが、すいせいは「裏作業中」と返答。ねねはすいせいが取り組む巨大なバベルの塔のような建造物を遠くから見学します。お互いの建築への情熱を感じる場面です。

highlights.title: 完成した水流ボートから景色を撮影
highlights.description: 完成した「デンテツモモタロウモモテツ」のボートに乗り込み、パーク全体を眺めながらスクリーンショットを撮影します。その壮大な景色と達成感に満たされます。

highlights.title: 配信終了の挨拶と今後の展望
highlights.description: パーク一周の旅を終え、ねねが配信終了の挨拶を行います。今回の建築の成果を振り返り、次回以降の配信への意気込みを語り、視聴者に感謝を伝えます。

highlights.title: 配信終了後のゲーム内活動と大神ミオの再登場
highlights.description: 配信が終了した後もゲーム内での活動を続けます。この間に大神ミオが再登場し、ねねの建築物について再び驚きの声を上げます。ねねは自分の作った建物が他のライバーにも影響を与えていることに喜びを感じます。

overview_en.summary: This is a stream where Momosuzu Nene challenges herself to prepare the summer festival venue and construct the 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' attraction on the Hololive Minecraft server. It starts with the final adjustments to the water-flow boat ride's boarding area, followed by the development of access paths to the entrance, and a rule change based on the concept of 'you can't leave until you've completed one full lap.' Ookami Mio and Hoshimachi Suisei also visit, expressing surprise at Nene's large-scale construction and interacting with her. It's a stream filled with creative Minecraft building, trial and error, and a passion for completion.
overview_en.mood: Relaxed atmosphere throughout

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Greetings
highlights_en.description: Momosuzu Nene logs into the Hololive Minecraft server and starts the stream. She declares her intention to work hard on building today to make up for yesterday's failed construction.

highlights_en.title: Summer Festival Venue and the Golden Path
highlights_en.description: Arriving at the summer festival venue of Hololive Summer Park. Nene introduces the 'Golden Path' she built yesterday, showcasing its splendor.

highlights_en.title: rindo_chihaya Appears and Architectural Tour
highlights_en.description: Guest rindo_chihaya appears, and they tour each other's constructions. Nene was impressed by the heart-shaped photo spot Chihaya built.

highlights_en.title: Building Advice for the Golden Path
highlights_en.description: When Nene asked Chihaya for her thoughts on the golden path she built, Chihaya taught her building techniques such as 'limit of 3 identical blocks' and 'place randomly'.

highlights_en.title: Golden Path, on the Verge of Collapse?
highlights_en.description: A part of the golden path Nene built broke, causing Nene and Chihaya to panic. Chihaya stopped the destruction in creative mode and repaired the path.

highlights_en.title: Commemorative Photo at the Photo Spot
highlights_en.description: After confirming how to get up to the heart-shaped photo spot Chihaya built, they took a screenshot together. This was their first solo commemorative photo.

highlights_en.title: Discovery of a Giant Ferris Wheel and Mikochi Statue
highlights_en.description: While exploring the park, they discovered magnificent structures built by other streamers, such as a giant Ferris wheel and a Sakura Miko statue (Mikochi statue), marveling at their scale.

highlights_en.title: Roller Coaster Experience
highlights_en.description: Discovered a roller coaster in the park and rode it in a minecart. They sped through water and volcano-like areas, getting excited about the free-fall elements.

highlights_en.title: Introduction to Teacups and Other Attractions
highlights_en.description: Discovered that teacups and various other attractions were shaped like Creepers. They looked around at the diverse attractions within the park.

highlights_en.title: Railway Project 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' Begins
highlights_en.description: Devised a plan to create a monorail (water-flow boat) that circles the park, named 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu'. Construction of a water-flow elevator using gold blocks began.

highlights_en.title: Construction of the Golden Water-Flow Elevator
highlights_en.description: Construction of the water-flow elevator began using gold blocks and glass. Nene focused on a luxurious appearance while building the giant water-flow elevator.

highlights_en.title: Momotetsu Project Progress and Outlook
highlights_en.description: Rode the completed golden water-flow elevator to the top and looked out over the entire park. Nene talked about the prospect of building a railway that circles the park, centered around this elevator.

highlights_en.title: Continuation of the Monorail (Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu)
highlights_en.description: As a continuation of the summer festival venue's preparation, the monorail (water-flow boat) project 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' was resumed. First, scaffolding was built with ice blocks to grasp the scale.

highlights_en.title: Amusement Park Circular Monorail Concept
highlights_en.description: Momosuzu Nene envisioned an attraction where one pedals to go around the entire amusement park and explained her plan to encircle the entire park with an ice path. She proceeded with construction while realizing the vastness of the park.

highlights_en.title: Contrast Between Ice Path and Snowy Landscape
highlights_en.description: The ice path extended from the summer festival venue, reaching the boundary with the snowy area. Nene reconsidered the scale of the structure while thinking about its harmony with the surrounding environment.

highlights_en.title: Ice Path Under Construction and Evening Scenery
highlights_en.description: Construction of the ice path progresses as evening approaches. Nene mentions a giant structure visible in the distance and ponders future building plans.

highlights_en.title: Nighttime Construction Work and Lighting
highlights_en.description: As night falls, glowstone is placed under the ice path to illuminate it brightly. Nene continues construction work while enjoying the overall atmosphere of the park at night.

highlights_en.title: Encounter with an Airship and Confirmation of Ice Path Loop
highlights_en.description: Encountered an airship-like structure moving above the park. Nene confirms that the ice path extends from the opposite side of the park, getting excited as the loop nears completion.

highlights_en.title: Consideration of the Ice Path's Massive Scale and Elevation Differences
highlights_en.description: Nene can't hide her surprise at the immense scale of the ice path as it nears completion. She decides against adding roller coaster-like elevation changes, opting for a simple loop course.

highlights_en.title: Ice Path 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' Completed!
highlights_en.description: The ice path encircling the entire park is finally complete, and Nene begins a test run by riding a boat. She is moved by the scenery visible from the fast-moving boat.

highlights_en.title: Impressions of High-Speed Boat Travel and Future Outlook
highlights_en.description: Riding the boat on the completed ice path. Laughing that the scenery is invisible due to the unexpected speed, Nene mentions future improvements and challenges.

highlights_en.title: Construction of Glass Walls for the Ice Path Begins
highlights_en.description: Work begins on installing glass walls around the ice path. The goal is to create an attraction where visitors can enjoy the scenery while moving, thanks to the transparent walls.

highlights_en.title: Glass Wall Construction Bathed in Sunset
highlights_en.description: Glass wall construction continues as a beautiful sunset sky spreads. Nene focuses on building while enjoying the scenery.

highlights_en.title: Glass Wall Completion and Appearance of 'Ojisan'
highlights_en.description: The glass walls around the ice path are complete, and the morning glow spreads. Along the way, a message indicating 'Suisei_HONMOHO' joined the game appears, and Nene reacts by calling them 'Ojisan'.

highlights_en.title: Re-test Ride of the Boat with Glass Walls
highlights_en.description: Re-tested the boat on the completed ice path with glass walls. Nene realized that the view was clearer and the surrounding scenery could be enjoyed more.

highlights_en.title: Boat Speed Issue and Consideration of Switching to Minecarts
highlights_en.description: The issue of the boat's speed being too fast to leisurely enjoy the scenery resurfaced. Since minecarts allow for speed adjustment and better scenic enjoyment, future 'Momotetsu' plans will consider using minecarts.

highlights_en.title: Final Glass Wall Installation for the Ice Path
highlights_en.description: Final adjustments to the glass walls of the 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' ice path that circles the entire park. Nene carefully places the building blocks.

highlights_en.title: Construction of Water-Flow Elevator Boarding Area Begins
highlights_en.description: Construction begins on the water-flow elevator boarding area, which will serve as the entrance to Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu. Nene designs it lavishly using gold blocks.

highlights_en.title: Final Adjustments to Boarding Area and Rerouting Water Flow
highlights_en.description: Boats are placed in the completed boarding area to check if they function properly. Nene fixes areas where the water flow is interrupted to ensure smooth boarding and alighting.

highlights_en.title: Water-Flow Boat 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' Completed!
highlights_en.description: All construction is complete, and the water-flow boat 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' is finally finished. Momosuzu Nene rides the boat, circling the park.

highlights_en.title: Ending and Outlook for Next Time
highlights_en.description: After completing a lap by boat, the stream ends. Nene reflects on the achievements of this construction and expresses her enthusiasm for future streams.

highlights_en.title: Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu Boarding Area Final Adjustments
highlights_en.description: Continuing from the previous session, final adjustments are made to the Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu boarding area. Nene attempts fine-tuning of the water flow and platform to ensure smooth boat operation.

highlights_en.title: Ookami Mio Appears and Architectural Discussion
highlights_en.description: Ookami Mio appears on the server, marveling at the height of the water-flow elevator Nene built. When Nene explains it as a 'mobile observation deck' and reveals it's an attraction where you manually paddle the boat, Mio is even more surprised.

highlights_en.title: Developing Access Paths to the Boarding Area
highlights_en.description: After Ookami Mio leaves, Nene begins installing glowing glowstone paths to improve access to the boat boarding area. She develops the path for smooth use.

highlights_en.title: Installation of Boat Resupply Chest and Rule Sign
highlights_en.description: A chest for boat resupply is installed at the water-flow elevator's boarding area. Although a door for exiting was initially set up, Nene re-installs a sign reading 'You can't leave until you've completed one full lap!' to match the park's circular concept.

highlights_en.title: Achievement Unlocked: 'Be Not Afraid of This Gleaming!'
highlights_en.description: A notification 'Achievement Unlocked! Be Not Afraid of This Gleaming!' appears in Minecraft, and Nene rejoices at the accomplishment. This feat demonstrates Nene's building skills.

highlights_en.title: Bell Installation and Sound Verification
highlights_en.description: A bell is installed at the boarding area, and its sound is verified. Afterwards, Nene finds another bell installed on a distant cherry blossom tree, reacts to its sound, and fully enjoys the world of Minecraft.

highlights_en.title: Hoshimachi Suisei Appears and Architectural Tour
highlights_en.description: Hoshimachi Suisei appears on the server and is surprised by Nene's constructions (especially the water-flow elevator), exclaiming, 'What is this? Such a tall building is towering!' Nene proudly introduces her creation.

highlights_en.title: Peeking at Suisei's Secret Work
highlights_en.description: Nene invites Suisei to ride the boat, but Suisei replies that she's 'working behind the scenes.' Nene observes the giant, Tower of Babel-like structure Suisei is working on from a distance. It's a moment where their shared passion for building is felt.

highlights_en.title: Photographing the Scenery from the Completed Water-Flow Boat
highlights_en.description: Boarding the completed 'Dentetsu Momotaro Momotetsu' boat, Nene takes screenshots while gazing at the entire park. She is filled with the magnificent scenery and a sense of accomplishment.

highlights_en.title: End of Stream Greetings and Future Outlook
highlights_en.description: After completing the park tour, Nene gives her closing greetings for the stream. She reflects on the building achievements of this session, expresses her enthusiasm for future streams, and thanks her viewers.

highlights_en.title: In-Game Activities After Stream End and Ookami Mio's Reappearance
highlights_en.description: Even after the stream ends, Nene continues her in-game activities. During this time, Ookami Mio reappears and once again expresses surprise at Nene's construction. Nene feels joy that her creation is influencing other streamers.

title: 【雑談】一蘭がうますぎる件について　#っぱ一蘭だわ【ホロライブ/白上フブキ】

overview.summary: 白上フブキがラーメンチェーン店「一蘭」の魅力について語る雑談配信。視聴者から一蘭のおすすめの食べ方や店舗での体験談を募集し、写真とともに紹介しながら、そのこだわりや魅力を深掘りしました。一蘭のユニークな味集中カウンターや替え玉システム、麺の製法、秘伝のタレなど、多岐にわたる話題が交わされ、フブキ自身も配信後に一蘭へ行く予定だと語るなど、一蘭への深い愛が感じられる内容でした。特に、視聴者からの様々なカスタマイズ方法や初体験談、限定メニューの紹介など、一蘭の多様な楽しみ方が紹介され、フブキもそれらの魅力に共感したり驚いたりする様子が見られました。終盤では、一蘭の海外展開や工場見学といった話題にも触れ、その奥深さを再認識する配信となりました。最後はホロメンと一蘭を食べる際の性癖トークで盛り上がり、公式アニメーションのエンディングへと繋がります。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、一蘭への愛情と熱量が高い

highlights.title: 一蘭のテーマと配信の目的
highlights.description: 白上フブキが配信を開始し、本日は一蘭について語る配信であることを説明。視聴者からの一蘭の感想や食べ方を募集し、配信後に自身も一蘭へ食べに行く予定だと語る。

highlights.title: 一蘭への強い熱意
highlights.description: 最近一蘭にハマりすぎて、深夜にホロメンを誘って食べに行ってしまうほどだと一蘭への強いこだわりと熱意を語る。

highlights.title: 一蘭のこだわり：世界一の研究
highlights.description: 一蘭が豚骨ラーメン1本に絞り、世界一研究し続けている会社であること、40人以上の専属職人が研究に情熱を注いでいること、豚骨エキスを一切使用しない純粋な豚骨スープの製法、そして「赤い秘伝のたれ」について詳しく説明。

highlights.title: 麺へのこだわりと提供ルール
highlights.description: 一蘭の麺が細麺であること、日々の天候・気温・湿度を考慮して毎日麺を熟成させていること、ラーメンは提供から15秒以内に食べ始めるのが最も美味しいとされ、席を立つ席を設けていないことなどを説明。

highlights.title: 味集中カウンターの魅力
highlights.description: 半個室のような「味集中カウンター」により、周りの目を気にせずラーメンに集中できるシステムや、オーダー用紙で替え玉を注文できる簡便性について解説。

highlights.title: 替え玉システムと注文の工夫
highlights.description: 替え玉にダシがかかっており、そのまま食べても美味しいこと、オーダー用紙を使って追加注文が簡単にできることを説明。

highlights.title: 卓上の設備とインキャに優しいシステム
highlights.description: 卓上に水飲み放題の蛇口があること、店員を呼ばずに済むためインキャに優しいシステムであることを強調。写真を見ながら、麺の硬さや辛さ、ネギの種類などを細かくカスタマイズできるオーダー用紙について紹介。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：2000円超えのトッピング
highlights.description: 視聴者からの「2000円超えちゃうズルルルン」という投稿を紹介。高額なトッピングでラーメンを豪華にすることや、写真に写る博多の店舗の重厚な器に注目する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：どんぶりの底のメッセージ
highlights.description: 視聴者からの「食べ終わったらどんぶりの底にメッセージがあった」という投稿を紹介。どんぶりの底に「この一滴が最高の喜びです」というメッセージが書かれていることを発見。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：秘伝のタレ20倍
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ20倍に挑戦した視聴者からの投稿を紹介。辛すぎて汗が止まらないものの美味しかったというコメントに感銘を受ける。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：オーソドックスなオーダー
highlights.description: オーソドックスなオーダーで一蘭を楽しんだ視聴者の投稿を紹介。カスタマイズはせず、麺の硬さだけ「超硬」にしていると語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：福岡限定ネギ
highlights.description: 福岡の店舗で、白ネギと青ネギを両方カスタマイズした視聴者の投稿を紹介。脂解美茶が口の中をさっぱりさせてくれるという情報にフブキも驚く。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初一蘭体験
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭に行った視聴者の投稿を紹介。豚骨ラーメンの臭みがなく、あっさりしていて美味しかったという感想。深夜の店内でバーのような雰囲気だったことに触れる。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：大量のゆで卵
highlights.description: 大量のゆで卵（8個）とラーメンの投稿を紹介。ゆで卵好きにはたまらない光景にフブキも興奮。卓上にある水出しの冷たいお水も魅力の一つ。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：キクラゲの食感
highlights.description: 大量のキクラゲがトッピングされたラーメンの投稿を紹介。キクラゲのコリコリした食感がたまらないというコメントに共感する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：秘伝のタレ20倍
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ20倍に挑戦した視聴者からの投稿。「20倍は美味い」というコメントに驚きつつも興味を示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：定番カスタマイズ
highlights.description: オーソドックスな注文で一蘭を楽しんだ視聴者の投稿を紹介。辛さ控えめで麺を「超硬」にしているというこだわりを語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：両ネギカスタマイズ
highlights.description: 白ネギと青ネギを両方入れたカスタマイズの投稿を紹介。脂解美茶が口の中をさっぱりさせてくれるという情報にフブキも「へぇ～」と感嘆する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：豚骨の臭みがなくてあっさり
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭に行った視聴者の投稿。「豚骨の臭みがなく、あっさりしていて美味しかった」という感想に「それわかる！」と共感。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：トッピングモリモリ
highlights.description: たくさんのトッピングが載ったラーメンの投稿を紹介。フブキも「豪華！」と声を上げる。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：秘伝のタレ20倍
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ20倍に挑戦した視聴者からの投稿。「辛いけど美味い」というコメントにフブキも「やばい」と感嘆。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：オーソドックスな注文
highlights.description: オーソドックスな注文で一蘭を楽しんだ視聴者の投稿を紹介。フブキも「これこれこれ！」と納得の表情。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：両ネギカスタマイズ
highlights.description: 白ネギと青ネギを両方入れたカスタマイズの投稿を紹介。フブキも「いいな～」と羨む。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初めて一蘭
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭に行った視聴者の投稿。「美味しかった」というコメントにフブキも「最高！」と喜ぶ。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：トッピング豪華
highlights.description: たくさんのトッピングが載ったラーメンの投稿を紹介。フブキも「うわ～」と感嘆する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：秘伝のタレ20倍
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ20倍に挑戦した視聴者からの投稿。「辛いけど美味い」というコメントにフブキも「やばい」と感嘆。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：オーソドックスな注文
highlights.description: オーソドックスな注文で一蘭を楽しんだ視聴者の投稿を紹介。フブキも「これこれ！」と声を上げる。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：両ネギカスタマイズ
highlights.description: 白ネギと青ネギを両方入れたカスタマイズの投稿を紹介。フブキも「いいですね！」とコメント。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初一蘭
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭に行った視聴者の投稿。「美味しかった」というコメントにフブキも「最高！」と喜ぶ。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：トッピング豪華
highlights.description: たくさんのトッピングが載ったラーメンの投稿を紹介。フブキも「うわ～」と感嘆する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：秘伝のタレ20倍
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ20倍に挑戦した視聴者からの投稿。「辛いけど美味い」というコメントにフブキも「やばい」と感嘆。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：こだわりカスタマイズ
highlights.description: 白ネギと青ネギを両方入れ、オスカランの酸味を3倍にしてスープを飲み干す食べ方を披露。フブキもそのこだわりと美味しさに共感する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：替え玉の美味しさ
highlights.description: スープの濃さと麺の絡みが最高で、替え玉にダシがかかって甘みが増すこと、味集中カウンターでのストレスフリーな体験を絶賛する投稿。フブキも「うまい！」を連呼して共感。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：替え玉無限
highlights.description: 替え玉を無限に食べられる美味しさと、秘伝のタレを一番多くする食べ方を披露。フブキは「無限の胃袋が欲しい」と願う。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：豚骨の臭みがない一蘭
highlights.description: 某ラーメンアニメがきっかけで一蘭を知った視聴者。豚骨ラーメン特有の臭みがなく、あっさりとしていて美味しいと絶賛。フブキも博多でバリカタ麺の美味しさに目覚めたエピソードを語る。

highlights.title: フブキの感想：一蘭のあっさり豚骨
highlights.description: 普段食べる濃厚な豚骨ラーメンと比較し、一蘭のあっさりとした味が胃に優しく、何度でも食べられる点が魅力だと語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：数年ぶりの一蘭
highlights.description: 数年ぶりに一蘭を訪れた視聴者が、座席案内板がデジタル化されていたことに驚き。替え玉時にチャーシューや卵を追加して豪華にする楽しさを発見したと語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：一蘭本店での体験
highlights.description: 一蘭本店に2時間並んで入店した視聴者からの投稿。席の仕切りやオーダー用紙のカスタマイズの細かさに感動。秘伝のタレ10倍は辛いが美味しかったと報告する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：朝一蘭
highlights.description: 旅行中に朝から一蘭を堪能した視聴者。朝9時48分にラーメンを食べている写真が投稿される。フブキも早朝からラーメンを食べる体験に興味津々。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：煮込みチャーシュー
highlights.description: 煮込みチャーシューと大量のネギ、秘伝のタレでカスタムされたラーメンの投稿。フブキも「ビジュアルがうまい」「ネギ好きにはたまらない」と大絶賛。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：一蘭本社ビル
highlights.description: 一蘭の本社ビルが中洲エリアにあるという投稿。写真に写る重厚なビルや、テーブル席とカウンター席が完全に分かれている構造、1階には土産物エリアもあることにフブキも驚く。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初の味集中カウンター
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭を訪れ、注文方法が分からず友人に頼んだ視聴者の思い出。フブキは「インキャに優しいシステム」だと強調し、初心者にも安心な点を語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：抹茶杏仁
highlights.description: 辛さ5倍のラーメンと、初のデザート「抹茶杏仁」を食した視聴者の投稿。フブキは抹茶杏仁の存在に驚き、食べてみたいとコメントする。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：推し活と一蘭
highlights.description: 福岡での推し活でフブキのぬいぐるみを一蘭に連れて行った視聴者。ぬいぐるみとラーメンの共演写真にフブキも喜びを示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：辛さ20倍への挑戦
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ10倍に挑戦し美味しかったため、次回20倍に挑戦したいと意欲を見せる視聴者。フブキは激辛好きの「激辛スコーン部」のメンバーにも触れ、辛いもの好きにはたまらないと語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：集中できる空間
highlights.description: 労働後の夕食に一蘭を訪れた視聴者。仕切りがあるため周りを気にせずラーメンに集中できる環境の良さに満足感を示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：一蘭ギフトの流行
highlights.description: ホロライブのライバー間で流行している「一蘭ギフト」の話題。フブキも両親に一蘭ギフトを贈ったことがあると明かし、ラーメン愛が感じられると語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：人生初一蘭
highlights.description: 「人生初一蘭」で緊張しつつも完食した喜びを語る視聴者。フブキも初めての経験に共感する。

highlights.title: フブキの麺の硬さ論
highlights.description: フブキは麺の硬さについて、バリカタ、粉落とし、ハリガネなどの硬めの麺を好むと語る。他の店舗でも可能な裏技だと付け加える。

highlights.title: フブキの海外一蘭情報
highlights.description: 一蘭がニューヨークや香港、台湾など海外にも展開していることに驚きを示すフブキ。グローバルなラーメンチェーンとしてその存在感を再認識する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：煮込みチャーシューとネギ
highlights.description: 煮込みチャーシューと大量のネギ、秘伝のタレでカスタムされたラーメンの投稿。フブキも「ビジュアルがうまい」「ネギ好きにはたまらない」と大絶賛する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：一蘭本社巡り
highlights.description: 一蘭の本社が中洲エリアにあるという投稿。写真に写る重厚なビルや、テーブル席とカウンター席が完全に分かれている構造、1階には土産物エリアもあることにフブキも驚き、興味を示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：注文方法の戸惑い
highlights.description: 初めて一蘭を訪れた際に注文方法が分からず戸惑った視聴者。「インキャに優しいシステム」とフブキは強調し、初心者にも安心な点を語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：フブキと一蘭の共演
highlights.description: 福岡での推し活でフブキのぬいぐるみを一蘭に連れて行った視聴者からの写真投稿。ぬいぐるみとラーメンの共演にフブキも喜びを示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：辛さ10倍挑戦
highlights.description: 秘伝のタレ10倍に挑戦した視聴者の投稿。辛くなく美味しかったため、次回は20倍に挑戦したいと意欲を見せる。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：仕事帰りの一蘭
highlights.description: 仕事帰りの一蘭で疲れた体を癒す視聴者の投稿。仕切りがあるため周りを気にせずラーメンに集中できる環境の良さに満足感を示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：一蘭ギフト
highlights.description: ホロライブのライバー間で流行している「一蘭ギフト」の話題。フブキも両親に一蘭ギフトを贈ったことがあると明かし、ラーメン愛が感じられると語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初の客席体験
highlights.description: 「人生初一蘭」で緊張しつつも完食した喜びを語る視聴者。フブキも初めての経験に共感する。

highlights.title: フブキの麺のこだわり
highlights.description: フブキは麺の硬さについて、バリカタ、粉落とし、ハリガネなどの硬めの麺を好むと語る。他の店舗でも可能な裏技だと付け加える。

highlights.title: フブキの海外一蘭への驚き
highlights.description: 一蘭がニューヨークや香港など海外にも展開していることに驚きを示すフブキ。グローバルなラーメンチェーンとしてその存在感を再認識する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：大量ネギトッピング
highlights.description: 煮込みチャーシューと大量のネギが乗ったラーメンの投稿。フブキも「ビジュアルがうまい」「ネギ好きにはたまらない」と大絶賛する。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：本社ビルの写真
highlights.description: 一蘭の本社が中洲エリアにあるという投稿。写真に写る重厚なビルや、テーブル席とカウンター席が完全に分かれている構造、1階には土産物エリアもあることにフブキも驚き、興味を示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：初一蘭の戸惑い
highlights.description: 注文方法に戸惑った思い出を語る視聴者。フブキは「インキャに優しいシステム」だと改めて強調し、初心者でも安心して楽しめる点を語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：フブキとの共演
highlights.description: 福岡での推し活でフブキのぬいぐるみを一蘭に連れて行った視聴者からの写真投稿。ぬいぐるみとラーメンの共演にフブキも喜びを示す。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：辛さ20倍への道
highlights.description: 辛さ10倍に挑戦した視聴者の投稿。辛くなく美味しかったため、次回は20倍に挑戦したいと語る。

highlights.title: 視聴者投稿：癒しの一蘭
highlights.description: 仕事帰りの一蘭で疲れた体を癒す視聴者の投稿。仕切りがあるため周りを気にせずラーメンに集中できる環境の良さに満足感を示す。

highlights.title: フブキの締め挨拶
highlights.description: フブキは一蘭の奥深さについて語り、配信を見てラーメンが食べたくなったリスナーはぜひ食べに行ってほしいと締めくくる。

highlights.title: ホロメンと一蘭の楽しみ方
highlights.description: ホロライブメンバーと一蘭に行った際、メンバーが髪の毛を耳にかけてラーメンを食べる姿が「超かわいい」とフブキが力説し、それは「ただの性癖」だと語る。

highlights.title: エンディング映像「せーのでぱんぎゅー！」
highlights.description: 配信が終了し、ホロライブの公式アニメーション「ホロぐら」のエンディング映像が流れる。メンバーがゲームオーバーになり寝落ちする様子が描かれている。

overview_en.summary: Shirakami Fubuki held a chat stream discussing the appeal of the ramen chain 'Ichiran'. She invited viewers to share their recommended ways to eat Ichiran and their experiences at its stores, then showcased them with photos, delving into Ichiran's unique characteristics and charms. A wide range of topics were covered, including Ichiran's unique flavor concentration booths, its noodle refill system (kaedama), noodle manufacturing methods, and its secret sauce. Fubuki herself expressed her deep love for Ichiran, even planning to visit one after the stream. Notably, various ways to enjoy Ichiran were presented through viewer submissions, such as diverse customization options, first-time experiences, and limited menu introductions, with Fubuki showing empathy and surprise at their appeal. Towards the end, the discussion also touched upon Ichiran's overseas expansion and factory tours, reaffirming its profound depth. The stream concluded with a lively discussion about eating Ichiran with other HoloMembers, described by Fubuki as 'just a personal fetish,' leading into the official animation's ending.
overview_en.mood: A consistently peaceful atmosphere, with high love and passion for Ichiran

highlights_en.title: Ichiran's Theme and Stream Purpose
highlights_en.description: Shirakami Fubuki started the stream, explaining that today's topic would be Ichiran. She solicited viewers' impressions and eating methods for Ichiran, stating her own plan to go eat Ichiran after the stream.

highlights_en.title: Strong Enthusiasm for Ichiran
highlights_en.description: She expressed her strong dedication and enthusiasm for Ichiran, saying she's recently become so obsessed that she even invites HoloMembers to eat it late at night.

highlights_en.title: Ichiran's Commitment: World's Best Research
highlights_en.description: She explained in detail that Ichiran specializes solely in Tonkotsu ramen, continuously researching it to be the world's best, with over 40 dedicated craftsmen pouring their passion into research. She also described the method of making pure Tonkotsu soup without using any pork bone extract, and the 'Red Secret Sauce'.

highlights_en.title: Commitment to Noodles and Serving Rules
highlights_en.description: She explained that Ichiran's noodles are thin, matured daily considering the weather, temperature, and humidity, and that ramen is best eaten within 15 seconds of serving, which is why there are no standing tables.

highlights_en.title: The Appeal of the Flavor Concentration Booth
highlights_en.description: She explained the 'Flavor Concentration Booths,' which are like semi-private cubicles allowing one to focus on ramen without minding others, and the convenience of ordering noodle refills (kaedama) using an order sheet.

highlights_en.title: Noodle Refill System and Ordering Ingenuity
highlights_en.description: She explained that the noodle refills come with broth, making them delicious even on their own, and that additional orders can be easily placed using the order sheet.

highlights_en.title: Tabletop Amenities and Introvert-Friendly System
highlights_en.description: She emphasized that there's a free-flowing water tap on the table, and it's an introvert-friendly system since you don't need to call a staff member. While looking at photos, she introduced the order sheet that allows for detailed customization of noodle firmness, spiciness, and type of green onion.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Toppings Over 2000 Yen
highlights_en.description: She introduced a viewer's submission titled 'Slurping over 2000 yen.' She noted how luxurious the ramen becomes with expensive toppings and pointed out the substantial bowl used in the Hakata store shown in the photo.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Message at the Bottom of the Bowl
highlights_en.description: She introduced a viewer's submission titled 'There was a message at the bottom of the bowl after I finished eating.' She discovered the message 'This last drop is the greatest joy' written at the bottom of the bowl.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Secret Sauce 20x
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who challenged the Secret Sauce at 20x strength. She was impressed by the comment that it was so spicy it made them sweat uncontrollably, yet it was delicious.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Orthodox Order
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who enjoyed Ichiran with an orthodox order. They stated that they didn't customize anything except the noodle firmness to 'super firm'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Fukuoka Limited Green Onions
highlights_en.description: She introduced a viewer's submission from a Fukuoka store, where they customized with both white and green onions. Fubuki was also surprised by the information that 'Shikai Bicha' (Fat-Dissolving Beauty Tea) freshens the mouth.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Ichiran Experience
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who visited Ichiran for the first time. Their impression was that the Tonkotsu ramen had no strong smell, was light, and delicious. They also mentioned that the late-night store had a bar-like atmosphere.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Many Boiled Eggs
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing ramen with many (8) boiled eggs. Fubuki was excited by the sight, irresistible to egg lovers. She also mentioned that the cold water dispenser on the table is one of its charms.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Kikurage Texture
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing ramen topped with a large amount of wood ear mushrooms (kikurage). She empathized with the comment that the crunchy texture of kikurage is irresistible.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Secret Sauce 20x
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who challenged the Secret Sauce at 20x strength. She was surprised but also showed interest in the comment that '20x is delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Classic Customization
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who enjoyed Ichiran with a classic order. They explained their preference for less spiciness and 'super firm' noodles.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Both Green Onion Customization
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing a customization with both white and green onions. Fubuki exclaimed 'Oh, really~' in admiration upon hearing that 'Shikai Bicha' (Fat-Dissolving Beauty Tea) freshens the mouth.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Light Tonkotsu with No Odor
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who visited Ichiran for the first time. She empathized with their comment, saying 'I know that feeling!' about the Tonkotsu ramen having no strong smell, being light, and delicious.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Loaded with Toppings
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing ramen loaded with many toppings. Fubuki exclaimed, 'Luxurious!'

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Secret Sauce 20x
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who challenged the Secret Sauce at 20x strength. Fubuki exclaimed 'That's insane!' in admiration at the comment 'It's spicy but delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Orthodox Order
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who enjoyed Ichiran with an orthodox order. Fubuki looked satisfied, exclaiming 'This, this, this!'

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Both Green Onion Customization
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing a customization with both white and green onions. Fubuki looked envious, saying 'That's nice~'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Time at Ichiran
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who visited Ichiran for the first time. Fubuki rejoiced, exclaiming 'Amazing!' at the comment 'It was delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Luxurious Toppings
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing ramen loaded with many toppings. Fubuki exclaimed 'Wow~' in admiration.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Secret Sauce 20x
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who challenged the Secret Sauce at 20x strength. Fubuki exclaimed 'That's insane!' in admiration at the comment 'It's spicy but delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Orthodox Order
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who enjoyed Ichiran with an orthodox order. Fubuki exclaimed 'This is it!'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Both Green Onion Customization
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing a customization with both white and green onions. Fubuki commented, 'That's nice!'

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Time at Ichiran
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who visited Ichiran for the first time. Fubuki rejoiced, exclaiming 'Amazing!' at the comment 'It was delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Luxurious Toppings
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission showing ramen loaded with many toppings. Fubuki exclaimed 'Wow~' in admiration.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Secret Sauce 20x
highlights_en.description: She introduced a submission from a viewer who challenged the Secret Sauce at 20x strength. Fubuki exclaimed 'That's insane!' in admiration at the comment 'It's spicy but delicious'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Elaborate Customization
highlights_en.description: She introduced a way of eating that included both white and green onions, tripling the acidity of 'Osukaran', and drinking all the soup. Fubuki empathized with their dedication and the deliciousness.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Deliciousness of Noodle Refills
highlights_en.description: A submission praising the perfect richness of the soup and how well it coats the noodles, how the noodle refills come with broth that adds sweetness, and the stress-free experience at the Flavor Concentration Booths. Fubuki repeatedly exclaimed 'Delicious!' in agreement.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Endless Noodle Refills
highlights_en.description: She introduced the deliciousness of being able to eat endless noodle refills and a way of eating with the most Secret Sauce. Fubuki wished for 'an infinite stomach'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran's Odorless Tonkotsu
highlights_en.description: A viewer who discovered Ichiran through a certain ramen anime praised it for its lack of the characteristic Tonkotsu ramen smell, calling it light and delicious. Fubuki also shared an anecdote about discovering the deliciousness of 'barikata' (very firm) noodles in Hakata.

highlights_en.title: Fubuki's Impression: Ichiran's Light Tonkotsu
highlights_en.description: Comparing it to the rich Tonkotsu ramen she usually eats, Fubuki stated that Ichiran's light flavor is gentle on the stomach and can be eaten repeatedly, which is its charm.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran After Several Years
highlights_en.description: A viewer who visited Ichiran after several years was surprised by the digitized seating guide. They shared that they discovered the joy of making their ramen luxurious by adding chashu pork and eggs with their noodle refills.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Experience at Ichiran's Main Store
highlights_en.description: A submission from a viewer who waited in line for 2 hours to enter Ichiran's main store. They were impressed by the seat partitions and the detailed customization options on the order sheet. They reported that the Secret Sauce at 10x strength was spicy but delicious.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Morning Ichiran
highlights_en.description: A viewer who enjoyed Ichiran from the morning during their trip. A photo of them eating ramen at 9:48 AM was submitted. Fubuki was very interested in the experience of eating ramen early in the morning.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Braised Chashu
highlights_en.description: A submission showing ramen customized with braised chashu, a large amount of green onions, and Secret Sauce. Fubuki highly praised it, saying 'The visual is delicious' and 'It's irresistible for green onion lovers'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran Headquarters Building
highlights_en.description: A submission mentioning that Ichiran's headquarters building is in the Nakasu area. Fubuki was surprised by the imposing building shown in the photo, the structure where table seats and counter seats are completely separate, and the souvenir area on the first floor.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Flavor Concentration Booth Experience
highlights_en.description: A viewer's memory of visiting Ichiran for the first time, not knowing how to order, and relying on a friend. Fubuki emphasized that it's an 'introvert-friendly system' and talked about how it's reassuring for beginners.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Matcha Annin Tofu
highlights_en.description: A viewer's submission showing ramen with 5x spiciness and their first time trying the dessert 'Matcha Annin Tofu'. Fubuki was surprised by the existence of Matcha Annin Tofu and commented that she wanted to try it.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Oshi-katsu and Ichiran
highlights_en.description: A viewer who took Fubuki's plushie to Ichiran during their 'Oshi-katsu' (fan activities) in Fukuoka. Fubuki showed joy at the photo of the plushie and ramen together.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Challenge to 20x Spiciness
highlights_en.description: A viewer who tried the Secret Sauce at 10x strength and found it delicious expressed their eagerness to try 20x next time. Fubuki mentioned members of the 'Spicy Scone Club' who love spicy food, saying it's irresistible for those who enjoy heat.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Space for Concentration
highlights_en.description: A viewer who visited Ichiran for dinner after work. They expressed satisfaction with the environment, where partitions allow them to concentrate on their ramen without minding their surroundings.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran Gift Trend
highlights_en.description: The topic of 'Ichiran Gifts' trending among Hololive talents. Fubuki revealed that she had also given Ichiran Gifts to her parents, remarking that it shows their love for ramen.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Ichiran Experience in Life
highlights_en.description: A viewer who spoke of the joy of finishing their 'first Ichiran ever' despite being nervous. Fubuki also empathized with their first-time experience.

highlights_en.title: Fubuki's Theory on Noodle Firmness
highlights_en.description: Fubuki spoke about her preference for firmer noodles, such as 'barikata' (very firm), 'konaotoshi' (powder drop), and 'harigane' (wire-firm). She added that this is a trick that can also be done at other stores.

highlights_en.title: Fubuki's Information on Ichiran Abroad
highlights_en.description: Fubuki expressed surprise that Ichiran has expanded overseas to places like New York, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. She re-recognized its presence as a global ramen chain.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Braised Chashu and Green Onions
highlights_en.description: A submission showing ramen customized with braised chashu, a large amount of green onions, and Secret Sauce. Fubuki highly praised it, saying 'The visual is delicious' and 'It's irresistible for green onion lovers'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Tour of Ichiran Headquarters
highlights_en.description: A submission mentioning that Ichiran's headquarters is in the Nakasu area. Fubuki was surprised and showed interest in the imposing building shown in the photo, the structure where table seats and counter seats are completely separate, and the souvenir area on the first floor.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Confusion with Ordering Method
highlights_en.description: A viewer who described their confusion when visiting Ichiran for the first time, not knowing how to order. Fubuki reiterated that it's an 'introvert-friendly system' and explained how it's reassuring for beginners.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Fubuki and Ichiran Collaboration
highlights_en.description: A viewer's photo submission from their 'Oshi-katsu' (fan activities) in Fukuoka, where they brought Fubuki's plushie to Ichiran. Fubuki showed joy at the sight of the plushie and ramen together.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Challenge to 10x Spiciness
highlights_en.description: A viewer's submission about challenging the Secret Sauce at 10x strength. Since it wasn't too spicy and was delicious, they showed eagerness to try 20x next time.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran After Work
highlights_en.description: A viewer's submission about relieving their tired body at Ichiran after work. They expressed satisfaction with the environment, where partitions allow them to concentrate on their ramen without minding their surroundings.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Ichiran Gift
highlights_en.description: The topic of 'Ichiran Gifts' trending among Hololive talents. Fubuki revealed that she had also given Ichiran Gifts to her parents, remarking that it shows their love for ramen.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Seating Experience
highlights_en.description: A viewer who spoke of the joy of finishing their 'first Ichiran ever' despite being nervous. Fubuki also empathized with their first-time experience.

highlights_en.title: Fubuki's Commitment to Noodles
highlights_en.description: Fubuki spoke about her preference for firmer noodles, such as 'barikata' (very firm), 'konaotoshi' (powder drop), and 'harigane' (wire-firm). She added that this is a trick that can also be done at other stores.

highlights_en.title: Fubuki's Surprise at Ichiran's Overseas Presence
highlights_en.description: Fubuki expressed surprise that Ichiran has expanded overseas to places like New York and Hong Kong. She re-recognized its presence as a global ramen chain.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Large Green Onion Topping
highlights_en.description: A submission showing ramen with braised chashu and a large amount of green onions. Fubuki highly praised it, saying 'The visual is delicious' and 'It's irresistible for green onion lovers'.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: Headquarters Building Photo
highlights_en.description: A submission mentioning that Ichiran's headquarters is in the Nakasu area. Fubuki was surprised and showed interest in the imposing building shown in the photo, the structure where table seats and counter seats are completely separate, and the souvenir area on the first floor.

highlights_en.title: Viewer Submission: First Ichiran Confusion
highlights_en.description: A viewer recounted their memory of being confused by the ordering method. Fubuki once again emphasized that it's an 'introvert-friendly system' and explained how beginners can enjoy it without worry.
