highlights_en.title: Nogizaka46 Collaboration Achieved
highlights_en.description: She announces her guest appearance on Hoshimachi Suisei's VR radio 'Nogizaka-chan VR' with Nogizaka46, of whom she is a huge fan. She passionately expresses her joy that her dream has come true, as Nogizaka46 was also her inspiration for becoming a VTuber. She is happy that those around her also knew she was a Nogizaka fan.

highlights_en.title: Her Theory on Romance and Money
highlights_en.description: Takane Lui's thoughts on financial topics in romance are discussed. She expresses discomfort with partners mentioning money and elaborates on her theory, interweaving jokes.

highlights_en.title: Possibility of a Summer Festival Date
highlights_en.description: Reading listener comments about summer, she also says, 'I want to go to a summer festival with you too.' She makes a suggestive remark, 'Maybe I'll go on a summer festival date with someone,' exciting the listeners.

highlights_en.title: Thanks to Listeners and Birthday Wishes
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude while reading Super Chats from viewers. She directly congratulates listeners who celebrate their birthday as the date changes, saying 'Happy Birthday'.

highlights_en.title: Support for Comiket Attendees and Joy for Events
highlights_en.description: She sends encouragement to listeners planning to attend Comiket (Comic Market), saying 'Have fun!' She talks about her joy that her birthday coincides with events and also shares an episode of a friend sending her a photo of Tokyo Station.

highlights_en.title: Stream End Greetings
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude to viewers and says 'Otsukaresama deshita!' (Thank you for your hard work/Good job!) as she concludes the stream. She promises to reunite in the next stream (tomorrow at 12 PM) and transitions to the ending.

title: 【尾丸ポルカ5周年】記念にむけてカウントダウン🎂歌ったり騒いだり🌺【尾丸ポルカ/ホロライブ】

overview.summary: 尾丸ポルカさんの5周年を記念したカウントダウン配信。冒頭のOPアニメーション後、クリスマス衣装で登場し、視聴者からの祝福コメントに感謝を伝えつつ、独特な時間感覚で年末年始のような賑やかさを見せる。配信中盤には視聴者参加型のアンケートでポルカを知ったきっかけや、ホロメンの記念広告について盛り上がり、結果に一喜一憂。5周年を無事に迎えられたことへの喜びと、これまで支えてくれたリスナーへの深い感謝を熱く語る。終盤にはホロライブの楽曲「Shiny Smily Story」「Our Bright Parade」「BLUE CLAPPER」を披露し、ファンとの一体感を深め、改めて5周年を盛大に祝った。来たる6周年へ向けて邁進していくこと、そしてホロサマでの新たな活動についても触れ、今後の期待を高めた。
overview.mood: 明るく楽しい雰囲気で、時折感動的な場面が見られる

highlights.title: 配信開始とクリスマス衣装
highlights.description: OPアニメーションの後、クリスマス衣装のポルカが登場し、視聴者に挨拶。

highlights.title: 季節感の話題と「メリークリクリ」
highlights.description: 年末年始の賑わいが混ざったような雰囲気と、リスナーの「メリークリクリ」コメントに反応してテンションが上がる。

highlights.title: 夕飯を食べ損ねた話
highlights.description: 配信者の時間感覚が狂っており、夕飯を食べ損ねたことを明かす。

highlights.title: 5周年へのワクワクと温かいお祝い
highlights.description: 5周年を迎えることへのワクワクを表現し、年越しやクリスマスに例えた視聴者からの温かいお祝いコメントに感謝する。

highlights.title: 夜食の誘惑と0時を過ぎたら
highlights.description: 視聴者から夜食の話題が出始め、深夜0時を過ぎると誘惑に抗えないと話す。

highlights.title: 記念広告への感謝
highlights.description: 5周年記念の特別な広告が展開されていることについて、関係者への感謝を述べる。

highlights.title: 5周年記念！ポルカを知ったきっかけアンケート企画
highlights.description: 5周年を記念して、視聴者がポルカを知ったきっかけについてアンケートを取る企画を開始する。

highlights.title: アンケートの選択肢と初期結果
highlights.description: ポルカを知った時期に関するアンケートを開始。初期結果として、朝活やデビューからなど、様々な流入経路があることが示される。

highlights.title: 「ヤバイやつしか残ってない」自虐ネタ
highlights.description: アンケート結果で初期のファンが少ないことから、自分のファンは「ヤバイやつしか残ってない」と自虐的な発言をする。

highlights.title: 知ったきっかけの多様性
highlights.description: Palworld、ユズユズ、ディズニーでのコラボなど、視聴者がポルカを知ったきっかけが多岐にわたることに驚きを表現する。

highlights.title: アンケート項目再検討と「ポルカの伝説」追加
highlights.description: アンケート項目を「歌」、「ゲーム」、「その他」、「ポルカの伝説」に絞る。特に「ポルカの伝説」が上位に来ると予測する。

highlights.title: 「ポルカの伝説」が最多流入源と判明
highlights.description: アンケート結果で「ポルカの伝説」が最も票を集め、主要なファン流入源となっていることが判明し、驚きを隠せない様子。

highlights.title: 切り抜き動画の圧倒的影響力
highlights.description: アンケート結果から、切り抜き動画がポルカのファン層拡大に最も貢献していることが明らかになり、その影響力の大きさに驚嘆する。

highlights.title: ライブ配信とショート動画の特性
highlights.description: YouTubeのライブ配信とショート動画それぞれの役割について考察し、ショート動画が新規ファン獲得に大きく貢献していると分析する。

highlights.title: 感動的な5周年記念曲
highlights.description: アニメ「創聖のアクエリオン」の主題歌「君の神話〜アクエリオン第二章」をアカペラで熱唱。歌い終わりと共に「5周年おめでとう！！！」のメッセージが表示され、感動的な雰囲気に包まれる。

highlights.title: 5周年達成の喜びと感謝
highlights.description: 5周年を無事に迎えられたことへの喜びと、これまで支えてくれたリスナーへの深い感謝を熱く語る。

highlights.title: 「気持ちは完成してる」
highlights.description: 歌い切れなかった悔しさをにじませつつも、「気持ちは完成してる」と前向きな姿勢を見せる。

highlights.title: 「君の神話〜アクエリオン第二章」歌唱のクライマックス
highlights.description: ポルカが感情を込めて「君の神話〜アクエリオン第二章」を歌い上げ、リスナーからの温かい弾幕コメントに感謝を述べる。

highlights.title: 歌唱後の弾幕への感謝
highlights.description: 「真赤な誓い」などの弾幕コメントに喜び、歌い切った気持ち良さを語る。

highlights.title: 「Shiny Smily Story」歌い出し
highlights.description: ホロライブの代表曲「Shiny Smily Story」を歌い始め、ファンとの一体感で盛り上がる。

highlights.title: 「Shiny Smily Story」への想い
highlights.description: 「Shiny Smily Story」を歌枠で歌う機会が少ないことに触れ、歌えて嬉しいとコメント。ホロライブ全体の曲への愛着を語る。

highlights.title: 「Our Bright Parade」歌い出し
highlights.description: 続くホロライブの楽曲「Our Bright Parade」を歌い始め、さらなる盛り上がりを見せる。

highlights.title: 「BLUE CLAPPER」歌い出し
highlights.description: 配信最後の楽曲として「BLUE CLAPPER」を披露。リスナーとの完璧なコールで一体感が高まる。

highlights.title: 5周年を祝うフィナーレと感謝
highlights.description: 5期生全員での周年達成への感謝を述べ、6周年へ向けた決意を表明。ホロサマへの期待も語り、配信を締めくくる。

overview_en.summary: A countdown stream commemorating Omaru Polka's 5th anniversary. After the opening animation, she appeared in a Christmas costume, expressing gratitude for celebratory comments from viewers, and creating a lively, year-end/new-year atmosphere with her unique sense of time. In the middle of the stream, there was an audience-participation poll about how viewers discovered Polka and discussions about Holomem's anniversary advertisements, with reactions varying between joy and disappointment at the results. She passionately spoke of her joy in successfully reaching her 5th anniversary and her deep gratitude to the listeners who have supported her. Towards the end, she performed Hololive songs 'Shiny Smily Story,' 'Our Bright Parade,' and 'BLUE CLAPPER,' deepening her bond with fans and celebrating her 5th anniversary grandly once again. She also mentioned her progress towards the upcoming 6th anniversary and new activities during HoloSummer, raising expectations for the future.
overview_en.mood: Bright and fun atmosphere, with occasional touching moments

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Christmas Costume
highlights_en.description: After the opening animation, Polka appeared in a Christmas costume and greeted the viewers.

highlights_en.title: Seasonal Talk and 'Merry Kurikuri'
highlights_en.description: The atmosphere felt like a mix of year-end and new-year festivities, and her spirits lifted in response to listeners' 'Merry Kurikuri' comments.

highlights_en.title: Missed Dinner Story
highlights_en.description: The streamer's sense of time was off, and she revealed that she missed dinner.

highlights_en.title: Excitement for 5th Anniversary and Warm Celebrations
highlights_en.description: She expressed excitement about reaching her 5th anniversary and thanked viewers for their warm congratulatory comments, likening it to New Year's Eve or Christmas.

highlights_en.title: Midnight Snack Temptation and After Midnight
highlights_en.description: Viewers started talking about late-night snacks, and she mentioned that she can't resist temptation after midnight.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude for Anniversary Advertisements
highlights_en.description: She expressed gratitude to the relevant parties for the special 5th-anniversary advertisements.

highlights_en.title: 5th Anniversary! Poll: How You Discovered Polka
highlights_en.description: To commemorate her 5th anniversary, she started a poll asking viewers how they discovered Polka.

highlights_en.title: Poll Options and Initial Results
highlights_en.description: The poll about when viewers discovered Polka began. Initial results showed various entry points, such as from morning streams or since her debut.

highlights_en.title: Self-deprecating Joke: 'Only the Crazy Ones Are Left'
highlights_en.description: From the poll results showing few early fans, she made a self-deprecating remark that 'only the crazy ones are left' among her fans.

highlights_en.title: Diversity of Discovery Triggers
highlights_en.description: She expressed surprise at the diverse reasons viewers discovered Polka, such as Palworld, Yuzuyu, and Disney collaborations.

highlights_en.title: Poll Item Reconsideration and Adding 'Polka's Legend'
highlights_en.description: She narrowed down the poll categories to 'Singing,' 'Gaming,' 'Other,' and 'Polka's Legend.' She specifically predicted 'Polka's Legend' would be a top choice.

highlights_en.title: 'Polka's Legend' Revealed as Most Common Entry Point
highlights_en.description: The poll results revealed that 'Polka's Legend' received the most votes, becoming the main source of new fans, much to her surprise.

highlights_en.title: Overwhelming Influence of Clip Videos
highlights_en.description: From the poll results, it became clear that clip videos contributed most to the expansion of Polka's fanbase, and she was amazed by their significant influence.

highlights_en.title: Characteristics of Live Streams and Short Videos
highlights_en.description: She discussed the roles of YouTube live streams and short videos, analyzing that short videos significantly contribute to acquiring new fans.

highlights_en.title: Touching 5th Anniversary Song
highlights_en.description: She passionately sang an a cappella rendition of 'Kimi no Shinwa ~ Aquarion Dai Ni Shou,' the theme song from the anime 'Genesis of Aquarion.' As she finished singing, the message 'Happy 5th Anniversary!!!' appeared, creating a touching atmosphere.

highlights_en.title: Joy and Gratitude for Reaching 5 Years
highlights_en.description: She passionately spoke of her joy in successfully reaching her 5th anniversary and her deep gratitude to the listeners who have supported her.

highlights_en.title: 'The Feeling Is Complete'
highlights_en.description: While showing a hint of regret for not being able to finish the song, she maintained a positive attitude, saying 'the feeling is complete.'

highlights_en.title: Climax of 'Kimi no Shinwa ~ Aquarion Dai Ni Shou' Performance
highlights_en.description: Polka sang 'Kimi no Shinwa ~ Aquarion Dai Ni Shou' with emotion, expressing gratitude for the warm barrage of comments from listeners.

highlights_en.title: Gratitude for Barrage Comments After Singing
highlights_en.description: She expressed joy at the barrage comments like 'Makka na Chikai' and spoke about the satisfaction of finishing the song.

highlights_en.title: Start of 'Shiny Smily Story' Performance
highlights_en.description: She began singing 'Shiny Smily Story,' a representative Hololive song, building excitement and a sense of unity with fans.

highlights_en.title: Thoughts on 'Shiny Smily Story'
highlights_en.description: She mentioned that she rarely gets to sing 'Shiny Smily Story' in a singing stream and commented that she was happy to sing it. She spoke of her affection for the song as a whole Hololive track.

highlights_en.title: Start of 'Our Bright Parade' Performance
highlights_en.description: She continued by singing the next Hololive song, 'Our Bright Parade,' further heightening the excitement.

highlights_en.title: Start of 'BLUE CLAPPER' Performance
highlights_en.description: She performed 'BLUE CLAPPER' as the final song of the stream. A perfect call-and-response with listeners heightened the sense of unity.

highlights_en.title: 5th Anniversary Celebration Finale and Gratitude
highlights_en.description: She expressed gratitude for all 5th generation members reaching their anniversaries and declared her resolve for the 6th anniversary. She also spoke about her expectations for HoloSummer, bringing the stream to a close.

title: 【 シャドバWB/Shadowverse 】別クラス触って理解を深めてみる！！【ホロライブ/夏色まつり】

overview.summary: ホロライブの夏色まつりさんがShadowverse Worlds Beyondの「ナイトメア」クラスに挑戦する配信です。序盤は連敗が続くものの、リスナーのアドバイスを元にゲームへの理解を深め、初の勝利を収めるなど成長を見せます。しかし、後半のネメシス戦では「人形」デッキの強力な盤面処理能力に苦戦し、連敗。その後、意気込みを新たにビショップとの最終戦に挑むも、惜しくも配信終了時間となり、決着は次回に持ち越しとなりました。敗北時には「やめやめ、つまんなーい。」と冗談めかしてリタイアする場面もありつつ、常に明るく前向きな姿勢でゲームを楽しむ様子が印象的な配信です。
overview.mood: 終始和やかな雰囲気で、ゲーム中は真剣な表情も見られたが、負けても楽しむ姿勢を崩さない明るい配信。

highlights.title: 配信開始と今日の目標
highlights.description: ホロライブの夏色まつりさんがShadowverse Worlds Beyondの配信を開始。他のクラスも触って理解を深めたいと発言し、特に「ナイトメア」クラスに挑戦したいと意欲を見せる。

highlights.title: デッキ編成の準備
highlights.description: カード画面に移動し、デッキ編成について話す。配信前に猫に餌をあげていなかったことを思い出し、少し短い配信になるかもしれないと話す。

highlights.title: デッキ作成とクラス選択の意図
highlights.description: Twitterで調べた「最強デッキ」を使ってデッキを作成すると話す。改めてナイトメアをずっとやりたかったと発言し、サムネイルを自画自賛する。

highlights.title: デッキ編成画面でのカード効果確認
highlights.description: ナイトメアのデッキ画面を表示し、「墓場」や「ネクロマンス」といったクラス特有の概念についてリスナーに質問したり、カード効果を読み上げたりしながら理解を深めようとする。

highlights.title: デッキ保存と対戦形式の検討
highlights.description: デッキを保存し、ランクマッチに挑むか迷う。リスナーに助言を求め、「何もわかんないのにランクやんないほうがいい？」と質問。最終的にルームマッチで対戦相手を募集することに決める。

highlights.title: ルームマッチ開始と1戦目敗北
highlights.description: ルームマッチに「てんじゃー」さんが入室し、1戦目がスタート。先攻後攻の選択からカード効果の確認まで、リスナーとの交流を交えながら進めるが、結果はリタイアで敗北となる。敗北時には「やめやめ、つまんなーい。」と冗談めかして発言。

highlights.title: 2戦目開始とクラス特性の再確認
highlights.description: 「ゆり」さんと2戦目開始。先攻を選択。今回の対戦を通して、アクトやコンボ、進化といった新要素についてより深く理解しようと試みる。

highlights.title: 2戦目敗北と知識の壁
highlights.description: ロイヤルとの2戦目も敗北。クラスの特性やカードのシナジーについて理解が追いつかず、再びリタイアする。「おばかさんなんだから。」と自分を責めつつも、諦めずにプレイを続ける。

highlights.title: 3戦目開始と戦術の調整
highlights.description: 「激流」さんと3戦目開始。後攻を選択。これまでの敗戦を糧に、盤面処理を意識しつつも、より積極的に顔を狙うアグロ戦略を試みる。

highlights.title: 3戦目敗北と更なる学び
highlights.description: エルフとの3戦目も敗北。「アクト」の効果をターン終了時と勘違いしていたことに気づき、悔しがる。「もっと早く教えてほしかった！」とリスナーにツッコミを入れつつ、知識不足を痛感する。

highlights.title: 4戦目開始とネメシス対策
highlights.description: 「ゼロ」さんと4戦目開始。先攻を選択。相手はネメシス。過去の対戦経験から相性が悪いと感じつつも、積極的に盤面を構築し、攻撃を仕掛ける。

highlights.title: 4戦目敗北と経験の積み重ね
highlights.description: ネメシスとの4戦目も敗北。相手の強力な盤面処理能力や回復に苦戦し、決定打を欠く。敗戦から得た学びを次に活かすことを誓い、前向きな姿勢を保つ。

highlights.title: 5戦目開始と最後の挑戦
highlights.description: 「零」さんと5戦目開始。先攻を選択。引き続きネメシスとの対戦。これまでの経験を活かし、序盤から積極的に攻め立てるが、相手の盤面形成に苦しめられる。

highlights.title: 5戦目敗北と配信の締め
highlights.description: ネメシスとの5戦目も敗北。相手の強力な展開力と処理能力に屈する形となる。今回の配信を通して多くの学びがあったことを振り返り、今後の成長に期待を寄せつつ配信を締めくくる。

highlights.title: 6戦目開始、ネメシス相手に再挑戦
highlights.description: ネメシス相手にマリガン(手札交換)の重要性を確認しつつ、再挑戦。カード「アラガヴィー」をキープする。

highlights.title: 初の勝利！戦略が実を結ぶ
highlights.description: アラガヴィーの進化で相手のフォロワーを一掃し、リーダーに3ダメージを与えた後、直接攻撃でトドメを刺し、ついに初の勝利を飾る。喜びのあまり立ち上がる一幕も。

highlights.title: リプレイで戦術を振り返り
highlights.description: 勝利した試合のリプレイを見て、相手がPPを温存する戦略であったことを理解し、新たな気づきを得る。

highlights.title: 7戦目開始、ドラゴンとの対戦
highlights.description: マスターランクの対戦相手「GanGa」に感嘆しつつ、ドラゴンクラスとの対戦が開始される。後攻を選択。

highlights.title: 新たな敗北と反省
highlights.description: 相手の猛攻に屈し敗北。超進化を温存したのが間違いだったと反省しつつ、「やめやめ、つまんなーい。」とコメント。

highlights.title: 8戦目、ナイトメアミラーマッチ
highlights.description: 新たな対戦相手「いっしき_SSRB」とのナイトメアミラーマッチ。先攻を選択。

highlights.title: 戦略的勝利！進化と盤面処理の重要性
highlights.description: オルトロスの進化能力で相手リーダーにダメージを与えつつ、盤面を処理し、最終的に勝利を収める。シャドバの奥深さと、自身の成長に感動する様子を見せる。

highlights.title: 戦略的考察と学習の継続
highlights.description: 今回の対戦を通して、「アグロ」戦術における盤面処理とフェイスダメージのバランスの難しさ、そして「超進化」のタイミングの重要性を再認識する。初心者には難しいとしながらも、自らの学びを深める姿勢を見せる。

highlights.title: 9戦目 ネメシス戦開始
highlights.description: ネメシスとの対戦が開始。先攻を選択。夏色まつりは「算数できない」と自虐しつつ、カード効果の計算に苦戦する様子を見せる。

highlights.title: 9戦目 序盤のカードプレイ
highlights.description: 相手がフォロワー「ナイトメア・ヴェリィ」をプレイし、自分のリーダーが3ダメージを受ける。夏色まつりは「魅惑のサキュバス・リリム」をプレイする。

highlights.title: 9戦目 相手の猛攻と盤面不利
highlights.description: 相手が「迷える光明・アポロン」をプレイし、場全体に1ダメージを与える。さらに「ミリタリードッグ」を展開し、夏色まつりのフォロワーが破壊され盤面が不利になる。

highlights.title: 9戦目 夏色まつりの反撃と相手の追加展開
highlights.description: 夏色まつりも「眠地の霊園」でゴーストを出し、墓場を増やす。さらにバットを出し、相手リーダーにダメージを与えつつ回復を試みるが、相手は「王断の天宮・スタチウム」をプレイし、強力な盤面を築く。

highlights.title: 9戦目 絶望的な状況と敗北
highlights.description: 夏色まつりが「やだ！」と絶望の声を上げながらもプレイを続ける。相手が「静寂のアナテマ・ギルダリア」で盤面を一掃し、さらに「英傑の天使・オリヴィエ」をプレイ。夏色まつりも超進化させるが、相手も超進化で応戦し、最終的に敗北。「やめやめ、つまんなーい。」とリタイアする。

highlights.title: 10戦目 ネメシス戦再開と「人形」デッキの脅威
highlights.description: 再びネメシスとの対戦。夏色まつりは「今度こそ勝つまで終わらない！」と意気込む。相手が「ドールズシアター」をプレイし、「操り人形」を手札に加える戦略で夏色まつりを苦しめ、「人形本当にやだ」と嘆く。

highlights.title: 10戦目 相手の強力な攻めと敗北
highlights.description: 相手が「雷火の双神・フニカル＆ヤヴハール」をプレイし、フォロワーを破壊されリーダーにもダメージを受ける。夏色まつりも超進化で応戦するが、相手は「プロシードハート・オーキス」をプレイし、強力なフォロワーを連続で出し、最終的に敗北。「やめやめ、つまんなーい！」と叫びリタイアする。

highlights.title: 11戦目 ビショップ戦開始
highlights.description: 最後の対戦。相手はビショップ。夏色まつりは「今度こそ勝つまで終わらない！」と決意を新たにする。相手が「穏やかなる教会」をプレイし、アミュレットを展開する。

highlights.title: 11戦目 配信終了
highlights.description: 夏色まつりが序盤からフォロワーを展開し攻撃を試みるが、配信終了時間となり、最終的な勝敗は不明のまま配信が終了する。

overview_en.summary: This is a stream where Natsuiro Matsuri from Hololive challenges the "Nightmare" class in Shadowverse Worlds Beyond. Although she experienced a series of losses early on, she deepened her understanding of the game with advice from viewers, achieving her first victory and showing growth. However, in the latter half of the stream, she struggled against the "Nemesis" class's powerful board-clearing "Puppet" deck, leading to more consecutive losses. Afterward, she renewed her determination and challenged a Bishop in the final match, but unfortunately, the stream ended before a conclusion could be reached, postponing the decision to the next time. Despite jokingly saying "Stop, stop, this is boring!" and retiring during defeats, her consistently bright and positive attitude while enjoying the game made for a memorable stream.
overview_en.mood: A consistently amicable atmosphere, with serious expressions seen during gameplay, yet a bright stream where she maintained her enjoyment even when losing.

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Today's Goal
highlights_en.description: Natsuiro Matsuri from Hololive starts her Shadowverse Worlds Beyond stream. She states her desire to try other classes to deepen her understanding, particularly showing enthusiasm for challenging the "Nightmare" class.

highlights_en.title: Deck Building Preparation
highlights_en.description: She moves to the card screen and talks about deck building. She remembers not having fed her cat before the stream and mentions that the stream might be a bit shorter.

highlights_en.title: Deck Creation and Intent behind Class Selection
highlights_en.description: She talks about creating a deck using a "strongest deck" she researched on Twitter. She reiterates that she had always wanted to play Nightmare and praises her own thumbnail.

highlights_en.title: Checking Card Effects on the Deck Building Screen
highlights_en.description: Displaying the Nightmare deck screen, she tries to deepen her understanding by asking viewers about class-specific concepts like "graveyard" and "Necromancy," and reading out card effects.

highlights_en.title: Saving the Deck and Considering Match Format
highlights_en.description: She saves her deck and hesitates whether to challenge ranked matches. She asks viewers for advice, questioning, "Should I not play ranked if I don't understand anything?" Ultimately, she decides to look for opponents in a room match.

highlights_en.title: Room Match Starts and First Match Loss
highlights_en.description: A user named 'Tenja' joins the room match, and the first game begins. She proceeds while interacting with viewers, from choosing to go first or second to checking card effects, but ultimately loses by retiring. When losing, she jokingly says, "Stop, stop, this is boring!"

highlights_en.title: Second Match Starts and Reconfirming Class Traits
highlights_en.description: The second match begins with 'Yuri'. Matsuri chooses to go first. Through this match, she attempts to gain a deeper understanding of new elements such as Act, Combo, and Evolution.

highlights_en.title: Second Match Loss and Knowledge Barrier
highlights_en.description: She loses the second match against Royal. Unable to grasp class traits and card synergies, she retires again. While blaming herself, saying "Because I'm an idiot," she continues to play without giving up.

highlights_en.title: Third Match Starts and Adjusting Strategy
highlights_en.description: The third match begins with 'Gekiryu'. Matsuri chooses to go second. Learning from previous losses, she attempts a more aggressive strategy, aiming for direct damage while being mindful of board control.

highlights_en.title: Third Match Loss and Further Learning
highlights_en.description: She loses the third match against Elf. She realizes she misunderstood the "Act" effect as being at the end of the turn and feels regret. While jokingly complaining to viewers, "I wish you had told me sooner!", she keenly feels her lack of knowledge.

highlights_en.title: Fourth Match Starts and Nemesis Countermeasures
highlights_en.description: The fourth match begins with 'Zero'. Matsuri chooses to go first. Her opponent is Nemesis. Although she feels it's a bad matchup from past experience, she actively builds her board and initiates attacks.

highlights_en.title: Fourth Match Loss and Accumulation of Experience
highlights_en.description: She loses the fourth match against Nemesis as well. She struggles against the opponent's powerful board-clearing abilities and healing, lacking a decisive blow. She vows to apply the lessons learned from this defeat to the next game, maintaining a positive attitude.

highlights_en.title: Fifth Match Starts and Final Challenge
highlights_en.description: The fifth match begins with 'Rei'. Matsuri chooses to go first. The match continues against Nemesis. Utilizing her previous experience, she aggressively attacks from the start but struggles against the opponent's board development.

highlights_en.title: Fifth Match Loss and Stream Conclusion
highlights_en.description: She loses the fifth match against Nemesis. She succumbs to the opponent's powerful development and removal capabilities. Reflecting on the many lessons learned throughout this stream, she concludes the broadcast with anticipation for future growth.

highlights_en.title: Sixth Match Starts, Retrying Against Nemesis
highlights_en.description: She retries against Nemesis, confirming the importance of mulligan (hand exchange). She keeps the card 'Aragavy'.

highlights_en.title: First Victory! Strategy Bears Fruit
highlights_en.description: After clearing the opponent's followers with Aragavy's evolution and dealing 3 damage to the leader, she delivers the finishing blow with a direct attack, finally securing her first victory. There's a moment where she stands up in joy.

highlights_en.title: Reviewing Strategy with Replay
highlights_en.description: Watching the replay of her victorious match, she understands that the opponent's strategy was to conserve PP, gaining new insights.

highlights_en.title: Seventh Match Starts, Versus Dragon
highlights_en.description: While expressing admiration for her Master rank opponent 'GanGa', the match against the Dragon class begins. She chooses to go second.

highlights_en.title: New Loss and Reflection
highlights_en.description: She loses, succumbing to the opponent's fierce onslaught. Reflecting that saving her Super Evolution was a mistake, she comments, "Stop, stop, this is boring!"

highlights_en.title: Eighth Match, Nightmare Mirror Match
highlights_en.description: A Nightmare mirror match against a new opponent, 'Isshiki_SSRB'. She chooses to go first.

highlights_en.title: Strategic Victory! Importance of Evolution and Board Control
highlights_en.description: She deals damage to the opponent's leader with Orthrus's evolution ability, clears the board, and ultimately secures victory. She shows emotion at the depth of Shadowverse and her own growth.

highlights_en.title: Strategic Analysis and Continued Learning
highlights_en.description: Through this match, she reconfirms the difficulty of balancing board control and face damage in an "aggro" strategy, and the importance of "Super Evolution" timing. While acknowledging it's difficult for beginners, she shows her attitude of deepening her own learning.

highlights_en.title: Ninth Match: Nemesis Battle Begins
highlights_en.description: The match against Nemesis begins. She chooses to go first. Natsuiro Matsuri struggles with calculating card effects, self-deprecatingly saying, "I can't do math."

highlights_en.title: Ninth Match: Early Card Plays
highlights_en.description: The opponent plays the follower 'Nightmare Verri', and Matsuri's leader takes 3 damage. Natsuiro Matsuri plays 'Enchanting Succubus Lilim'.

highlights_en.title: Ninth Match: Opponent's Onslaught and Board Disadvantage
highlights_en.description: The opponent plays 'Lost Light Apollon', dealing 1 damage to the entire board. They then deploy 'Military Dog', destroying Natsuiro Matsuri's followers and putting her at a board disadvantage.

highlights_en.title: Ninth Match: Natsuiro Matsuri's Counterattack and Opponent's Further Development
highlights_en.description: Natsuiro Matsuri also summons a Ghost with 'Slumbering Graveyard', increasing her graveyard count. She then plays a Bat, attempting to deal damage to the opponent's leader while healing, but the opponent plays 'Royal Ruin Stadchium', building a powerful board.

highlights_en.title: Ninth Match: Desperate Situation and Loss
highlights_en.description: Natsuiro Matsuri continues to play, despairingly exclaiming "No!". The opponent clears the board with 'Quiet Anathema Gilderoy' and then plays 'Heroic Angel Olivier'. Matsuri also Super Evolves, but the opponent responds with their own Super Evolution, leading to a final defeat. She retires, saying, "Stop, stop, this is boring!"

highlights_en.title: Tenth Match: Nemesis Battle Resumes and the Threat of the 'Puppet' Deck
highlights_en.description: The match against Nemesis resumes. Natsuiro Matsuri declares, "This time, I won't stop until I win!" The opponent plays 'Doll's Theater', adding 'Puppet' to their hand, a strategy that torments Matsuri, making her lament, "I really hate Puppets."

highlights_en.title: Tenth Match: Opponent's Powerful Offensive and Loss
highlights_en.description: The opponent plays 'Dual Gods of Thunder and Flame: Funikaru & Yavhaar', destroying her followers and dealing damage to her leader. Natsuiro Matsuri responds with a Super Evolution, but the opponent plays 'Proceed Heart Orchis', deploying powerful followers consecutively, ultimately leading to her defeat. She shouts, "Stop, stop, this is boring!" and retires.

highlights_en.title: Eleventh Match: Bishop Battle Begins
highlights_en.description: The final match. Her opponent is Bishop. Natsuiro Matsuri renews her resolve, declaring, "This time, I won't stop until I win!" The opponent plays 'Serene Church', deploying an amulet.

highlights_en.title: Eleventh Match: Stream Ends
highlights_en.description: Natsuiro Matsuri attempts to deploy followers and attack from the early game, but the stream ends as the broadcast time runs out, leaving the final outcome unknown.

title: 【 #ぺこマリ体操 】Trying to learn the PekoMari exercise dance! ~ 💄

overview.summary: VTuberのElizabethが、ホロライブの兎田ぺこらと宝鐘マリンが歌う「ぺこマリ体操」のダンスを、VRアバターで一緒に練習する配信。全身タイツのようなコミカルなアバターで、他のホロライブメンバーのモデルと共に何度もダンスを繰り返す。練習が進むにつれて疲労困憊になり、奇妙な動きになったり倒れ込んだりする場面も多いが、コードのトラブルにもめげずに何度も再開し、最後は限界まで踊り切る。配信を通して、VRダンスの楽しさや難しさ、体力消耗の実情を語り、VRでの技術的な課題や熱中症対策について注意喚起しつつ、視聴者との交流を深め、今後の配信予定を告知して努力と達成感を分かち合う。
overview.mood: 終始明るく、努力と達成感が感じられる雰囲気。コミカルな場面が多く、楽しい気分になる

highlights.title: 配信開始と「ぺこマリ体操」紹介
highlights.description: Elizabethが自身のVRアバターの紹介と、ぺこマリ体操の練習を開始することを宣言。曲がキャッチーで耳から離れないことを語る。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス1回目
highlights.description: Elizabethがぺこらとマリンのモデルと共に初めての「ぺこマリ体操」ダンスを披露。

highlights.title: 1回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethが全身タイツアバターでのダンスによる暑さや、曲の中毒性について話す。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス2回目
highlights.description: Elizabethが再びぺこらとマリンのモデルと共にダンスに挑戦。

highlights.title: 2回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethがステップの難しさについて言及し、練習の課題を認識する。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス3回目
highlights.description: Elizabethが3回目のダンスに挑む。

highlights.title: 3回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethが前回よりもステップが良くなったと自己評価し、少しずつ成果が出ていることに喜びを見せる。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス4回目
highlights.description: 4回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 4回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethが体の柔軟性について言及し、自身の成長を実感している様子を語る。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス5回目
highlights.description: 5回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 5回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethが腕の動きの難しさや、膝を曲げる動作が重要だと話す。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス6回目
highlights.description: 6回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 6回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethがこの体操の運動量の多さや、全身を使って踊ることの難しさについて語る。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス7回目
highlights.description: 7回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 7回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethがダンス中に息切れがすることを明かし、視聴者への感謝を述べる。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス8回目
highlights.description: 8回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 8回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethが体のバランスが改善されたことを実感していると語る。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス9回目
highlights.description: 9回目のダンスが始まる。

highlights.title: 9回目終了後の感想
highlights.description: Elizabethがダンスのポイントを掴み始めたことや、練習の成果について話す。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス10回目
highlights.description: 10回目のダンスが始まる。Elizabethは疲労困憊で息切れしながらもダンスを続ける。

highlights.title: 10回目終了後の限界と他ホロメンパート
highlights.description: Elizabethが疲労困憊で床に倒れ込みながら、アキ・ローゼンタール、大空スバル、大神ミオ、白銀ノエルのパートを奇妙な体勢で踊り続ける。

highlights.title: 10回目終盤の奇妙なダンスと達成感
highlights.description: 不知火フレア、常闇トワ、雪花ラミィ、星街すいせいのパートで、Elizabethは完全に倒れ込んだり座り込んだりしながら、最後まで何とか踊り切る。

highlights.title: 限界突破後のコミカルな自虐
highlights.description: Elizabethが床に倒れたままジョークを飛ばし、幼児のように立ち上がると自虐。アバターの動きやトラッキングについてコメントする。

highlights.title: VRダンスにおける体の動きとトラッキング
highlights.description: ElizabethがVR空間での体の動きの追跡精度や、トラッカーの限界について詳しく話す。配信時間にも触れる。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス11回目
highlights.description: Elizabethが再び全身タイツアバターでダンスに挑戦。前回よりもさらに疲労困憊の様子を見せる。

highlights.title: 11回目終盤の混沌としたダンス
highlights.description: ホロライブメンバーのパートで、Elizabethは転がったり、滑ったり、座り込んだりしながら、体力的に限界を迎えながらも踊り続ける。

highlights.title: 11回目終了後の「マジ卍」リアクション
highlights.description: Elizabethが完全に息切れし、もう踊れないと訴えながら「マジ卍」を連発する。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操ダンス12回目
highlights.description: Elizabethが再びダンスに挑むが、疲労困憊で動きがぎこちなく、踊れていないことを認める。

highlights.title: 12回目終盤の寝転がりダンス
highlights.description: Elizabethはほとんどの時間を地面に寝転がったり座り込んだりしながら過ごし、手だけを動かしてダンスに参加する。

highlights.title: 休憩とVRでの雑談
highlights.description: ElizabethがVRダンスでどれだけ疲れるかを説明。現実の体力消耗につながると語る。

highlights.title: VRトラッキングの課題と理想のVR環境
highlights.description: ElizabethがVRChatでのトラッキングの課題（バッテリー切れ、ケーブル、ルームスペース）を語り、広い部屋でのVR環境を夢見る。

highlights.title: 最終ダンスへの意気込みと夏のVR注意喚起
highlights.description: Elizabethが最後のダンスへの意気込みを語り、夏のVRにおける水分補給の重要性を強調する。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操最終ダンス（13回目）
highlights.description: Elizabethが全身タイツアバターで、最後のダンスに挑む。疲労困憊ながらも最後まで踊り切ろうと奮闘。

highlights.title: 最終ダンス後の達成感と感謝のメッセージ
highlights.description: Elizabethがダンスを完遂した喜びと達成感を爆発させ、視聴者とホロライブメンバーへの感謝を伝える。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操再挑戦への準備
highlights.description: Elizabethがペコマリ体操の練習を再開し、空間認識に集中する必要があると話す。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操（再開1回目）
highlights.description: ペコラとマリンのモデルと共にペコマリ体操を踊り始めるが、コードの問題で中断。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操（再開2回目）
highlights.description: 再びダンスに挑戦するが、またコードに阻まれ中断。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操（再開3回目）
highlights.description: 3回目のダンスに挑戦。途中で腕立て伏せを試みるが断念。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操（再開4回目）
highlights.description: 再びダンスを開始し、疲労困憊しながらも続ける。

highlights.title: 疲労困憊のメンバーパートとダンスの終焉
highlights.description: Elizabethが限界を迎えながらも、アキ、スバル、ミオ、ノエル、フレア、トワ、ラミィ、すいせいのパートを奇妙な体勢で踊り切り、達成感を表現。

highlights.title: VRダンスの現実と技術的な課題
highlights.description: VRダンスでの体力消耗、発汗量について語り、アバターのトラッキングやVR環境におけるケーブルの課題について詳しく話す。

highlights.title: VRトレーニングと今後の展望
highlights.description: 夏場のVRプレイにおける水分補給の重要性を強調し、今後もぺこマリ体操を練習し続ける意欲を示す。

highlights.title: ぺこマリ体操への情熱とVRの魅力
highlights.description: ぺこマリ体操の中毒性や運動効果、VRダンスの楽しさと難しさについて熱く語る。

highlights.title: 配信のエンディングと今後の告知
highlights.description: 視聴者への感謝を述べ、メンバー限定配信やホロライブのコンサート予定など、今後の活動について告知する。

overview_en.summary: VTuber Elizabeth's stream where she practices the "PekoMali Exercise" dance, sung by Hololive's Usada Pekora and Houshou Marine, together with her VR avatar. Using a comical avatar resembling a full-body suit, she repeatedly dances with models of other Hololive members. As the practice progresses, she becomes exhausted, often making strange movements or collapsing. However, undeterred by cable issues, she restarts multiple times and ultimately dances to her limit. Throughout the stream, she discusses the fun and difficulty of VR dancing, the reality of physical exhaustion, and raises awareness about technical challenges in VR and heatstroke prevention, all while deepening interaction with viewers, announcing future stream schedules, and sharing her effort and sense of accomplishment.
overview_en.mood: Overall bright, with an atmosphere of effort and accomplishment. Many comical scenes make it enjoyable.

highlights_en.title: Stream Start and Introduction to 'PekoMali Exercise'
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth introduces her VR avatar and announces the start of her 'PekoMali Exercise' practice. She mentions how catchy the song is and that it's stuck in her head.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 1st Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth performs the 'PekoMali Exercise' dance for the first time with Pekora and Marine's models.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 1st Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth talks about the heat from dancing in her full-body suit avatar and the song's addictiveness.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 2nd Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth attempts the dance again with Pekora and Marine's models.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 2nd Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth mentions the difficulty of the steps and recognizes the challenges in practice.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 3rd Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth attempts the dance for the third time.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 3rd Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth self-assesses that her steps have improved since last time, showing joy that she's gradually seeing results.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 4th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The fourth dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 4th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth mentions her body's flexibility and describes feeling her own growth.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 5th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The fifth dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 5th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth talks about the difficulty of arm movements and the importance of bending her knees.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 6th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The sixth dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 6th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth talks about the high amount of exercise in this routine and the difficulty of dancing with her whole body.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 7th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The seventh dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 7th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth reveals she gets out of breath during the dance and expresses gratitude to her viewers.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 8th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The eighth dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 8th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth says she feels her body balance has improved.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 9th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The ninth dance begins.

highlights_en.title: Impressions After the 9th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth talks about starting to grasp the dance's key points and the results of her practice.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 10th Attempt
highlights_en.description: The tenth dance begins. Elizabeth continues dancing, exhausted and out of breath.

highlights_en.title: Limits After 10th Attempt and Other Holo Member Parts
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth, exhausted and collapsed on the floor, continues to dance to the parts of Aki Rosenthal, Oozora Subaru, Ookami Mio, and Shirogane Noel in strange postures.

highlights_en.title: Strange Dance at the End of 10th Attempt and Sense of Accomplishment
highlights_en.description: During the parts of Shiranui Flare, Tokoyami Towa, Yukihana Lamy, and Hoshimachi Suisei, Elizabeth, while completely collapsed or sitting, somehow manages to dance until the very end.

highlights_en.title: Comical Self-Deprecation After Reaching Her Limit
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth cracks jokes while lying on the floor, then self-deprecatingly stands up like a toddler. She comments on avatar movement and tracking.

highlights_en.title: Body Movement and Tracking in VR Dance
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth elaborates on the accuracy of body movement tracking in VR space and the limitations of trackers. She also touches upon the stream duration.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 11th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth challenges the dance again with her full-body suit avatar. She appears even more exhausted than last time.

highlights_en.title: Chaotic Dance Towards the End of 11th Attempt
highlights_en.description: During the Hololive members' parts, Elizabeth rolls, slides, and sits while continuing to dance despite reaching her physical limits.

highlights_en.title: Her 'Maji Manji' Reaction After the 11th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth is completely out of breath, insisting she can't dance anymore, and repeatedly exclaims 'Maji Manji' (slang for 'seriously awesome/crazy').

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Dance - 12th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth attempts the dance again, but her movements are awkward due to exhaustion, and she admits she's not really dancing.

highlights_en.title: Lying-Down Dance Towards the End of 12th Attempt
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth spends most of the time lying or sitting on the floor, participating in the dance only by moving her hands.

highlights_en.title: Break and Chat in VR
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth explains how tiring VR dancing is. She states that it leads to real physical exhaustion.

highlights_en.title: VR Tracking Challenges and Ideal VR Environment
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth talks about tracking challenges in VRChat (battery drain, cables, room space) and dreams of a VR environment in a spacious room.

highlights_en.title: Enthusiasm for the Final Dance and VR Safety Warning for Summer
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth expresses her enthusiasm for the final dance and emphasizes the importance of hydration during VR play in summer.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise Final Dance (13th Attempt)
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth attempts the final dance in her full-body suit avatar. Exhausted, she struggles to dance until the very end.

highlights_en.title: Sense of Accomplishment and Thank You Message After the Final Dance
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth expresses her joy and sense of accomplishment for completing the dance, and conveys her gratitude to viewers and Hololive members.

highlights_en.title: Preparation for Retrying PekoMali Exercise
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth resumes practicing the PekoMali Exercise and mentions needing to focus on spatial awareness.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise (Restart 1st Attempt)
highlights_en.description: Starts dancing the PekoMali Exercise with Pekora and Marine's models but is interrupted by a cable issue.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise (Restart 2nd Attempt)
highlights_en.description: Attempts the dance again but is interrupted by a cable issue once more.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise (Restart 3rd Attempt)
highlights_en.description: Attempts the dance for the third time. Tries to do push-ups midway but gives up.

highlights_en.title: PekoMali Exercise (Restart 4th Attempt)
highlights_en.description: Starts dancing again and continues despite exhaustion.

highlights_en.title: Exhausted Member Parts and the End of the Dance
highlights_en.description: Elizabeth reaches her limit but dances through the parts of Aki, Subaru, Mio, Noel, Flare, Towa, Lamy, and Suisei in strange postures, expressing a sense of accomplishment.

highlights_en.title: Realities of VR Dance and Technical Challenges
highlights_en.description: She talks about physical exhaustion and sweat during VR dance, and elaborates on avatar tracking and cable challenges in the VR environment.

highlights_en.title: VR Training and Future Outlook
highlights_en.description: She emphasizes the importance of hydration during VR play in summer and shows her eagerness to continue practicing the PekoMali Exercise.

highlights_en.title: Passion for PekoMali Exercise and the Appeal of VR
highlights_en.description: She passionately talks about the addictiveness and exercise benefits of the PekoMali Exercise, as well as the fun and difficulty of VR dancing.

highlights_en.title: Stream Ending and Future Announcements
highlights_en.description: She expresses gratitude to her viewers and announces future activities, including member-only streams and Hololive concert plans.
